Francais: L’histoire rapportée ici est arrivée au temps du roi Xerxès , celui qui régna sur cent vingt-sept provinces, de l’Inde jusqu’à l’Éthiopie.
Anglais: It was in the days of Ahasuerus ( Xerxes) who reigned from India to Ethiopia (Cush) over 127 provinces,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Labara namna kayni li'e hay liyna vi Asuwerus, Asuwerus namna ma mulda valam fokay hay Indiya pa ta-ta hay Etiopiya. Nam ka ti mulda kay nagat kis kalam dok-ma' yam siɗiya.
Bulu: Jame di e nga boban melu njô bôt Asuérus a nga jôô bifuse bi si mewôm mebaé a zamgbwa, ataté Inde a kui Etiôpi.
Guiziga: Ɓi mutohoko angi ɗerewol hana na, a cuh ti hin ngi buy mazilaka Zerses. Buy Zerses nah vuna, a wi buy miwi lihey wal wal skat ti kukur cuw nga tarnaˀ, zle a Eŋde hã sesẽŋ a Etiyopi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ko laati nder zamanu Ahasuwerus: Wakkati man o laamani lesɗe teemerre e noogas e joweeɗiɗi (127), diga Indiya haa yotti Etiyopiya .
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ko laati nder zamanu Ahasuwerus: Wakkati man o laamani lesɗe teemerre e noogas e joweeɗiɗi (127), diga Indiya haa yotti Etiyopiya .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Duka so nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Zɛrzɛs ɔɔ so nɛ̀ wan zu o zika-nù gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Indɛ hɔ nɛnɛ Etiopii mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Duka so nɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Zɛrzɛs ɔɔ so nɛ̀ wan zu o zika-nù gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ Indɛ hɔ nɛnɛ Etiopii mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya wəsə nya kemenete geva nya te vəa Sɛrsɛs. Gheŋkɛ ya kameghe te sla ta hɛɗi gwəmsə ba'a bakemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe, slə mbe Ɛnde hwa'a te hɛɗia Ɛtiyopi.
Tupurri: Waçaçre sen joñ mokay diñ ti wur mani wañ Asuyerus no. AÀ suyerus sen diñ je maga hay waçaç waçaçre sir tië tië kis ti äe do äog ti renam. Tï¡ï¡ wer le Eñde ka' haçaç nduu go kañge Etiyopi.

Francais: Au cours de la troisième année de son règne, le roi, installé dans son palais royal de la citadelle de Suse, organisa un banquet pour tous ses hauts fonctionnaires et ses ministres ; il réunit auprès de lui les officiers de l’armée de Perse et de Médie, les gouverneurs et les chefs des provinces .

Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa maheke ta va ta ŋkɛ mbe meghe, kwa ntishɛ ŋkɛ pelɛ pasla meghe mbe ŋkwa nya berete mbe Səze ne, pa takɛ gəsəkə kezha ka mene slene ta ŋkɛ nyi jama jama pɛtɛa ba'a mbelia ŋkɛ nyi te ghə. Pa tsenete mbelia jama ta ka sewajɛ nyi mbe Pɛrse ba'a nyi mbe Mɛdi, ka ŋgwamna ba'a mbeli nyi te ghəa yɛ sla ta hɛɗi yitea ghəa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: __Error__

Francais: Il leur montra les richesses magnifiques et le luxe éclatant qui faisaient la gloire de son règne. Les festivités durèrent très longtemps, six mois au total.
Anglais: And he displayed the riches of his glorious kingdom and the splendor of his great majesty for many days, 180 days  in all .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ɗek gajijita vi farayna vi mulda valam goyo, hiɗi wileta vi ŋolda valamu ta ira' may waaɗita. Kayni mus ir buur ŋolo. Buur kis kalam dok-glafandi.
Bulu: a nga liti be bitôtoʼo bi biôm ya nté nkôñ wé, a duma ya ngul éjôé jé. Dina ate a nga tabe melu ntet a mewôme muam.
Guiziga: A gam kiya merkeɗe, angi hin nah gar na, buy a ro ar li biga taŋ zlili naŋ mihaɗa, naŋ muluma ar zumabuy naŋ, yo kuy ngi dudok naŋ mihaɗa mazli ta wãˀ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalɗe teemerre e cappanɗe joweetati (180) o holli ɓe risku laamu maako pantuŋgu e tedduŋgal maŋngu maako kaayeefiiwal.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalɗe teemerre e cappanɗe joweetati (180) o holli ɓe risku laamu maako pantuŋgu e tedduŋgal maŋngu maako kaayeefiiwal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ usa dɔka mbɔi in gasa mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wa tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ usa dɔka mbɔi in gasa mɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ wa tɛ ɔɔ-zɛ gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake kancɛ nda zləvəa ŋkɛ nya kawəsə meŋele ke hɛ, tsema tsema kwelea meghea ŋkɛ. Hɛ kwele kwele menete gəsəkəa shɛ! Tere ŋkwaŋe pɛtɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal naa nen togodge horog äen wo go de kluu wañ äen nen naw kisi, ti äe do nenma'a.

Francais: A la fin de cette période, le roi offrit également un banquet aux gens de toutes conditions, riches ou pauvres, qui se trouvaient dans la citadelle de Suse. Cette fête se déroula pendant une semaine dans les jardins du palais.
Anglais: When these days were completed, the king held a banquet for all the people who were present at the citadel in Susa [the capital], from the greatest [in importance] to the least, a seven-day feast in the courtyard of the garden of the king’s palace.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma buur namna vatawa, mulla kot tin kay sumun kaf goy jiy hay haraŋa, hay wur-daŋŋa vi mulda valamu, nam kot tin kay sumun kaf sa ka hay Susa, nagata vi mulda, nam kotom kay sa ŋulona hiɗi sa gurayna kaf.
Bulu: Eyoñe melu mete me maneya, njô bôt a nga beta bo dina mfe e minseñe ya nda njô bôt tañe melu zamgbwa asu bôte mevale mese be nga too tisone Suz, ataté bôbenen a kui bôbetok.
Guiziga: A dirba hin nah ma na, buy tuwa, a di ɗaf ngi muguzlum, da mizli misi ar walahay Sus gar, zle avu mizli mugop gopoy hã avu misi murgahay gar. Muguzlum a zik hin tarnaˀ a mamay buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde wakkati man saali, o waɗi nyaamduuji feere ngam yimɓe nder laamorde Suuza fuu, mawɓe e leesɓe. Ɗum waɗi nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi haa daldal jarne laamorde.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde wakkati man saali, o waɗi nyaamduuji feere ngam yimɓe nder laamorde Suuza fuu, mawɓe e leesɓe. Ɗum waɗi nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi haa daldal jarne laamorde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wannu dee mbe gbaŋa sɛn bee-gara tua-wan kɔ‘i ha̧ o bíí ŋgárá Suzɛ, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o geɗek wi lɛŋ. Gbaŋa'i ɔɔ nɛ́ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ ŋgimbi'i, wannu dee mbe gbaŋa sɛn bee-gara tua-wan kɔ‘i ha̧ o bíí ŋgárá Suzɛ, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e o gasawi gú nɛ̀ o geɗek wi lɛŋ. Gbaŋa'i ɔɔ nɛ́ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa kiɗi vəa shɛ ne, pa ŋkɛ menete wəshi kezeme ke mbeli nyi mbe ŋkwa nya berete mbe Səze, ke mbelia jama le nyi ɓɛhwɛ pɛtɛ kwa ntsa nya yitea ghɛa meghe, kahɛ mberefaŋe menete geva ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: De wur maga naw sen wo go baa jag mono, wañ kal joñ reege ne jar maga wo wursen ti meene sirn Sus ni mo äuy no, je kluu, weeklee. Reegen joñ naw renam. AÀ joñn äil pay sugnee äe ma äiñ tiñ wañ no.

Francais: Des tentures de lin blanc ou violet étaient suspendues par des cordelettes blanches et rouges à des anneaux d’argent fixés sur des colonnes de marbre. On avait placé des divans d’or et d’argent sur le sol recouvert d’une mosaïque de dalles jaunes, blanches, nacrées et noires .
Anglais: There were curtains  (draperies) of fine white and violet linen fastened with cords of fine purple linen to silver rings and marble columns. The couches of gold and silver  rested  on a mosaic floor of  porphyry, marble, mother-of-pearl, and precious  colored  stones.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sligara ma tuwam ɗoy hiɗi barawna, baraw haɓna hiɗi ɗuŋus fok-dimina ma goɗayna ka meɗay goy tam zigew ma haɓna hiɗi ma purpella, kali hay jaɓna ma doorona, juni kat dolla ma koti hiɗi hiɗiy ma wilena, slen ma musta koti hiɗi ora hiɗi doorona, nam lakay kulo kay nagana ma yalam koray slawi, haɓi, ciliŋi hiɗi wura'a kaw.
Bulu: Bindelé bi too ndubane léñ, sut, évele mevule me ntômba, bi nga tii e minkol mi too éfumulu, angôô nsolan e bilondo bi argent a mekône me marbre. Binoñe yʼaba nda , mboone or a argent bi nga tele si bi too ñyañane porfir, marbre, nakre a évindi marbre.
Guiziga: Gabaga mislirkeɗey, babara, gagaza, yo miwitwitey, muluwa taŋ ti dangwa ngi ɓiri barahay avu zeweɗ miɓel ɓel babarahay, yo gagazahay, mujuwa taŋ kaˀ kaˀ avu ɓamtalay, ɓamtal mindira ti ɗugur ɗoro. Arngawo ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ngi ɓiri barahay ada ar li midirka le ti ɗugur micihhe, kalaf kalafay, babarahay, tapasl tapaslay waɗ titirahay ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wiirndallooji daneeji e carwinaaɗi ɗon ɓili bee kalagaaje cardi haa ɓoggi daneeji ɗigguɗi e boɗeeji caka daŋraŋge kaa'e daneeje. Leese kaŋŋeeri e cardi ɗon mbe'iti dow taŋkol baɗaaŋgol bee kaa'e cehaaɗe ɗelkooje e daneeje e oole e ɓaleeje.
Fulfulde_DC: Wiirndallooji daneeji e carwinaaɗi ɗon ɓili bee kalagaaje cardi haa ɓoggi daneeji ɗigguɗi e boɗeeji caka daŋraŋge kaa'e daneeje. Leese kaŋŋeeri e cardi ɗon mbe'iti dow taŋkol baɗaaŋgol bee kaa'e cehaaɗe ɗelkooje e daneeje e oole e ɓaleeje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kuna o de yí-laa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛ de toka gbɛ̧ nyak, ɓɛɛ wa ba kun tɛ o de káná nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, e tɛ o mbiŋ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu ta. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aa o gado nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi zu fara nɛ̀‘i yɔka nɛ̀ o de ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ kpaa-a ɔ ɓana.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kuna o de yí-laa nɛtɛ nɛtɛ tɛ de toka gbɛ̧ nyak, ɓɛɛ wa ba kun tɛ o de káná nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu-mbɔi, e tɛ o mbiŋ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ bu ta. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aa o gado nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr in bu-mbɔi zu fara nɛ̀‘i yɔka nɛ̀ o de ta nɛtɛ nɛtɛ nɛ̀ kpaa-a ɔ ɓana.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hwepeyi yɛ mayafe kwa tɛawetɛa le kwa ndereme ndereme te zewe kwa ɗeke gheme, le yɛ ŋgwedɛba mze kwa tɛawetɛa tendɛaŋe te yɛ selə nyi ŋate mbeli le kwacaregesla. Pa mbeli vɛsəyi mze kwa tere tere ba'a mze kwa tɛawetɛa te diɓere nya sleɓete mbeli le pelɛ nyi ketsehe tsehe, nyi kakwa rəghwə rəghwə, ghwaba ghwaba ba'a nyi nɛnɛa nɛnɛa ba'a nyi ɗɛkeɗɛa ɗɛkeɗɛa.
Tupurri: Feçeçre ma de lag lar de piiri wo, ma waysaäwaysaäe, ma de tebere suääa, hay wo go de saëge de saale mbaraw ma depuy ceëceë, ma de seçeç burburi, de saëge jag boore maaway ma de gaëge deger deger wo, de saëge see mbal ma de guur see de piiri wo äuy deñ. Feçeçre suulin wo diñ de boo biñni wo, de boo maaway wo. AÀ hay wo de laage ti ngeel ma de da'ge go de guurgi de seçeç, depuy, de laa lare, de guurgi see ma de taabay.

Francais: Les boissons étaient servies dans des coupes d’or, de différentes formes. Le vin coulait à flot et était offert avec une générosité toute royale.
Anglais: Drinks were served in various kinds of golden goblets, and the royal wine was plentiful, in accordance with the generosity of the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka ɓuraw sle ma cina hay kaway-ma-cina ma ora kuɗ jafam valamu valamu, vinna vi mulda ka ŋolo, kay gigekaw ci kuɗ minda valamu.
Bulu: Be nga nyuu bôte bilam e bilaé bi or mevale meval été. Woon a mbe bifôfôt a be nga ve nye bôt éneʼene.
Guiziga: A saka mbaazla ti skiɗ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapaslay, muvuɗa ti sukwi wal wal haɗa. A vula vul ngi buyo le, mbaazla a ɓul ka yam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe njari njaram nder njardukoy kaŋŋeeri feere feere. Laamiiɗo hokki ɓe inaboojam nguykinoojam ɗuuɗɗam fodde caahaaki laamiiɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe njari njaram nder njardukoy kaŋŋeeri feere feere. Laamiiɗo hokki ɓe inaboojam nguykinoojam ɗuuɗɗam fodde caahaaki laamiiɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ́ o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr, yí-a  nɛtɛ nɛtɛ; dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔka so gan kere, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar ha̧a̧mɔ ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa a̧a̧ so nɛ́ o mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ̀‘i dee nɛ̀ lɔr, yí-a  nɛtɛ nɛtɛ; dɔ̧ɔ̧ dɔka so gan kere, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar ha̧a̧mɔ ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Kasa wəshi kesa mbeli kwa zlerekwe mze kwa tere tere nyi nza pa ta nci keghə keghə. Kwele kwele fəave nda tɛ meghe ke mbeli laka vele nya vele meghe
Tupurri: Haçaçre maga aè haç feçeçre ma jooge wo äil äaara mokay no, wo de joñge diñ de boo biñni wo wer sar sare, yii wañ hay mbe ëros ëros deñ koëe, sen diñ see do wañ mbe koë so.

Francais: Chacun pouvait boire sans contrainte, car le roi avait ordonné à tous les serviteurs du palais de satisfaire les désirs de ses hôtes.
Anglais: The drinking was  carried on  in accordance with the law; no one was compelled [to drink], for the king had directed each official of his household to comply with each guest’s wishes.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kaf ci kuɗ minda visiya, ki mulla di nala, sa may li sa hiɗi donoɗi.
Bulu: Ajô te môt ase a mbe nguleya nyu aval a kômbô, amu njô bôt a nga bendé bebo bisaé bese ya nda jé na be jalé minkômbane mi bôte bé a nga bañete.
Guiziga: Mbur gar a si mbaazlaka naŋ mawuɗo. Vurˀe, buy a vula mingiɓi da gawla naŋhay gar mavulaka gwat ngi zum da mizli, ɓa anja mbur gar na, a lum gwat naŋ mawuɗo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo moy yari bana ɓernde muuɗum yiɗi. Laamiiɗo umruno wakiili'en saare mum ɓe mbaɗana ewnaaɗo fuu ko o yiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo moy yari bana ɓernde muuɗum yiɗi. Laamiiɗo umruno wakiili'en saare mum ɓe mbaɗana ewnaaɗo fuu ko o yiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o bíí mɛ nɔ mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see-wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wan-duk-zu nyɔŋmɔ mɛ ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ o bíí mɛ nɔ mɔ hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see-wa kɔ̧ɔ̧ ga. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ o wan-duk-zu nyɔŋmɔ mɛ ha̧ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ̀ o bíí kɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe gezave nda ke mbeli nyi kemene slene ta wəshi kesa, yagha hɛ kaŋka mbeli yitea zeme wəsə ba'a sa wəsə kesa le berete, kala nya ɗe ŋkɛ yayata wəndə mene ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Wosela äuy joo diñ do ga äil äe da nono. Wañ hay siin go tañgu ne jar kluuri ma liñ ni äen wo na diñ do sen nono, ga joñ dole jobo de äe wa, ama aà mo hay diñ ti dage wosela.

Francais: De son côté, la reine Vasti avait organisé un banquet pour les femmes à l’intérieur du palais de Xerxès.
Anglais: Queen Vashti also held a [separate] banquet for the women in the palace of King Ahasuerus.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ca-mulda Vasti kaw ka li yuldeta kay boyna kalaf hay ziyna vi mulla Asuwerus.
Bulu: Wôna e nda njô bôt été, Vasti, nga njô bôt Asuérus, nye fe a nga bo dina asu binga.
Guiziga: Maˀãy Vasti, naŋ kwana, a di ɗaf ngi muguzlum le da ngwasay a wazlaray buy Zersese.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wasti, debbo laamiiɗo, kaŋko boo o waɗi nyaamduuji ngam rewɓe nder laamorde Ahasuwerus.
Fulfulde_DC: Wasti, debbo laamiiɗo, kaŋko boo o waɗi nyaamduuji ngam rewɓe nder laamorde Ahasuwerus.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko-wan Vasti dee war gbaŋa kɔ‘i in o okoo sɛn kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko-wan Vasti dee war gbaŋa kɔ‘i in o okoo sɛn kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Vasti nya kamale ta meghe perə ne, nahe ŋkɛ kemenete nda wəshi ke mi nyi ki ghɛ meghe Sɛrsɛs.
Tupurri: Fasti waçywañ lay, joñ reege ne naare wo äi feele tiñ wañ mani wañ Asuyerusn ni lay.

Francais: Le septième jour du banquet, le roi Xerxès était égayé par le vin. Il appela les sept eunuques spécialement attachés à son service : Mehouman, Bizta, Harbona, Bigta, Abagta, Zétar et Karkas.
Anglais: On the seventh day, when the king’s heart was joyful with wine (in high spirits), he commanded Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar, and Carkas, the seven  eunuchs who served in the presence of King Ahasuerus [as his attendants],
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta siɗiyata, hay li ma mulla dikam hobawa hiɗi vinna, nam di tam Mekuman, Bista, Harbona, Bigta, Abagta, Zetar hiɗi Karkas, sum sa patayna sa siɗiyana sa ka lakay vunamu kay sunumu,
Bulu: E môse zamgbwale, valé njô bôt Asuérus a too njalan a mevak amu woon a nga nyu, a nga loone bekalane bilaé zamgbwa be mbe be saane nye môé na: Mewuman, Bizta, Arbôna, Bigta, Abagta, Zétar a Karkas
Guiziga: Angi hin mitarnaˀ naŋ na, buy Zersese, hiri a ciraŋ le haɗa ti mbaazla tuwa. Gawla naŋ munguɗohoy ada tarnaˀ, i gawla migweˀ ngi vaˀahay, i ti: Mehumaŋ, Bista, Harbona, Bista, Abakta, Zetar waɗ Karkas. Buy a zila taŋ, a ɓa taŋ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde joweeɗiɗawre, nde laamiiɗo yari, o seyi, o umri Mehuman e Bizzeta e Harbona e Bigeta e Abagata e Zetar e Karkas, sortaaɓe huuwanooɓe mo njoweeɗiɗo,
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde joweeɗiɗawre, nde laamiiɗo yari, o seyi, o umri Mehuman e Bizzeta e Harbona e Bigeta e Abagata e Zetar e Karkas, sortaaɓe huuwanooɓe mo njoweeɗiɗo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, dɔ̧ɔ̧ pi̧i̧ wannu tɛ tortɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o kpàná kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ ya ɓɔn mgbák katɛ a̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ Mɛhuman, Bizɛta, Harbona, Bigta, Abgata, Zɛtar ká bá nɛ̀ Karkas,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, dɔ̧ɔ̧ pi̧i̧ wannu tɛ tortɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ ha̧ o kpàná kɔ̧-a̧ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ ya ɓɔn mgbák katɛ a̧; mɛ̀ nɛ́ Mɛhuman, Bizɛta, Harbona, Bigta, Abgata, Zɛtar ká bá nɛ̀ Karkas,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa mberefaŋe ta hɛ ne, fare fare wənəa meghe va tɛ, pa gezave nda ke Mɛhəwman, Bizta, Harbona, Bigta, Abagta, Zɛtar ba'a Karkas, ka mene nda slene mberefaŋe nyi ketsewe tsewe.
Tupurri: Wur naw ma de renamn mono, yii kal fruy jiili wañ, aà raw wii Mehuman, Bista, Harbona, Bigta, Abagta, Setar wo de Karkas, jar ma renam ma de ndar äay maga wo ti peele pel wañ Asuyerus, ga aà mo ëe wo waçywañ Fasti le.

Francais: Il leur ordonna de lui amener la reine Vasti portant la couronne royale. Il désirait montrer à ses hauts fonctionnaires et aux autres gens présents combien la reine était belle. Elle était en effet d’une beauté remarquable.
Anglais: to bring Queen Vashti before the king,  wearing her royal crown (high turban), to display her beauty before the people and the officials, for she was lovely to see.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay nisi ma mar ca-mulda Vasti vok iramu, hiɗi bogorayna vi mulda tuni ka'a, kay ɗek jifiyta va' goy tam sumuna hiɗi sa yerimana, kay na' jifiy ŋolo.
Bulu: a bendé be na be zuu nye Vasti, nga njô bôt, a beʼe ékate njô bôt. Asuérus a nga kômbô liti biwôlô bebo bisaé bié a e bôte bevoʼo be mbe valé, abim avé nga njô bôt a mbe abeñ, amu a mbe foʼo étua abeñ.
Guiziga: ɓa a sakaŋ ti maˀãy Vasti nga mbuŋ naŋ. Anja a sawa na, hirnga tuwaɗ tuwaɗ ti loppol nga naŋ maˀãya, ɓa a so biga kuy naŋ mazli ta wãˀ na da mizli gar, waɗ da mizli madiɗa ngi slra ngi buyoyo. Vasti naŋ kuy teˀ gwaɗ naŋ, hiri a ɗuv ava ta wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe ngadda Wasti debbo maako yeeso maako, meetiiɗo meetaleewol laamu. Laamiiɗo yiɗno hollugo ummaatooje e mawɓe no debbo oo wooɗiri, ngam o ŋarniiɗo masin.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓe ngadda Wasti debbo maako yeeso maako, meetiiɗo meetaleewol laamu. Laamiiɗo yiɗno hollugo ummaatooje e mawɓe no debbo oo wooɗiri, ngam o ŋarniiɗo masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ sa ko-wan Vasti tɛnɛ nɛ̀ oi mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan, mɛ usi déè kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o gasawi in o dukbíí nɛ̀ mɔi̧a, wen a̧ yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ha̧ wa mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ sa ko-wan Vasti tɛnɛ nɛ̀ oi mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan, mɛ usi déè kɔ̧-a̧ ha̧ o gasawi in o dukbíí nɛ̀ mɔi̧a, wen a̧ yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa geze nda ke hɛ kezha hekake Vasti male ta meghe hɛ kase kwa kema ta mbelia jama le derə meghea nta mbe ghə. Meghe kaɗe kancɛ nda ke mbelia jama le kweci mbeli nyi tagha tsema tsema ndeɗea malea shɛ. Va nya nza nde kendeɗe nda tsape.
Tupurri: Ga aà mo aà le pel wañ de klañ wañ äen ti, ma kañ nen jar äuy, de wañren wo ti wore äe no, werga aà de wore debañ.

Francais: Les eunuques transmirent l’ordre du roi à la reine, mais celle-ci refusa de venir. Le roi fut saisi d’une violente colère.
Anglais: But Queen Vashti refused to come at the king’s command, which was delivered [to her] by the eunuchs. So the king became extremely angry and burned with rage.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May ca-mulda Vasti min tap kuɗ sumun kayni kay tuɗ kat mullaɗi, nala mulla dikam ɓulaka, nam muɗ ɦiy ŋolo.
Bulu: Bekalan élaé be nga kalan abendé njô bôt e be ngal, vʼa nga bene zu. Ajô te njô bôt a nga dañe yôñ a beta ayaa.
Guiziga: Gawla munguɗo ngi buyoy mindilam ti mislin ngi buyo ng'avi maˀãy Vasti, ɓa a ru nga mbuŋ naŋ tuwa na, maˀãy a ngum ta. Akẽh na, buy a ji mevel, a slikiɗ himaˀ fõh fõh haɗa teˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Wasti, debbo laamiiɗo sali ɗowtanaago umroore nde sortaaɓe ngecci mo, o waraay. Ngam maajum ɓernde laamiiɗo metti, o ɓerni masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Wasti, debbo laamiiɗo sali ɗowtanaago umroore nde sortaaɓe ngecci mo, o waraay. Ngam maajum ɓernde laamiiɗo metti, o ɓerni masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ ko-wan Vasti bɛ̧ sara nú o betom nɛ̀ wannu toma'i. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see wannu ɗaŋa, see-aa tu̧u̧ nyɛmna, bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ ko-wan Vasti bɛ̧ sara nú o betom nɛ̀ wannu toma'i. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see wannu ɗaŋa, see-aa tu̧u̧ nyɛmna, bó nɛ́ mɔɔ-tɔ̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka tsewe tsewe gezete nda ghena nya gezeke meghe, ama pa Vasti, male ta meghe ɗema se, pa wənəa meghe bezenyɛ kwele kwele.
Tupurri: Ama Fasti laa dayge age ti waçaçre maga wañ waçaçn wo ne jar ma de ndar äayn wo jag mo gaè. Wañ raw taage go de wañ haçaç äil äe taa wuu go gum.

Francais: Il consulta ses experts, car les affaires royales étaient toujours réglées avec l’aide des spécialistes du droit et des usages.
Anglais: Then the king spoke to the wise men who understood the times [asking for their advice]—for it was the custom of the king  to speak  before all those who were familiar with law and legal matters—
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala mulla job sa yalla sa wi ŋaɓta vi liyna. Kay labara vi mulla co vok nisi kaf sa wi gatta hiɗi sa ɗiger-lawta sa co talamna kafe.
Bulu: Nde a nga kee bebôndé mefeʼe bé ésok, amu beyeme mame ya metiñ a mebelan mbe be mbe be kôme mam me njô bôt éyoñ ése.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, buy a kiɗam slir ar ɓi nah ati buy ngi ɓimujuwahay waɗ ati ngi migi kiitahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o sarwotiri bee dawrooɓe maako annduɓe no goɗɗo huuwrata wakkatiiji fuu, ngam ɗum al'aada laamiiɗo o sarwotira haala fuu bee annduɓe umrooje e kiita.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o sarwotiri bee dawrooɓe maako annduɓe no goɗɗo huuwrata wakkatiiji fuu, ngam ɗum al'aada laamiiɗo o sarwotira haala fuu bee annduɓe umrooje e kiita.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu mɔ‘i, a̧ saa o wan-ba-keta zu o heembea in yuwar duka-a ko o bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa, ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu mɔ‘i, a̧ saa o wan-ba-keta zu o heembea in yuwar duka-a ko o bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa, ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ tɛ mɔ‘i ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe fakɛ ghena va ka ncɛ nda ntsehwele nyi yite, kwa nza ŋkɛ tsagha seneve meghe kanewe ghena le mbeli nyi te ghəa slene kaba, mbeli nyi keɗepemte ghena ta nza le wəshi nyi mene mbeli ghalanza.
Tupurri: Wañ kal wii jar ma de ko reen wo, jar ko ngeel ma pel wo no. Werga aè hay äod faare waçaçre mani wañn wo na diñ do sen nono, pel jar maga wo de ko wer jag liñgi wo de waçaçre ma de deele wo mono.

Francais: Parmi ces conseillers les plus proches du roi se trouvaient Karchena, Chétar, Admata, Tarsis, Mérès, Marsena et Memoukan, sept hauts fonctionnaires de Perse et de Médie  ; ils avaient la confiance du roi et occupaient les postes les plus élevés de l’empire.
Anglais: and who were close to him [as advisors]: Carshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena, and Memucan, the seven officials of Persia and Media who had access to the king and were ranked highest in the kingdom.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ay kat mulla kayni: Karsena, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena, Memukan, sa yerimana vi Persiya hiɗi Mediya sa siɗiyana, sa hatay hiɗi mulla, sa lakay hay liyn ma vokŋa hay mulda.
Bulu: Bebôndé mefek be nga dañe njô bôte bebé be mbe môé na: Karkena, Kétar, Admata, Tarsis, Mévés, Marsena a Memukan, biwôlô bebo bisaé bi njô bôt zamgbwale ya Perse a Médi bi mbie bia dañ nkôñ yôp éjôé ése.
Guiziga: I ti: Karsena, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena waɗ Memukaŋ, mizli migweˀ gweˀ ngi vaˀahay, a wuzla muvula kuti da naŋ buyo. Yo mizli madiɗa ngi slra naŋhay mitarnaˀ misi a Perse waɗ a Medi. Mizli tayna gar na, i mizli ngi si mevel ngi buyoy, yo i mizli madiɗa ngi mbuŋhoy ar zuma buy ngi Zersese.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa inɗe dawrooɓe maako ɓurɓe ɓadaago mo: Karsena e Setar e Adamata e Tarsis e Meres e Marsena e Memukan, mawɓe Persiya e Mediya njoweeɗiɗo, hoolaaɓe laamiiɗo, marɓe joole ɓurɗe teddugo nder laamu maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa inɗe dawrooɓe maako ɓurɓe ɓadaago mo: Karsena e Setar e Adamata e Tarsis e Meres e Marsena e Memukan, mawɓe Persiya e Mediya njoweeɗiɗo, hoolaaɓe laamiiɗo, marɓe joole ɓurɗe teddugo nder laamu maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma gasawi mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ko o bíí Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ yaa so katɛ wannu nɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Karsɛna, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Mɛrɛs, Marsena, ká bá nɛ̀ Mɛmukan. O wi nɔ‘i a̧a̧ so mgbara o  kuti-wi  nù‘i; wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ hɔ ti wannu mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma gasawi mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo ko o bíí Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ yaa so katɛ wannu nɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Karsɛna, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Mɛrɛs, Marsena, ká bá nɛ̀ Mɛmukan. O wi nɔ‘i a̧a̧ so mgbara o  kuti-wi  nù‘i; wa a̧a̧ nɛ̀ ŋgai mɛ hɔ ti wannu mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa mbeli nyi kencɛ nda ntsehwele ke meghe yɛ Karshena le Shɛtar le Admata le Tarsis le Mɛrɛs, Marsena le Meməwkan, nyi jama jama te hɛɗia ka Pɛrse le ka Mɛdi, mberefaŋe nyi nza kwa ghate ta ŋkwa va hɛ kadzeyitea meghe. Kagezleŋe ghə meghe va hɛ we, vatse nza ŋkwa nyi jama jama va hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar maga wo ti jeñ äe ni diñ: Karsema, Setar, Admata, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena, Memukan, wañre Perse wo de mede wo renam maga hay wo ko nen wañ. AÀ wo diñ jar ma pel taw ti wañ tu diñ saara.

Francais: Le roi leur dit : « Moi, le roi, j’ai envoyé mes eunuques donner un ordre à la reine Vasti et elle n’y a pas obéi. D’après la loi, quelle peine faut-il lui appliquer ? »
Anglais: [He said,] “According to the law, what is to be done with Queen Vashti because she did not obey the command of King Ahasuerus  which was conveyed  by the eunuchs?”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di tisiya: Nan cuk sa patayna kat ca-mulda Vasti, may na' min hum dita vanɗi, gatta as di mige ka'a?
Bulu: Njô bôt a nga jô be na: Ma, njô bôt, ma te lôme bekalan élaé bame na be kate Vasti nga njô bôt abendé dam, ve a nji bo de mewôk. Avalʼane metiñ ma jô, za melebe ma yiane nye?
Guiziga: Buy a ɓa mupura wurzlaŋhaya: «Ya buy Zersese, i slina mizli munguɗo ɗuwoy ng'avi maˀãy Vasti na, hã i kutukokoŋ, ko a ciniy mi ta. Ɓimujuwa a ɓi mbri vurˀe ka?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo ƴami ɓe: “Fodde umrooje men, ɗume mbaɗeten debbo am Wasti mo ɗowtanaaki wolde am nde sortaaɓe ngecci ɗum?”
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo ƴami ɓe: “Fodde umrooje men, ɗume mbaɗeten debbo am Wasti mo ɗowtanaaki wolde am nde sortaaɓe ngecci ɗum?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu aka wa: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ko-wan Vasti mbo zu tɛ saa-sara ko wannu nɛ̀ toma nɛ̀ o kpàná kɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ na ga’ɛ, nɛ́ ge a'i tɛ de in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea ko nù k’ɛɛ ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu aka wa: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ ko-wan Vasti mbo zu tɛ saa-sara ko wannu nɛ̀ toma nɛ̀ o kpàná kɔ‘i nɛnɛ ha̧ a̧ na ga’ɛ, nɛ́ ge a'i tɛ de in a̧ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea ko nù k’ɛɛ ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe sha hɛ: «Wa ghwə nya meha nda mə ke Vasti, male ta ɗa kwa ɗema nde yɛ ghena nya gezete nda mbeli nyi ghwenakɛ nda 'ya wa?»
Tupurri: Wañ day so ga, aè joñ ge joñre diñ de jag liñgi ma hon ti waçywañ Fasti mo ne, ti maga wañ Asuyerus laa jar ma bay äayn wo wiigi äe day se laa dayge nduugi gaa mono?

Francais: Memoukan déclara alors au roi et à ses hauts fonctionnaires : « La reine Vasti a fort mal agi non seulement à l’égard du roi, mais aussi à l’égard de ses hauts fonctionnaires et même de tous les hommes qui vivent dans les différentes provinces de l’empire.
Anglais: And Memucan answered in the presence of the king and the officials, “Vashti the queen has not only wronged the king but [also] all the officials (royal representatives) and all the peoples who are in all the provinces of King Ahasuerus.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Memukan di vok mulla hiɗi sa yeriman kaf ala: Van kayni ca-mulda Vasti may lum kayn kat mulla kepɗi, may kat sa yerimana hiɗi sumun sa hay nagata ta kuɗaŋ naŋ mulla Asuwerus kaf.
Bulu: Ajô te Memukan a nga jô njô bôt a biwôlô bebo bisaé na: Vasti, nga njô bôt a te foʼo bo mbia jam, sa ve mfaʼa njô bôt étam, ve nalé fe mfaʼa biwôlô bebo bisaé bé, jaʼane fe mfaʼa befam bese be too mebôta me si ya éjôé ése.
Guiziga: Memukaŋ a ɓi njah a mbuŋ buyo waɗ a mbuŋ mizli madiɗa ngi slraˀahaya: «Maˀay Vasti miga gwat malambaˀ hana na, da ka buy tewle ta, amma kite a ga da mizli madiɗa ngi slra ngi buyoy gar waɗ da mizli mitaˀ ngir li ngi buyoy gar, buy Zerses miwa taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Memukan jaabi laamiiɗo e mawɓe: “Wasti, debbo laamiiɗo waɗi kalluɗum, naa dow laamiiɗo tan, ammaa dow mawɓe e ummaatooje nder lesɗe laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Memukan jaabi laamiiɗo e mawɓe: “Wasti, debbo laamiiɗo waɗi kalluɗum, naa dow laamiiɗo tan, ammaa dow mawɓe e ummaatooje nder lesɗe laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛmukan kifa nú ti wannu in o gasawi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Bo nɛ Vasti ee nɛ́ wannu ɛ̀nɛ̀-wi tɛ geemɔ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee nɛ́ o gasawi in dukbíí tɛ o zika-nù k’ɛɛ lɛŋ tɛ geemɔ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛmukan kifa nú ti wannu in o gasawi, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Bo nɛ Vasti ee nɛ́ wannu ɛ̀nɛ̀-wi tɛ geemɔ na, ɓɛɛ a̧ ee nɛ́ o gasawi in dukbíí tɛ o zika-nù k’ɛɛ lɛŋ tɛ geemɔ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Meməwkan kwa kema ta meghe le ka mene slene nyi jama jama: «Nahe Vasti, male ta meghe kebezemte ghena kwele kwele, deke ke meghe we, ama ke ka mene slene ta ŋkɛ nyi jama jama ba'a ke mbeli nyi kenza te yayata sla ta hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Menukan kal mañ waçaçre pel wañ, pel wañren wo gana: waçywañ Fasti joñ do kay no mo haç' bay diñ see wañ tawa wa. Fen maga aà joñn mokay aà joñn diñ see wañren wo, de jar sir mani wañ Asuyerus maga wo go ti coçoç sirn mo äuy no.

Francais: En effet, toutes les femmes vont apprendre le comportement de la reine et elles se mettront à mépriser l’autorité de leurs maris. Elles se justifieront en disant : “Le roi avait ordonné qu’on lui amène la reine Vasti et celle-ci a refusé de venir !”
Anglais: For the queen’s conduct will become known to all women, causing them to look on their husbands with contempt (disrespect), since they will say, ‘King Ahasuerus commanded Queen Vashti to be brought before him, but she did not come.’
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay ŋel-vunda vi ca-mulda kayni ma kal hay humda vi boyna kaf, kayni ma vulsi donota kay miyes jufaysiya, hay li ma nisi ma hum labara ala Asuwerus vul hagata tam Vasti kay co talamu, may na' min coɗi.
Bulu: Bebela a ne na, e binga bese ba ye nyoñe foé ya mboone nga njô bôt wu ba ye taté fe na ba biasé e ngule beyôme bap. Ba ye kale bebien be jôʼô na: Njô bôt a nga bendé na be zuu nye Vasti nga njô bôt, ve a nga bene zu!
Guiziga: Asi mike na, kpak ngi maˀãy Vasti vuna a sa tiɓa ngwasaya gar. Ngwasay a sa lumam gidaŋ, a hirsaka zil taŋhaya, a sa ɓam: ‹Buy Zerses mizila ngwas naŋ maˀãy Vasti, ɓa aru nga mbuŋ naŋ zleˀe na, a ngum ta takwa.›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam rewɓe fuu anndan ko o waɗi, ɓe njawoto worɓe maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'a: Laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus umri waddugo debbo mum Wasti yeeso muuɗum, ammaa o waraay.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam rewɓe fuu anndan ko o waɗi, ɓe njawoto worɓe maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'a: Laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus umri waddugo debbo mum Wasti yeeso muuɗum, ammaa o waraay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O okoo lɛŋ tɛ zii nyɛrɛmɔ nɛ̀ kóò ko wannu dea'i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ e o wíì kɔ-wa mbɛt tɛ geemɔ. Wa tɛ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Wannu Zɛrzɛs baa tom so sa ko-wan Vasti, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧.›
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O okoo lɛŋ tɛ zii nyɛrɛmɔ nɛ̀ kóò ko wannu dea'i, ɓɛɛ wa tɛ e o wíì kɔ-wa mbɛt tɛ geemɔ. Wa tɛ ya tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: ‹Wannu Zɛrzɛs baa tom so sa ko-wan Vasti, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧.›
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza nde pɛtɛ teɗepe wəsə nya menete nya nde mi, katehawe hɛ va zhilia nci we. Ma tegeze hɛ: ‹pa meghe nya wəba geze nda ke mbelia ŋkɛ kaheka Vasti kase kwa kema ta ŋkɛ ne, ama pa ɗema se!›
Tupurri: Werga waçaçre mani waçywañn mokay raw ge yañ, day naare laan ge wo yañ go äuy, day se kañ ge wer äaara yañ äuy mbuë fo werpiiri äaara wo. Naare ya' ge wo la ga, wañ Asuyerus hay wii waçy äe Fasti la ga aà mo aà le pel se, day se day gaa äaa yaw so lay no.

Francais: Aujourd’hui même, les épouses des hauts fonctionnaires de Perse et de Médie vont être au courant de la conduite de la reine, elles se permettront de répliquer à leurs maris et le mépris des femmes suscitera la colère des hommes.
Anglais: This [very] day the ladies of Persia and Media who have heard of the queen’s refusal will speak [in the same way] to all the king’s officials, and there will be plenty of contempt and anger.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayni boyna vi yerimana sa hay Persiya hiɗi Mediya, hay li ma nisi hum ŋel-vunda vi ca-muldawa, nisi ma li ki kayn nala kaw kat sa yerimana sa hay mulda visiya: Ki kayn nala miyesta hiɗi panta ma li ɗawn ŋolo.
Bulu: Den émiene nyô, beyale biwôlô bebo bisaé ya Perse a Médi ba ye wôʼôtane mboone nga njô bôt a ve bebiene nguleya fetane beyôme bap, a ébiasé binga ja ye dutu ayaa befam.
Guiziga: Ngwas ngi mizli madiɗa ngi slra ngi buyoy misi a Perse ati Medi gar na, ara cinaka maɓaka ɓi ngi kpak ngi maˀãy Vasti na. Zle dana, ngwas ngi mizli madiɗa ngi slra ngi buyoyo kwana, taŋ gar, a sa mbiɗaka mi da zil taŋhaya zuy muduba takwa! Taŋ masa hirsaka zil taŋhay tuwa na, hã a sa slikiɗa mevel da mizli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hannde rewɓe mawɓe nder Persiya e Mediya, nanɓe ko debbo laamiiɗo waɗi, mbi'an worɓe maɓɓe fuu bana non, yawaare e tikkere ɗuuɗan.
Fulfulde_DC: Hannde rewɓe mawɓe nder Persiya e Mediya, nanɓe ko debbo laamiiɗo waɗi, mbi'an worɓe maɓɓe fuu bana non, yawaare e tikkere ɗuuɗan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i yak nɛnɛ, o kóò ko o gasawi nù Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ kóò ko wannu dea'i, tɛ de ŋgazu in o gasawi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ee wíì kɔ-wa tɛ geemɔ; hegɔ mɔ‘i tɛ aŋ nɛ́ nyimsea ko o wiwii a ŋgɔn.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i yak nɛnɛ, o kóò ko o gasawi nù Pɛrsɛ in Mɛdɛ nɛ̀ zia nyɛrɛ mɔ nɛ̀ kóò ko wannu dea'i, tɛ de ŋgazu in o gasawi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ ee wíì kɔ-wa tɛ geemɔ; hegɔ mɔ‘i tɛ aŋ nɛ́ nyimsea ko o wiwii a ŋgɔn.

Tupurri: Wursen mokay wañre ma Persen wo de ma Meden wo, maga laa ge wo fen maga waçywañ joñn mono, ya' ge wo waçaçge äe ne wañre mani wañn wo äuy. Ti ngeel sen mokay mbuëgi fo wo de ceege jag jiili joñ ge wo yañ ge.

Francais: Si sa Majesté le roi le juge bon, qu’il veuille promulguer un décret interdisant pour toujours à Vasti de se présenter devant lui et attribuant le titre de reine à une femme qui en sera plus digne qu’elle. Ce décret royal devra figurer parmi les lois de Perse et de Médie qu’on ne peut pas annuler.
Anglais: If it pleases the king, let a royal command be issued by him and let it be written in the laws of the Persians and Medes so that it cannot be repealed  or  modified, that Vashti is  no longer to come before King Ahasuerus; and let the king give her royal position to another who is better  and  more worthy than she.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla, la van kayni kiraŋ ŋaa'a, dita vaŋu ma siwelis goyo, dita ta as mu'ɗi, na' ma liys ɗoy gaa hay gatta vi Persiya hiɗi Mediya, ala Vasti ma col vokaŋ naŋ mulla Asuwerus loɗi, a naŋ ma yaw mulda va' goyo, vula' mi cat kep jar boy sa kuɗa'na, ta ŋaa'a suwa' na'a.
Bulu: Ajô te nge njô bôt a yene nalé mvaé, ô mialane foé ntyiʼane wo ve Vasti mvinda nnôm éto ya bo te beta tebe njô bôte mis, a wo ve minga mfe a yian éto nga njô bôt. Ntyiʼane te wo yiane nyiin e metiñe ya Perse a Médi été mme môt a se nguleya tyam.
Guiziga: Ani so na buy, da ki hĩyã le na, anja ki ɗuv ɓi waɗ toh toh ar ɗerewol ɓimuɗuva ngi buy Perse ati ngi Medi, ɓimujuwa le kaŋ kaŋ maɓi: ‹Maˀay Vasti anta a sa so a mbuŋ ka buy Zersese mata ndiɗaˀ wãˀ, yo slimiɗ naŋ maˀãy na, anja a caka da a cil naŋ mekelem mifineˀ naŋ vuna.›
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To ɗum fottani ma, barkaama, waɗ umroore, nde winnde nder umrooje Persiya'en e Mediya'en ngam taa nde waylo. Nde wi'a: Taa Wasti meeta waŋgugo yeeso laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus, laamiiɗo tammi hokkugo tedduŋgal maako haa debbo feere, ɓuranɗo mo wooɗugo.

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà wannu nɛ kɔ̧a̧, a̧ a̧ há̧ nú ha̧ wa mɛ yɔr mɔ zaŋ heembea ko Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ nɛ̀‘i beka kpai na mɛ tɔ̧‘e: ‹Vasti beka pii ɗoŋ tɛ wannu mɛ duk ko-wan ɓɔna, ɓɛɛ wannu tɛ ba nɛ́ ŋma mbe kóò nɛ̀ dee gan a̧ e oi-aa.›
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kenza nde kaɗe na gɛ meghe yawe, gezete ghena kezha fɛa Vasti kedzawa kema ta ŋa kaghala ghala. Zhɛne ne, ndeke nda ŋkwa nta ke kwete male nya za ma ke ghenta. Katerafe ghena ta meghea shɛ mbeli mbe wəshi mahalegəa hɛɗia Pɛrse le ŋa Mɛdi, katezhɛremte geva ghena shɛ we.
Tupurri: Hayga wañ da' sen mokay yañ de el no, daga dus waçaçre go ti jag wañ. Waçaçre sen mokay yern yoo jag liñgi ma Persen wo de ma Mede no, dig jar go ga, jobo mo cegaën go wa. Waçaçre ma ti jag wañn joñ ge mokay diñ ga, Fasti a ge wurpo pel wañ Asuyerus gaa so hase, day wañ haç ge ëu waçywañn go diñ ne waçy ma tigriñ maga de kaçaçge de el dedañge äe mono.

Francais: Lorsque cette décision sera connue dans toutes les parties de l’immense empire, chaque femme aura des égards pour son mari, qu’il soit important ou modeste. »
Anglais: So when the king’s great decree is proclaimed throughout his [extensive] kingdom, all women will give honor to their husbands, from the great to the insignificant.”

Francais: L’idée plut au roi et à ses hauts fonctionnaires, et le roi suivit le conseil de Memoukan.
Anglais: This statement (advice) pleased the king and the officials, and the king did what Memucan proposed.

Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haala man fottani laamiiɗo e mawɓe, laamiiɗo waɗi ko Memukan sarwini mo.

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen'i dee tɛ wannu in o gasawi kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ndak ɗoŋ wen ko Mɛmukan'i.

Francais: Il fit envoyer dans toutes les provinces des lettres rédigées selon le système d’écriture et dans la langue des peuples qui y vivaient. Elles disaient que tout homme doit être maître dans sa maison et y imposer l’usage de sa langue maternelle .
Anglais: So he sent letters to all the royal provinces, to each province in its own script and to each people in their own language, saying that every man should be the master  and  rule in his own home and that  he should speak [in the household] in the language of his own people.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam gi ɗerwelda goy tam nagata ta kuɗumta kaf, tam nagata tarige kaw nam ɗo tisiya hiɗi ɗota visiya hiɗi vunna visiya, ala juf gigekaw ma li mi ma ŋolla vi ziyna valamu, nam ma lawam mi vunna vi jafna valamu kaw.
Bulu: Nde a nga lôme bekalate e mebôta me si mese, avalʼane ntilan a nkobô bôt ba nyiñ été bi né. Bekalate bete be nga yemete fam ése na é boʼo njôô ya nda bôte jé, é boʼo fe na bôt be kobô nkobô be nga bialane wô.
Guiziga: A slin ti letirey nga ruwuy naŋ mazum buy anga cek, angi li ngi buy naŋhay miwaka taŋ. Li ngi buy miwa gar na, a slina taŋ letire ka toho gwat taŋ, yo ti mi taŋ maɓam di asi ruwuy taŋ na ya. Nah gar na, ɓa mbur gar a ndir i buy a wazlaray naŋ, yo ɓa a ɓi ti mi miyakaŋ cak ti naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O neldi bataakeeji nder lesɗe maako fuu – haa lesdi koo ndiye bee binndol mum e ummaatoore koo ndeye bee wolde mum – ngam haa gorko fuu tabita o jawmu saare maako, o wolwa boo wolde maako.

Francais: Quelque temps après, lorsque la colère du roi Xerxès se fut calmée, il réfléchit à ce que Vasti avait fait et à la décision prise contre elle.
Anglais: After these things, when the wrath of King Ahasuerus (Xerxes) had subsided, he remembered Vashti and what she had done and what had been decreed against her.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol slen kayni, ɦiyda vi mulla Asuwerus tun gaa'a. Humam gum kay Vasti, kay sle ma na' lumna, hiɗi varta ta nam var kay li ta'a.
Bulu: Eyoñe mam mete me maneya, nleme njô bôt Asuérus ô nga voé. Nde a simesane Vasti, e jam a nga bo a ntyiʼan ô nga nyoñeban ajô dé.
Guiziga: A dirba ɓi tayna mucohom na, buy Zerses a tisla mevele le muduba. Dar a zla a wulka ɓi ngi Vasti keŋ, gwat naŋ miga ati ɓi taŋ majuwaka a mevel taŋ vurˀe zleˀe tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man, nde ɓernde laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus feewti, o siftori ko Wasti waɗi e ko ta'aama dow maako boo.

Tupurri: Ti ngeel sen jar maga wo ti peele ne wañ kal wo ga: Daga kië mayre tigliiri ma de wore maga bay wo de woge see jobo wa ëa le ne wañ.

Francais: Nomme donc dans toutes les provinces de l’empire des fonctionnaires chargés d’amener les jeunes filles spécialement belles au harem royal de la citadelle de Suse . Hégué, l’eunuque responsable du harem, en prendra soin et leur fournira des produits de beauté.
Anglais: Let the king appoint administrators in all the provinces of his kingdom, and have them gather all the beautiful young virgins to the citadel in Susa, into the harem, under the custody of Hegai, the king’s eunuch, who is in charge of the women; and let their beauty preparations be given  to them .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa li lopna hay nagata ta kuɗ mulda vaŋ kafna ma tok guro-boy sa jifiyna sa bay bur tam sa tuwa, marsi hay liyn ma lak boyna, hay Susa naga ŋolda, lakay kuɗ ŋomda vi Hegay, sa ma patayna vi mulla, ma ŋom boyna, vulsi slen ma muz-tuwna kaw.
Bulu: Ajô te njô bôt a ntoo ve telé bôt e mebôta mesi mese yʼéjôé jé, be bo ésaé ya zuu bengo be binga bese ba dañ abeñ e nda jé é ne e Suz, Egué, mbaʼale binga ya nda njô bôt a ye baʼale be a ve be mimbone mi nyanga.
Guiziga: Anja buy a wini mizli angi hirwuy naŋ mazum buy anga gar, ar li misi buy miwi lihey anga. A vula taŋ slra ɓa a soko ti ziri diili mungbuˀ ngbuˀhoy aruŋ, misi hiri a ɗuv avu taŋ ta. A soko taŋ nga Sus, walahay naŋ hirnga, yo ng'ar hay ngi ngwasay a mbuŋ Hege, mbur munguɗo mijigina ngwasay a hay buyo. Dar a vulaka taŋ mal mezlehey ngi wucuɗa vu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jo'in hakkilooɓe nder lesɗe maaɗa fuu, barkaama, ngam ɓe mooɓta faanyɓe ŋarniiɓe ɓe meeɗaay gorko. Ɓe ngadda ɓe haa laamorde Suuza nder suudu rewɓe halfitinaandu Hegay, cortaaɗo laamiiɗo, saraakiijo aynoowo rewɓe. Kaŋko o hokka ɓe haaje maɓɓe ngam fawnaago.
Fulfulde_DC: Jo'in hakkilooɓe nder lesɗe maaɗa fuu, barkaama, ngam ɓe mooɓta faanyɓe ŋarniiɓe ɓe meeɗaay gorko. Ɓe ngadda ɓe haa laamorde Suuza nder suudu rewɓe halfitinaandu Hegay, cortaaɗo laamiiɗo, saraakiijo aynoowo rewɓe. Kaŋko o hokka ɓe haaje maɓɓe ngam fawnaago.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu a̧ hók o bíí dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù tɛ wan kɔ‘i lɛŋ, mɛ kii o be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ wiwii na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ yora zɔŋa nyɛmna, ha̧ mgbɔ wa si fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu. Wa a̧ yá ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko Ege, kpàná-pɛm o kóò ko wannu sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ; ɓɛɛ a'i há̧ gba de nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu a̧ hók o bíí dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù tɛ wan kɔ‘i lɛŋ, mɛ kii o be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ iŋ wiwii na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ yora zɔŋa nyɛmna, ha̧ mgbɔ wa si fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu. Wa a̧ yá ɗɔɔ ŋgai ko Ege, kpàná-pɛm o kóò ko wannu sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ; ɓɛɛ a'i há̧ gba de nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Meghe, nteyi mbeli te pɛtɛa sla ta hɛɗi nyi te hɛɗi meghea ŋa katsene ŋwalea kwɛ nyi keghama le zhili ba'a nyi ndeɗe ndeɗe kase teke mbe Səze, meleme nya berete, kave hɛ mbe ghɛa mi, mbe dzeve ta Hɛgɛ nya ketsewe tsewe nya nza ghɛa mi te dzeve ve, katenewe ghweme ŋkɛ te hɛ ba'a katefə nda wəshi kepesa geva ŋkɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Daga wañ mo lag jar ma joñge diñ joñre sen tawa wo go ti ngeel maga wañ äen ni mo äuy, maga aà mo tay wo ti tigliiri maga wo de wore wora. Nduu de äaara Sus ti meene sir no, ti tiñ maga naare wo ni, ne Hege je ma de ndar äay maga de gor ti naare mani wañn wo mono. AÀ haç ge feçeçre maga wo de el ma yog see äaara yañ ne hara.

Francais: La jeune fille qui aura ta préférence deviendra reine à la place de Vasti. » La proposition plut au roi et il l’accepta.
Anglais: Then let the young woman who pleases the king be queen in place of Vashti.” This pleased the king, and he did accordingly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goot-cata ta ir mulla va'ta ma ti mulda hay baŋal Vasti. Dita kayni firi dik mulla, nam li ki kayn nala.
Bulu: Ngone minga njô bôt a ye nyeʼe nje ja ye bo nga njô bôt, éjiane Vasti. Ane njô bôt a nga nyeʼe feʼ éte, a kañese je, ane e nga bo nalé.
Guiziga: Zuŋ diili misa cira hiri le da buyo na, a sa tiri maˀãy ar li ngi Vasti.» Buy a hĩyã ɓi nah le, dar a ga kanah so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Paanyo pottananɗo ma, barkaama, laato debbo maaɗa haa pellel Wasti.” Haala man fottani laamiiɗo, o waɗi bana non.
Fulfulde_DC: Paanyo pottananɗo ma, barkaama, laato debbo maaɗa haa pellel Wasti.” Haala man fottani laamiiɗo, o waɗi bana non.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ de tɛ wannu nyɛmna'i tɛ duk ko-wan oi Vasti.» Taamɔ‘i dee tɛ wannu nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ de hegɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ be-zɔŋa nɛ̀ tɛ de tɛ wannu nyɛmna'i tɛ duk ko-wan oi Vasti.» Taamɔ‘i dee tɛ wannu nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ de hegɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəzha nya ɗehwe meghe hwa hɛ ne, pa nde kamale ta meghe te ŋkwa Vasti.» Zeɗehwe nda ghena shɛ ke meghe, pa ŋkɛ menete tsagha shɛ.
Tupurri: Day may maga woo ge we nen wañ no, joñ ge diñ waçywañ ti ngeel Fasti. Waçaçre sen mokay la wañ kal yiñ jag ti äe, day kal joñ ge dosen nono.

Francais: Un Juif nommé Mardochée vivait dans la citadelle de Suse. Il était fils de Yaïr, descendant de Chiméi et de Quich  et originaire de la tribu de Benjamin.
Anglais: There was a certain Jew in the citadel of Susa whose name was Mordecai the son of Jair, the son of Shimei, the son of Kish, a Benjamite,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta sa mara kepe ay hay Susa, nagata ŋolda, semda valam ala Mardose, namu mi goora vi Yayir, goora vi Simey, goora vi Kis, hay jaf Benyamin.
Bulu: Mone Beyude éziñ a nga too e nlô tison ba loone Suz jôé na Mardôsé, e mone Yahir, e mone Shimeyi, e mone Kis ya mvôʼô Bényamin,
Guiziga: Mbur Yude ada, a zilaka Mardoke. Naŋ a Sus, walahay hirnga. Mardoke i mangal ngi Yaˀir, dideˀ ngi Simey, yo i dideˀ mukutur ti kutur ngi Kis, angi tizer ngi Benjameŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi goɗɗo Yahuuduujo nder laamorde Suuza, innde muuɗum Mardokay ɓii Ya'ir ɓii Sim'i ɓii Kis, mo lenyol Benyamin.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi goɗɗo Yahuuduujo nder laamorde Suuza, innde muuɗum Mardokay ɓii Ya'ir ɓii Sim'i ɓii Kis, mo lenyol Benyamin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Le kwete nde Zhəwif shɛ mbe ŋkwa nya berete mbe Səze, nya nza sləa ŋkɛ kaMardoshɛ, wəzege ta Yayir, hwelefe ta Shimɛyi ba'a Kish, kwa yita ta Bɛnjamɛn.
Tupurri: Blo po yañ ti meene sirn Sus ni, aà ëen ga Mardoke, aà diñ weel ma Yayir, weel ma Semay, weel ma Kis, ti wer mani Benjame no.

Francais: Il faisait partie du groupe de déportés que Nabucodonosor, roi de Babylone, avait emmenés en exil de Jérusalem en même temps que Yekonia, roi de Juda .
Anglais: who had been deported from Jerusalem with the captives who had been exiled with Jeconiah king of Judah, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had exiled.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ay jar sum sa Nebukadnesar mulla vi Babilon yawsiyays gorvona, sa yawsi hiɗi Yekoniya mulla vi Yudana.
Bulu: a mbe wua ya nsamba bôte Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga bi Yérusalém a zuu wô minkôm ba be Yékônia, njô bôte ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor, buy ngi Babiloŋ mija mizli baɗ ti Zeruzalem jom ti Yekoniya, buy Zuda nga Babiloŋ na, naɓa Mardoke vuna naŋ da a wuzla taŋ ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O gooto caka dahaaɓe  ɓe Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila dahino diga Urusaliima hawtaade bee Yekoniya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda .
Fulfulde_DC: O gooto caka dahaaɓe  ɓe Nabukodonosor laamiiɗo Baabila dahino diga Urusaliima hawtaade bee Yekoniya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Same kwa Zhɛrəzalɛm ŋkɛ hwa mbeli nyi keseke hɛ Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone zlaɓe le Yekoniya, meghea ka Zhəwda kadzeme Babilone.
Tupurri: AÈ hay baan le Jerusalem yoo jar maga aè hoo ra wer wañ Jekoniya, wañ Juda mono. Hay hoo ra le diñ Nebukanetsar wañ Babilone.

Francais: Mardochée avait adopté sa cousine Hadassa, qu’on appelait Esther . La jeune fille avait perdu ses parents et, depuis leur mort, Mardochée l’élevait. Son corps était splendide et sa beauté remarquable.
Anglais: He was the guardian of  Hadassah, that is Esther, his uncle’s daughter, for she had no father or mother. The young woman was beautiful of form and  face; and when her father and mother died, Mordecai took her in as his own daughter.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ka wul Hadasa ta ya' Ester, na' ti goota vi nasulumu. Bu'a hiɗi su'a mitiya. Goot-cat na'ta jifiy ŋolo. Hay mitta vi bu'a hiɗi su'a, nam va'a kay wula'a.
Bulu: Mardôsé a nga nyoñ a yale Adasa, a mbe jôé afe na Esthe, mona ndômenyañ, a nga baʼale nye ane mone wé mvus awu bebiaé bé. Esthe a mbe étua abeñ.
Guiziga: Dambalaka na, Mardoke vuna a gil jamba naŋ le, a zilaka Hadasa waɗ Ester ma. Asi Estere, cine ati mumuŋ a micam le. Zuŋ diili Estere, dumvu naŋ a wucuɗ ngilew ngilew, yo hiri a ɗuv ava ta wãˀ. A dirba miyi naŋhay mumicam na, i Mardoke migilaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hadassa, bi'eteeɗo boo Asta, o atiimeejo o walaa baaba e daada. Nde baaba maako e daada maako maayi, Mardokay hoosi mo bana ɓiŋngel muuɗum, mawnini mo. Asta, o ɓii bappa Mardokay, o paanyo ŋarniiɗo masin, ɗelka-ɓannduujo.
Fulfulde_DC: Hadassa, bi'eteeɗo boo Asta, o atiimeejo o walaa baaba e daada. Nde baaba maako e daada maako maayi, Mardokay hoosi mo bana ɓiŋngel muuɗum, mawnini mo. Asta, o ɓii bappa Mardokay, o paanyo ŋarniiɗo masin, ɗelka-ɓannduujo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Mardochee a̧ duka so dai Adasa nɛ̀ wa sa'e Ɛstɛr, bem ko nya dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Dáà in nàà ko Ɛstɛr fee so kɔ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ fio kɔ-wa a̧ Mardochee baa nɛ̀ a̧ hee bem kɔ‘i ga. Boko-bem’ɛi yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna, saŋa-yí-a dee so nyɛmna mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ Mardochee a̧ duka so dai Adasa nɛ̀ wa sa'e Ɛstɛr, bem ko nya dáà kɔ̧-a̧. Dáà in nàà ko Ɛstɛr fee so kɔ‘i kaɗi, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ fio kɔ-wa a̧ Mardochee baa nɛ̀ a̧ hee bem kɔ‘i ga. Boko-bem’ɛi yora so zɔŋa nyɛmna, saŋa-yí-a dee so nyɛmna mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Mardoshɛ nde dəkwəte Hadasa, geze ta ŋkɛ Ɛstɛr. Wəzha ta wəza meghekɛ nya kwele, kwa nza nde nahe yɛ yitenyɛ le meghekɛ kempənji, kendeɗe nda nde tsape.
Tupurri: AÀ geçeç Hadasa, ga diñ Ester may pan äe, werga pan äe bay wa lay, man äe bay wa lay. May sen hay geçeç diñ geçeçre may tiglin tu, day hay woo nen lay. De huli pan äe wo de man äe mono, Mardoke mañ ne, day geçeçn go do may äe nono.

Francais: Lorsque le décret royal fut publié, de nombreuses jeunes filles furent rassemblées à la citadelle de Suse. Esther se trouvait parmi elles ; elle fut conduite comme les autres au palais royal et placée sous l’autorité de Hégué, le responsable du harem.
Anglais: So it came about when the king’s command and his decree were proclaimed and when many young women were gathered together in the citadel of Susa into the custody of Hegai, that Esther was taken to the king’s palace [and placed] in the custody of Hegai, who was in charge of the women.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma dita vi mulla hiɗi ɗota valamu vul goy tam sumun kayni, guro-boyn ŋolo tokay hay Susa, nagata ŋolda, Hegay ka ŋomsiya. Ester kaw nisi mara' hay ziyna vi mulla, hay ŋomda vi Hegay sa ma ŋom boyna.
Bulu: Eyoñ atiñe njô bôt e kuiya, be nga sulan abui bengo be binga e tisone Suz, Esthe a too wua yʼété, be nga kee nye nda njô bôt ane bengo be binga bevok, Egué, mbaʼale binga a baʼale nye.
Guiziga: Ɓi ngi buy miɓa ati ɓi naŋ ɓi micica, yo ɓi ngi hila ziri diilihey haɗa nga mbuŋ Hege, a Sus, walahay hirnga tuwa, a tilam di mi le, slra nah a gi le. Hege, mbur mijigina ngwasay a hay buyo a pula jiviɗ, ɓa a ram ti Estere ngi hay buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde laamiiɗo anndini umroore muuɗum, hakkilooɓe boo mooɓti faanyɓe ɗuuɗɓe haa laamorde Suuza, halfini ɓe haa Hegay, aynoowo rewɓe. Ɓe ngaddi Asta boo nder saare laamiiɗo haa o ayna mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde laamiiɗo anndini umroore muuɗum, hakkilooɓe boo mooɓti faanyɓe ɗuuɗɓe haa laamorde Suuza, halfini ɓe haa Hegay, aynoowo rewɓe. Ɓe ngaddi Asta boo nder saare laamiiɗo haa o ayna mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa toma heembea ko wannu dam fara lɛŋ kaɗi, wa mɔi̧a o gba dùk be-zɔŋa si ŋgárá Suzɛ, ɓɛɛ wa e Ege zu wa. Hegɔ, wa mgbɔɔ Ɛstɛr si kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu hee o dɔka-a ga ha̧ Ege, wi-pɛm-okoo mɛ zɔk a̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ nɛ̀ wa toma heembea ko wannu dam fara lɛŋ kaɗi, wa mɔi̧a o gba dùk be-zɔŋa si ŋgárá Suzɛ, ɓɛɛ wa e Ege zu wa. Hegɔ, wa mgbɔɔ Ɛstɛr si kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu hee o dɔka-a ga ha̧ Ege, wi-pɛm-okoo mɛ zɔk a̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa zlapete ghena nya gezeke meghe mbeli ne, kwele kwele ŋwalea kwɛ nyi tseneke mbeli kadzembe ŋkwa nya berete mbe Səze kanza te dzeve va Hɛgɛ, pa mbeli keleke Ɛstɛr perə kadzeki ghɛa meghe laka berete ta Hɛgɛ, wəndə nya keya mi.
Tupurri: De maga aè wo go dus waçaçre mani wañ ti jag maga aà hay waçaçn go, day so, aà raw tay ngaäa tigliiri ma äi leege Sus ti meene sirn wo go so, ga Hegay de gor ti äaara mono, Ester hay de baage yoo keçeç ni lay. AÀ raw wo de äe äi tiñ wañn wer Hegay je ko el naare wo no.

Francais: Elle plut beaucoup à celui-ci et gagna sa faveur. Il s’empressa de lui fournir tout ce qui était nécessaire à ses soins de beauté et à son entretien. Il lui procura sept servantes choisies dans le personnel du palais, et l’installa avec elles dans le meilleur appartement du harem.
Anglais: Now the young woman pleased Hegai and found favor with him. So he quickly provided her with beauty preparations and her [portion of] food, and he gave her seven choice maids from the king’s palace; then he transferred her and her maids to the best  place  in the harem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goot-cat kayni li kiram ŋaa'a, na' fi slugot vok iramu. Nam vula' sle ma kot tuwna kaf ma na' mina, hiɗi tin ma na' min kaf, nam vula' guro-boyna sa suna'na siɗiya, yawsiyay goy hay ziyna vi mulla pa, nam joka' hiɗi guro-boy nisina goy hay ziyna ma ŋaa suwa ma lak boyna.
Bulu: Egué a nga yen Esthe mvaé a jiʼa ve nye biôme bise bia yian asu nyanga a nkôman émien. A nga ve nye bebo bisaé be binga zamgbwa ntoban e bebo bisaé ya nda njô été ba be be be tabe éfase nda ja dañ abeñ e nlame binga.
Guiziga: Hege a hĩyã Estere le, a pura Estere kuy avu hiri. A wus vu ngi vulaŋ mal mezlehey ngi puy ngi gaŋ dumvu ngilew ngilew, waɗ a vulaŋ gwat naŋ mazum mazumo. Yo a vulaŋ ziri diili hirnga hirngahay mitarnaˀ misi a hay buyo. A dirba nah, a hila taŋ tir hay ngi ngwasaya, a pa taŋ sek pal taŋ ng'ar viŋ mimezle ar hay ngi ngwasaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Paanyo oo fottani mo, heɓi mo'ere haa maako. O yaawɗi hokkugo mo ko o mari haaje ngam fawnaago e wuurugo. O hokki mo boo horɓe njoweeɗiɗo, suɓaaɓe nder saare laamiiɗo. Nden o yahri mo bee horɓe maako nder taƴtaaji suudu rewɓe ɓurɗi wooɗugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Paanyo oo fottani mo, heɓi mo'ere haa maako. O yaawɗi hokkugo mo ko o mari haaje ngam fawnaago e wuurugo. O hokki mo boo horɓe njoweeɗiɗo, suɓaaɓe nder saare laamiiɗo. Nden o yahri mo bee horɓe maako nder taƴtaaji suudu rewɓe ɓurɗi wooɗugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Boko-bem’ɛi dee tɛ Ege nyɛmna, a̧ baa see-aa mbɛt. Ege ha̧a̧ o nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ in o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a. A̧ ha̧a̧ o boko-bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ be-tua ha̧ Ɛstɛr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ de gɔna-bɛr-tua tɛ tua ko o okoo ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Boko-bem’ɛi dee tɛ Ege nyɛmna, a̧ baa see-aa mbɛt. Ege ha̧a̧ o nɔ̧́-sɔ̧-tɛ in o nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ nɛ̀ dɔka-a. A̧ ha̧a̧ o boko-bem mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo nɛ̀ be-tua ha̧ Ɛstɛr mbɛt, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ de gɔna-bɛr-tua tɛ tua ko o okoo ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ndeɗehwe nda wəzha shɛ kwele kwele ke Hɛgɛ, pa nde kemave zlaɓa ta ŋkɛ. Pa ŋkɛ fəave nda wəshi kepesa geva nyi kehi taghanyɛ ba'a wəshi kezeme nyi zeɗe zeɗe. Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda kweci hwa mi nyi kemene slene ganji ki ghɛa meghe mberefaŋe kakemane, pa veyi hɛ te ŋkwa nya ganyɛ ma mbe ghɛa mi.
Tupurri: May sen kal wooge nen äe, äil äe kal joñge ti äe de ele. Deparday tu, aà kal kië feçeçre kne' see wo ne hen de reege. AÀ kal hoo tigliiri renam maga aè hoo ra liñ ni wañ ni, äo'n yoo äaara, äi tiñ ma de el yoo mani naare wo no.

Francais: Esther n’avait pas révélé son origine juive, car Mardochée le lui avait interdit.
Anglais: Esther did not reveal [the Jewish background of] her people or her family, for Mordecai had instructed her not to do so.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ester min pat dir sumuna va' goyɗi, jafna va'ɗi kaw, kay Mardose da' kay na' ma di goyɗi.
Bulu: Esthe a nji kulane na a ne ngone Beyude, amu Mardôsé a nga ve nye de atiñ .
Guiziga: Estere, a biga mizli naŋhay ati muy naŋhaya ta, asi Mardoke a tikaŋ le, anja a biga taŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Asta waŋginaay ummaatoore muuɗum e iwde muuɗum, ngam Mardokay umruno mo taa o anndina ɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Asta waŋginaay ummaatoore muuɗum e iwde muuɗum, ngam Mardokay umruno mo taa o anndina ɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr sa so nin dùk kɔ‘i in tugun nàm kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wen Mardochee dora so a̧ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr sa so nin dùk kɔ‘i in tugun nàm kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wen Mardochee dora so a̧ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kencɛte Ɛstɛr kakwa Zhəwif nde kwa fɛake Mardoshɛ kencɛ nda hwelefe ta nta ke mbeli we.
Tupurri: Ester laa dayge kañ nen jobo ti wer mani äe maga se biñ ni mo gaè. Sen diñ werga Mardoke hay go de mañ jag äe, ga aà mo siin go ne jobo wa.

Francais: De son côté, Mardochée se promenait tous les jours devant la cour du harem pour se renseigner sur la santé d’Esther et savoir ce qui allait lui arriver.
Anglais: Every day Mordecai [who was an  attendant in the king’s court] walked back and forth in front of the courtyard of the harem to learn how Esther was getting along and what was happening to her.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta buurta kaf Mardose ka co vun liyn ma boyn ka tokay hayna, kay ɗuw ala Ester ka nanige, nisi ka kota' tuwa' kottige kaw.
Bulu: Wôna môs ôse, Mardôsé ki a mbe a zaʼa wulu e nseñe nlame binga asu ya yemelan nge Esthe a ne mvoʼé a yemelane fe jam da ye kui be nye.
Guiziga: Vur hin gar na, Mardoke, ara liˀi a wazlaray ngwasaya. A wuɗ ɓa a sina, Estere, a ro zuy zuy kwa malla a roko gakaŋ mike na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kala nyalaade fuu Mardokay waanci yeeso daldal suudu rewɓe ngam anndugo njamu Asta e ko heɓata mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Kala nyalaade fuu Mardokay waanci yeeso daldal suudu rewɓe ngam anndugo njamu Asta e ko heɓata mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wese lɛŋ, Mardochee yara zik fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu mɛ iŋ mgbara haya-tɛ in duka-a ko Ɛstɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wese lɛŋ, Mardochee yara zik fara-yaa ko o kóò ko wannu mɛ iŋ mgbara haya-tɛ in duka-a ko Ɛstɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Mardoshɛ le ŋa ŋkɛ ne, kehɛ kehɛ se ŋkɛ kadzeghwa dzeyi mɛa ghɛa mi kezha 'yɛwe nza ta Ɛstɛr ba'a wəsə nya mene nda mbeli.
Tupurri: Day tum mono, Mardoke caw dogge. Wo le, ferle, äi feele jag tiñ mani naaren wo no, ma koge ga Ester ba ela, day aè ba de joñge äe na joñge la.

Francais: Les jeunes filles du harem devaient suivre pendant une année le traitement de beauté prescrit aux femmes : les six premiers mois elles étaient massées avec de l’huile de myrrhe et les six mois suivants avec des baumes parfumés et d’autres produits de beauté féminins. Ensuite chaque jeune fille avait son tour pour se rendre auprès du roi Xerxès.
Anglais: Now when it was each young woman’s turn to go before King Ahasuerus, after the end of her twelve months under the regulations for the women—for the days of their beautification were completed as follows: six months with oil of myrrh and six months with [sweet] spices  and  perfumes and the beauty preparations for women—
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gatta vuli ala guro-boyn ma kot tuwsi ir busat kep, nisi as set tuwsi hiɗi mula miir* ir til karkiya, nisi as set tuwsi hiɗi urdina, kot tuwsiya ir til karkiya kaw, hay li ma til doogo yam ma' vatawana, guro-boyna as vurna tuwsi vok ir mulla may.
Bulu: Bengo be binga ya nlame binga be nga yiane tôñe mboone nyanga be nga tiñeti binga na be bo tañe ngume mbu: ngon ésaman yʼôsu be nga wobane mbone mir; ngon ésamane fok be nga wobane mebôndé me ne mbamba menyum a mimbone mi binga mife asu nyanga. Jam da tôñe valé e ne na ngone minga ése é mbe é bili éyoñ a yiane ke be njô bôt Asuérus.
Guiziga: Ɓa zuŋ diili gar a sa ru ng'avu buy Zersese na, sey da naŋ mikiɗa mi ngi sipi jiviɗ ngi ngwasaya le angi kiya kuruˀ nga cuwo far. Hin ngi jirgiɗa vu, jiviɗ naŋ a cuh ani: Kiya merkeɗ na,a jirgiɗam vu ti mal mazilaka mir  , yo kiya merkeɗ mekeleme ma na, a jirgiɗam vu ti urdi muhindirik hindirik waɗ ti mal mezle ngi ngwasay, ɓa ngi ɗiya dumvu ngilew ngilew.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Umroore rewɓe darni paanyo debbo fuu taasko lebbi sappo e ɗiɗi: O wujo nebbam baɗaadi lebbi joweego aartuɗi e lebbi joweego luttuɗi boo o wujo ngujam balsani e kuuje pawnirɗe goɗɗe. Ɓaawo man paanyo fuu yehi bee saa'i mum haa laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus.
Fulfulde_DC: Umroore rewɓe darni paanyo debbo fuu taasko lebbi sappo e ɗiɗi: O wujo nebbam baɗaadi lebbi joweego aartuɗi e lebbi joweego luttuɗi boo o wujo ngujam balsani e kuuje pawnirɗe goɗɗe. Ɓaawo man paanyo fuu yehi bee saa'i mum haa laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ be-zɔŋa dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar-mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra wen o kóò ko wannu tɛ fio-zɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔa a̧ si ɗoŋ wannu. Tɛ́ kuti fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́ nɔ̧́-nyama, ɓɛɛ tɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk mɛ siti woyo, a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́ o ŋma gba de nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ pɛr-aa ɔ dee in o nɔ̧́-yɔk-tɛ ko okoo mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ be-zɔŋa dee mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar-mɔ nɛ̀ yɔra wen o kóò ko wannu tɛ fio-zɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo kaɗi, ɓɛɛ wa mgbɔa a̧ si ɗoŋ wannu. Tɛ́ kuti fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk, a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́ nɔ̧́-nyama, ɓɛɛ tɛ fio-zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk mɛ siti woyo, a̧ tɛ sɔ̧ nɛ́ o ŋma gba de nɔ̧́ nɛ̀ pɛr-aa ɔ dee in o nɔ̧́-yɔk-tɛ ko okoo mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ŋwalea kwɛ nyi ki ghɛa mi nyagha ne, nda hɛ kamenete va zake kahi geva le wəshi kepesa geva ta mi: le 'wərdə ganyɛ fi geva hɛ mbe ka ghate ta tere nyi ŋkwaŋe. Ma tere ŋkwaŋe nyi ketene ne, kwete mama ta 'wərdə ba'a kweci wəshi kehi geva ta mi keghə keghə yafi hɛ. Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ yayata wəzha makwa le ŋa nta və kalə sha meghe Sɛrsɛs.
Tupurri: May ma tigli ma honla äuy wo äiñ wañ Asuyerus, blam maga se joñ few we go hwal ti äog joñ feçeçre maga aà hay ngaä ra ne naaren wo mono. De wur sen mono aà joñ wo few hiira' kne' see äaara de noo mire, blam äe few hiira' pa tag noo trusa ma foçoçre no wo see äaara ma façaç see äaara go.

Francais: Lorsqu’elle allait du harem au palais royal, on lui donnait tout ce qu’elle désirait prendre avec elle.
Anglais: then the young woman would go before the king in this way: anything that she wanted was given her to take with her from the harem into the king’s palace.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma goot-cat min tuɗ kat mulla, slen ma hay ziyna vi boyna ma na' jobom kafna as vula'ta, kay na' naram ka'a hay ziyna vi mulla.
Bulu: Eyoñe ngon minga ja ke be njô bôt, be nga ve nye jôm ése a sili a kee je akôlô nlame binga a ke nda njô bôt;
Guiziga: Ɓa zuŋ diili aru ng'avu buyo na: gwat naŋ mucufuɗ le gar, ɓa aru di a haŋ baɗ ar hay ngi ngwasaya, ng'ar mugum ngi buyo na, a vulakaŋ di.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Paanyo ummiiɗo diga suudu rewɓe ngam yahugo haa suudu laamiiɗo fuu, heɓi ko o ƴami fuu ngam yahugo bee man.
Fulfulde_DC: Paanyo ummiiɗo diga suudu rewɓe ngam yahugo haa suudu laamiiɗo fuu, heɓi ko o ƴami fuu ngam yahugo bee man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ yuwar mɔ nɛ tɛ de tɛ nɛa-a ko be-zɔŋa sitɛ wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: wa tɛ ha̧ o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ ba nɛnɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ tua-yaa ko o okoo si fara ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ yuwar mɔ nɛ tɛ de tɛ nɛa-a ko be-zɔŋa sitɛ wannu nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: wa tɛ ha̧ o mɔ lɛŋ n'aa tɛ kɔ̧ mɛ ba nɛnɛ nɛ̀ kɔ̧́ tua-yaa ko o okoo si fara ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kalə wəzha makwa sha meghe ne, kave nda yayata wəsə nya ɗe nde kakele kalə kadzawa kema ta meghe mbeli shave mbe ghɛa mi.
Tupurri: Diñ do kay no so no ga may ma tiglin wo see wañ. Fen maga aà wiin äuy aè haçn ne hene, ga aè nen woge de äe do le äi tiñ maga saara de tay ti ni ma cegaëe wo go see wañ äi tiñ wañn mono.

Francais: Elle se présentait chez le roi le soir, et le lendemain matin elle était conduite dans un second harem dirigé par Chaachgaz, l’eunuque responsable des épouses royales de second rang. Elle ne retournait plus chez le roi sauf si celui-ci en manifestait le désir et la faisait nommément appeler.
Anglais: In the evening she would go in and the next morning she would return to the  second harem, to the custody of Shaashgaz, the king’s eunuch who was in charge of the  concubines. She would not return to the king unless he delighted in her and she was summoned by name.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Na' tuɗ talamu hay vulatita, hay graw culumta, na' kal goy hay ziyna mara'a ma boyna sa sunda vi mulla ka tuni haya hay ŋomda vi Saasgaz ma patayna vi mulla ma ŋom boy sa sunda. La mulla may joba'ɗi, ya' hiɗi se'ɗi kaw, na' may hotay talam loɗi.
Bulu: a nga ke be njô bôt mamengôʼé, tyé kpwaa be nga kee nye nlame binga, a baʼaleban e be Shakgaz, mmiak ô ne mbaʼale bibon bi njô bôt. A mbe nguleya beta ke be njô bôt vengevenge ve njô bôt a kômbô nye nge loone nye a jôé dé.
Guiziga: Zuŋ diili, aru ti pastaˀ ng'avu buyo. Ti miprik na, a mawa ng'ar hay ngi ngwasay mucuw naŋ muduba. Mavula jiviɗ nah i Sasgaz, mbur munguɗo, buy ngi ngwasay a hay buyo. Zuŋ diili anta mi ng'avu buyo mata, sey da buy muro ti may naŋ malla sey da naŋ mizilaŋ le ti slimiɗ naŋ ɓa aru ng'ava far.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kiikiiɗe o yehi ton, fajiri boo o lori haa suudu rewɓe ɗiɗawru, halfitinaandu Sa'asgas, cortaaɗo laamiiɗo, aynoowo sulaaɓe. O meetataa yahugo haa laamiiɗo, sonaa to laamiiɗo yeli ɗum, ewnake mo boo bee innde.
Fulfulde_DC: Kiikiiɗe o yehi ton, fajiri boo o lori haa suudu rewɓe ɗiɗawru, halfitinaandu Sa'asgas, cortaaɗo laamiiɗo, aynoowo sulaaɓe. O meetataa yahugo haa laamiiɗo, sonaa to laamiiɗo yeli ɗum, ewnake mo boo bee innde.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóò‘i tɛ si ɗoŋ wannu mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tutuyɛ a̧ gboo pii ɗoŋ ye nɛ́ ŋma ɓii tua nɛtɛ nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Sasgaz, kpàná nɛ̀ wa hoka e zu o zɔŋa-kóò ko wannu. A̧ beka si ɗoŋ, ɗoŋ wannu woyo ɓɔna, kà á bòò nɛ́ wannu nɛ̀ tɛ-wi a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ sa a̧ nɛ̀ nin-a sɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóò‘i tɛ si ɗoŋ wannu mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ, ɓɛɛ mɛ tutuyɛ a̧ gboo pii ɗoŋ ye nɛ́ ŋma ɓii tua nɛtɛ nɛ̀ zíí nɛ̀ Sasgaz, kpàná nɛ̀ wa hoka e zu o zɔŋa-kóò ko wannu. A̧ beka si ɗoŋ, ɗoŋ wannu woyo ɓɔna, kà á bòò nɛ́ wannu nɛ̀ tɛ-wi a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ sa a̧ nɛ̀ nin-a sɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hetɛhwɛɗi ne, kalə nde kadzeki ghɛ meghe, ma masheke ne, kalə nde kadzeki kwete ghɛa mi nya nza Sha'ashgaz, nde tsewe tsewe nya te ghəa ka meghwateshia meghe. Kazhɛne geva wəzha makwa kalə sha meghe we, nda ŋkɛ kamawehwe ba'a kahekakɛ le sləa nta.
Tupurri: AÀ wo see wañ de law, toñ äe mono se fer le go äi tiñ naare ma de äogn wo no, ti ngeel maga Sasgas je ma de ndar äayn de ko joñre naare maga sen wo bay kol naare wañ ëa ni mono. AÀ fer wo see wañ gaa so, say ni wañ joñ de saçy äe ti, day ëen wo de ëu äe.

Francais: Un jour, ce fut le tour d’Esther, fille d’Abihaïl et fille adoptive de son cousin Mardochée, de se rendre auprès du roi. Elle demanda uniquement ce que Hégué, l’eunuque responsable du harem royal lui avait conseillé de prendre. Esther attirait la bienveillance de tous ceux qui la rencontraient.
Anglais: Now  as for  Esther, the daughter of Abihail the uncle of Mordecai who had taken her in as his [own] daughter, when her turn came to go in to the king, she requested nothing except what Hegai the king’s eunuch [and attendant] who was in charge of the women, advised. And Esther found favor in the sight of all who saw her.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ester goota vi Abigayil, ɓasum Mardose ma wula'na, liyn asawa kay na' co vi mulla. Slen ma Hegay ma patayna vi mulla ma ŋom boyna vula'tina na' min job va suw kalamɗi. Ester na' kir sumun kaf ŋaa ŋolo.
Bulu: Eyoñ éyoñe jé ya ke be njô bôt é nga kpwaan, Esthe, ngon Abikaé, a mbe ndômenyañe Mardôsé nje a nga nyoñ a yale ane mone wé, a nga nyoñ foʼo ve biôme Egué nkalan élaé njô bôt a mbaʼale binga a nga bendé nye na a nyoñ. Bôte bese be nga yen Esthe mvaé.
Guiziga: Ester, zuŋ ngi Abihayil, jamba naŋ Mardoke migila tuwa, hin ngi ru naŋ ng'avu buyo a ndila le. Naŋ a cufuɗ nga naŋ ɓa a vulakaŋ na, sey gwatay, Hege, mbur munguɗo, buy ngi ngwasaya hay buy, mibigaŋ taŋ na tewle. Mizli gar na, a puraka Estere ti hiri mezle.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde saa'i waɗi haa Asta ɓii Abihayil, bappa Mardokay, waŋga yeeso laamiiɗo, Asta mo Mardokay mawnini ɗaɓɓaay koo ɗume, o hoo'i ko Hegay, cortaaɗo laamiiɗo, aynoowo rewɓe dawrani mo tan. O heɓi mo'ere haa yi'ɓe mo fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde saa'i waɗi haa Asta ɓii Abihayil, bappa Mardokay, waŋga yeeso laamiiɗo, Asta mo Mardokay mawnini ɗaɓɓaay koo ɗume, o hoo'i ko Hegay, cortaaɗo laamiiɗo, aynoowo rewɓe dawrani mo tan. O heɓi mo'ere haa yi'ɓe mo fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ŋgimbi ko Ɛstɛr boko-bem ko Abihayil nɛ̀ Mardochee baa so gasi nɛnɛ hɔa mɛ si tua ɗoŋ wannu, a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ ŋma mɔ yak zu mɔ nɛ̀ Ege, wan-duk-zu o okoo usa ha̧ a̧ na. Mɔ ko Ɛstɛr dee tɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ zɔka a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ ŋgimbi ko Ɛstɛr boko-bem ko Abihayil nɛ̀ Mardochee baa so gasi nɛnɛ hɔa mɛ si tua ɗoŋ wannu, a̧ ba kɔ̧-a̧ ŋma mɔ yak zu mɔ nɛ̀ Ege, wan-duk-zu o okoo usa ha̧ a̧ na. Mɔ ko Ɛstɛr dee tɛ o bíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ zɔka a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete hɛ ne, ŋa Ɛstɛr və kedzeki ghɛa meghe, wəzha ta Abihayil nya kawəza meghekɛa Mardoshɛ nya kekelete ŋkɛ. Kese ka'yɛwe kwete wəsə za ma ke nyi ndeke nda Hɛgɛ nde tsewe tsewe ta meghe nya keya mi we. Kwele kwele ɗehwe Ɛstɛr mbeli nyi kenewe pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: De maga aà wo kolge ti Ester may mani Abisayil no, may pan Mardoke maga aà geçeçn go do may äe no mono, Ester wii äen diñ fen maga kañ nen äe ti äe diñ Hegay, je ma de ndar äay mani wañ ma gor ti naare wo no. Ester hay koge de wore nen jar maga kon wo mo äuy no.

Francais: C’est pendant la septième année du règne de Xerxès, le dixième mois ou mois de Tébeth, qu’on la conduisit dans le palais auprès du roi.
Anglais: So Esther was taken to King Ahasuerus, to his royal palace in the tenth month, that is, the month of Tebeth (Dec-Jan), in the seventh year of his reign.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi co vi Ester kay tuɗa' hay ziyna vi Asuwerus hay ziy ma mulda hay til ma doogona, ma yum ala Tebet*, hay busata siɗiyata vi mulda valamu.
Bulu: Nde be nga zu nyoñ Esthe naa ba kee nye be njô bôt Asuérus e nda njô bôt, e ngon awômô é ne jôé na Tébét, mbu zamgbwale ya njôane wé.
Guiziga: Dar a ram ti Estere ng'avu buy Zerses ar mugum naŋ so. Naɓa buy a ɓul di i kiya mukuruˀ naŋ ngi vi, i kiya Tebet  , i vi mitarnaˀ naŋ ngi Zerses angi zuma buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njahri mo nder suudu laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus nder lewru sappooru wi'eteendu Tebet, nder nduuɓu laamu maako njoweeɗiɗaɓu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njahri mo nder suudu laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus nder lewru sappooru wi'eteendu Tebet, nder nduuɓu laamu maako njoweeɗiɗaɓu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa mgbɔɔ Ɛstɛr nɛnɛ si fara-duk ko wannu Zɛrzɛs tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧ zɛ ko «Tebɛt», tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko wannu Zɛrzɛs.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa mgbɔɔ Ɛstɛr nɛnɛ si fara-duk ko wannu Zɛrzɛs tɛ ɓu fio-zɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ̀ tɔ̧ zɛ ko «Tebɛt», tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo pɛ ɔɔ-wan ko wannu Zɛrzɛs.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa mberefaŋe ta va ta Sɛrsɛs mbe meghe mbe kwa meŋe ta tere nya heka mbeli katere Tɛbɛt ne, pa mbeli keleghe Ɛstɛr kadzeki ghɛa meghe.
Tupurri: AÈ kal woge de Ester äiñ wañ, äi tiñ wañ no, nen few ma de hwaln ga diñ few maga aè ëen ga Tebet, nen kiñgi ma de renam maga se ti wañn ni mono.

Francais: Le roi devint amoureux d’Esther, plus qu’il ne l’avait jamais été d’une autre femme, et ce fut elle, parmi les jeunes filles, qui gagna sa faveur et sa tendresse. Il posa la couronne royale sur sa tête et la proclama reine à la place de Vasti.
Anglais: Now the king loved Esther more than all the  other  women, and she found favor and kindness with him more than all the [other] virgins, so that he set the royal crown on her head and made her queen in the place of Vashti.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla min Ester suw boy segena kafe, na' kiram ŋaa'a, nam la' slugot suw boy segen kafe kaw. Nala nam tun bogorayna vi mulda ka'a, tuna' mulu hay baŋal Vasti.
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga nyeʼe Esthe a lôte binga bevoʼo bese a Esthe a nga yene mvaé a mvame be nye a dañe bengo be binga bevoʼo bese. Nde a nga jalé ékate njô bôt e nlô wé yôb a ve nye éto nga njô bôt éjiane Vasti.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy a wuɗa Estere haɗa fineˀ ngwas mekelemeye gar. Buy a gaŋ mezle, a puraŋ kuy fineˀ ziri diili mekelemey gar. Dar a caŋ loppol ngi maˀãy a hirnga njiv, waɗ a cifaŋ i maˀãy ar li ngi Vasti.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo ɓuri yiɗugo Asta dow rewɓe woɗɓe fuu, o mo'ani mo e o woonani mo ko ɓuri faanyɓe luttuɓe fuu. O meeti mo meetaleewol laamu, o te'i mo haa pellel Wasti.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo ɓuri yiɗugo Asta dow rewɓe woɗɓe fuu, o mo'ani mo e o woonani mo ko ɓuri faanyɓe luttuɓe fuu. O meeti mo meetaleewol laamu, o te'i mo haa pellel Wasti.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: See wannu baa Ɛstɛr gan o dɔka okoo; Ɛstɛr dee tɛ-a nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ nɛ̀ ko-wan oi Vasti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: See wannu baa Ɛstɛr gan o dɔka okoo; Ɛstɛr dee tɛ-a nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ mɔɔ-gu-zu ko ko-wan ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ e a̧ nɛ̀ ko-wan oi Vasti.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe ɗehwe Ɛstɛr za ma ke kweci pɛtɛa mi, pa kemave zlaɓa kwa kema ta ŋkɛ za ma ke kweci ŋwalea kwɛ pɛtɛ, pa veyi nda derə meghe mbe ghə, pa gezete ghenta ya kamale ta meghe te ŋkwa Vasti.
Tupurri: Wañ kal da Ester dedañ naare lan wo äuy, Ester ko nen äe de ele, de wore dedañ tigliiri lan wora. AÀ kañ klañ wañn ne hen ti, koln waçywañ ti ngeel Fasti.

Francais: Il organisa en l’honneur d’Esther un grand banquet auquel il invita tous ses hauts fonctionnaires et ses ministres. Il accorda une dispense d’impôt aux habitants des provinces  et distribua des présents avec une générosité toute royale.
Anglais: Then the king held a great banquet, Esther’s banquet, for all his officials and his servants; and he made a  festival for the provinces and gave gifts in accordance with the resources of the king.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla li yuldeta ŋolda mi yerimana hiɗi sa sunda valam kaf kuɗ Ester, nam vul tun-sukka mi nagata valam kafe, vul slena ma ŋaana vi mulda goyo kuɗ minda valamu kaw.
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga bo beta dina asu bivet a bebo bisaé bé, dina Esthe. A nga ve bôte ya bifase bi si yʼéjôé nguleya bo te yaʼane toya a ve bôte memvaka a ésôs ése ja yiane njô bôt.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, buy tuwa, a di ɗaf ngi muguzlum ti slimiɗ ngi Estere. A zilo mizli madiɗa ngi slra naŋhay ati gawla naŋhay gar nga ara. Buutu mawurkaka ar li ngi buy miwi lihey ar hirwuy naŋ gar na, a ngica taŋ di avra, waɗ a vula gwat da mizli ti gula ti hazum, ka vul nga naŋ buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o waɗi nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi ngam saraaki'en maako e sukaaɓe maako, haa o teddina Asta. O hoynani lesɗe maako jomorgol, o hokki boo dokke fodde caahaaki laamiiɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o waɗi nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi ngam saraaki'en maako e sukaaɓe maako, haa o teddina Asta. O hoynani lesɗe maako jomorgol, o hokki boo dokke fodde caahaaki laamiiɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu dee gasa gbaŋa wen Ɛstɛr ha̧ o gasawi in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma wese-ɔm-tɛ kpɔk ha̧ o zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧,  ha̧ nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu dee gasa gbaŋa wen Ɛstɛr ha̧ o gasawi in o wi-de-tom kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧ ŋma wese-ɔm-tɛ kpɔk ha̧ o zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧,  ha̧ nɛ̀ mɔ ha̧ o bíí nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ yuwar deemɔ ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe menete gəsəkə nya wəba kazləvəa Ɛstɛr, pa ŋkɛ hekakɛ ka mene slene ta ŋkɛ nyi jama jama ba'a mbeli nyi te ghə nyi yite. Pa fɛake ŋki ta jaɓeregwale dzeyi mbe yɛ sla ta hɛɗi ba'a pa nehave nda wəshi gəmə ke mbeli kwele kwele laka zeɗe helia meghe.
Tupurri: Wañ kal joñ few ma kluu ne wañre äen wo de weere joçoçre äen wo, joñ few Estere. AÀ kal waçaçge ga jar sir sen äuy mo poë wo lombo wa ëa so, aà mo ig wo, day kal äes feçeçre mbe ne jar haçy do ga wañ joñ nono.

Francais: On rassembla une seconde fois des jeunes filles . Mardochée occupait alors un poste dans l’administration royale.
Anglais: And when the virgins were gathered together the second time, Mordecai  was sitting at the king’s gate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi dak guro-boyna hay sem ma ma'na, Mardose ka jar sa tokay hay faatana vi mulla.
Bulu: Be nga sulane bengo be binga éyoñe baa, Mardôsé a nga bili éto e bisaé bi njô bôt.
Guiziga: Ti di hila ziri diilihey sar mucuw naŋ na, naɓa Mardoke naŋ ti li ngi slra naŋ nga hay buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay ɗonno huuwa haa laamorde wakkati ɓe mooɓti faanyɓe fahin.
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay ɗonno huuwa haa laamorde wakkati ɓe mooɓti faanyɓe fahin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi mɔi̧a o be-zɔŋa hɔɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ tom ko Mardochee so nɛ́ duka nù kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi mɔi̧a o be-zɔŋa hɔɔ woyo, ɓɛɛ tom ko Mardochee so nɛ́ duka nù kɔ̧̀ kira ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa tsene ŋwalea kwɛ mbeli kakwa bake zhigə ne, ŋkwa ya va Mardoshɛ ɓiyitsa ki ghɛa meghe kamene slene.
Tupurri: De maga aà fer tay ti tigliirin wo ma de äog mokay no, Mardoke hay de hayle jag tiñ ni wañ ni.

Francais: De son côté, Esther n’avait pas révélé son origine juive, respectant en cela l’interdiction de Mardochée ; elle lui obéissait en effet, car elle était sous sa protection.
Anglais: Esther had not revealed her family or her people [that is, her Jewish background], just as Mordecai had instructed her; for Esther did what Mordecai told her just as when she was under his care.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ta-ta wulini Ester min pat dir jafna va' goyɗi, ki Mardose di ta' nala, Ester ka li kuɗ dita vi Mardose, ki na' ay hay gaŋeraŋa valam dok-dok nala.
Bulu: Esthe ki teke kulane tine jé ya Beyude amu a nga baʼale atiñe Mardôsé a nga ve nye; a nga ke ôsu a bo nye mewôk avalʼane éyoñe Mardôsé a mbe a baʼaleʼe nye.
Guiziga: Ester a bigi muy naŋhay ati sukwi ngi mizli naŋhaya ta, asi Mardoke a ɓaŋ le ɗa ˀ ɗaˀ le, ko anja a biga taŋ ta. Ester ara cine mi da Mardoke aruŋ na si, kaɓa naŋ misi zleˀe asi haŋ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asta boo waŋginaay iwde mum e ummaatoore mum tawon, bana Mardokay umruno mo. O tokki ɗowtanaago Mardokay bana yaake o ɗonno les kaliifaaku muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Asta boo waŋginaay iwde mum e ummaatoore mum tawon, bana Mardokay umruno mo. O tokki ɗowtanaago Mardokay bana yaake o ɗonno les kaliifaaku muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr sa nin dùk kɔ‘i in tugun nàm kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wen Mardochee baa dor so a̧ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧. Ɛstɛr duka tɛ mboo zu ha̧ Mardochee siti hee ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ kɔ̧́ tua kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr sa nin dùk kɔ‘i in tugun nàm kɔ‘i ha̧ ŋma bíí na, wen Mardochee baa dor so a̧ tɛ tɔ̧a̧-a̧. Ɛstɛr duka tɛ mboo zu ha̧ Mardochee siti hee ŋgimbi n'aa ɓɔna so nɛnɛ kɔ̧́ tua kɔ̧-a̧ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese Ɛstɛr kancɛ mbelia nta le hwelefe ta nta kakwa Zhəwif kala nya meɗekɛ Mardoshɛ we, mba kafa nda ghena kwa nza nde mbe dzeve ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ester hay bay de kañ nen jobo ti wer jar mani äe maga se biñ ni mo wa ëa, do maga Mardoke hay siin go ne hen nono. Ester hay joñge diñ ti jag Mardoke do maga se geçeç ni äe joñge nono.

Francais: Un jour où Mardochée exerçait ses fonctions au palais, Bigtan et Térech, deux fonctionnaires chargés de garder l’entrée des appartements royaux, complotèrent d’assassiner le roi Xerxès contre qui ils étaient irrités.
Anglais: In those days, while Mordecai was sitting at the king’s gate, Bigthan and Teresh, two of the king’s eunuchs who guarded the door, became  angry and  conspired to attack King Ahasuerus.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Mardose ka musi hay faatana jar sum sa mulla yisina, sum sa patayna vi mulla ma', sa ŋom vun-galana vi mulla, Bigtan hiɗi Terek, hay ɦoyta visi ta ŋolda, nisi var kay ci mulla Asuwerus goyo.
Bulu: Môs éziñ, valé Mardôsé a boʼo bisaé bié e nda njô bôt, nde Bigtan a Terék, bebo bisaé be mbe bebaʼale mimbé mia nyiine menda me njô bôt, be nga bôndé feʼe ya wôé njô bôt Asuérus amu a nga bo be na be wôʼôlun.
Guiziga: Ti di nah na, naɓa Mardoke a ro ar li ngi slra naŋ nga hay buyo. Mizli munguɗo ngi buyoy ada cuw, i ti Bigtaŋ ati Teres, mijigina miviŋ ngi ci nga viŋ buy. A jam mevel ar buyo, dar a gam gidiɓi ɓa a kiɗaka buy Zersese vagay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde go'o, nde Mardokay ɗon huuwa haa laamorde, saraaki'en ɗiɗo, Bigetan e Teres, sortaaɓe, aynooɓe dammugal haa suudu laamiiɗo, tikki, mbaɗi dabare ngam mbarugo laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde go'o, nde Mardokay ɗon huuwa haa laamorde, saraaki'en ɗiɗo, Bigetan e Teres, sortaaɓe, aynooɓe dammugal haa suudu laamiiɗo, tikki, mbaɗi dabare ngam mbarugo laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Mardochee duk nɛnɛ nú tua ko wannu'i, o ŋma kpàná-pɛm-nú tua ko wannu yiitoo, Bigtaŋ in Tɛrɛs kpaa ɗaŋsee zu wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e nú in ŋmaa mɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ́ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Mardochee duk nɛnɛ nú tua ko wannu'i, o ŋma kpàná-pɛm-nú tua ko wannu yiitoo, Bigtaŋ in Tɛrɛs kpaa ɗaŋsee zu wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e nú in ŋmaa mɛ gbɛ a̧ yinɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwete hɛ kamene slene ta ŋkɛ Mardoshɛ ki ghɛa meghe ne, pa kweci ka tsewe tsewe nyi keya ŋkwa kedzeki ghɛa meghe bake, yɛ Bigtan le Tɛrɛsh tsahwe kezha peslekɛ meghe Sɛrsɛs nya zhɛ nda wənəa nci ke hɛ ve.
Tupurri: Ti wurpo Mardoke de hayle jag tiñ ni wañ, jar ma bay äay wo äog yoo jar maga wo de gor jag tiñ no, ga diñ Bigtam wo de Terese, kal wo le' wañ blam kal wo kië faage ma mañ do ciñ see wañ Asuyerus.

Francais: Mardochée l’apprit, il en informa la reine Esther, qui transmit le fait au roi de la part de Mardochée.
Anglais: But the plot became known to Mordecai, who informed Queen Esther, and Esther told the king in Mordecai’s name.
