BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawta kayni co hay humda vi Mardose, nam di law na'ta mi ca-mulda Ester, Ester di law na'ta mi mulla hay semda vi Mardose.
Bulu: Ane Mardôsé a nga yeme jame te, ve kate de Esthe nga njô bôt, nde Esthe ki a nga kate njô bôt e mam Mardôsé a nga kulan.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Mardoke a cine ɓi nah le, dar a fa ɓi nah fẽẽt da maˀãy Ester. Estere kwana, a fa ɓi nah da buyo Mardoke a ɓiy ani kahana kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay nani haala man, anndini ka Asta, debbo laamiiɗo, Asta boo yecci ka laamiiɗo bee innde Mardokay.
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay nani haala man, anndini ka Asta, debbo laamiiɗo, Asta boo yecci ka laamiiɗo bee innde Mardokay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wen'i aa zer Mardochee, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ba kɔ‘i wen-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen'i aa zer Mardochee, ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ we ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ ko-wan Ɛstɛr, ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ba kɔ‘i wen-aa nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mardoshɛ fate, pa gezete nda ke male ta meghe Ɛstɛr, pa Ɛstɛr gezete nda ke meghe te ŋkwa Mardoshɛ.
Tupurri: Waçaçre sen la kal le'ge ne Mardoke sugi, se kal ferge äe ne Estere, Ester kal fer waçaçre sen la ne wañ ti ëu Mardoke.

Francais: Il y eut une enquête et l’accusation fut reconnue exacte. Les deux fonctionnaires furent pendus et l’affaire fut mise par écrit, en présence du roi lui-même, dans les Annales de l’empire .
Anglais: Now when the plot was investigated and found  to be true,  both men were  hanged on the gallows. And it was recorded in the Book of the Chronicles in the king’s presence.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fek caw law na'ta, na' gasiya. Nala sum sa patayna sa ma'na nisi ɓalsi kulo kat guna. Van kayni nisi ɗom hay ɗerwella vi Labar-Ma-Liyna, vok ir mulla.
Bulu: Eyoñ be maneya fas ajô, be nga yene na ajô ba boʼolô e nʼété. Nde be nga tyelé bebo bisaé bana bebaé yôp, a tili jame te e kalate ba tili mbaʼalane mame yʼéjôé, avale njô bôt émien a nga bendé.
Guiziga: A dirba taŋ mikaka virzi ngi ɓi nah na, a lumaka ɓi nah naŋ kaslsla kanah gisiŋ. A luwaka mizli munguɗo mucuw tayna tuwa, a muŋ. Waɗ a tohoko ɓi nah toh toh angi ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi buyoy, a mihiri ngi buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe linyi haala man, ngooŋɗini ka. Worɓe ɗiɗo go ɓilaama dow leɗɗe. Habaruuji ɗi'i fuu mbinndaama haa Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe yeeso laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe linyi haala man, ngooŋɗini ka. Worɓe ɗiɗo go ɓilaama dow leɗɗe. Habaruuji ɗi'i fuu mbinndaama haa Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe yeeso laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kia mgbara mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk'e nɛ́ kpasawen; nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ga̧i̧a o kpàná nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ te, gbɛ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kia mgbara mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa zɔk'e nɛ́ kpasawen; nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa ga̧i̧a o kpàná nɔ‘i yiitoo'i tɛ te, gbɛ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa neweve ghena shɛ mbeli, kaganda ŋkɛ. Pa mbeli peslekɛ mbeli nyi bake nyighɛ le zewe te sheghwə. Nahe ghena shɛ kerafete geva kwa kema ta meghe mbe palepa nya rafe wəshi mbeli.
Tupurri: AÈ kal kië wer waçaçre se no, aè wo da' ge äe do sen no taw taw no, jar ma de ndar äay ma äogn wo la aè äal ra go ciñ jag koo. Waçaçre sen la aè kal yerge äe äil kefder Kronig pel wañ ni tu señ.

Francais: Esther devient reine
Anglais: Vashti’s Successor Sought
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ester muɗi ca-mulda hay baŋal Vasti
Bulu: Esthe a bo nga njô bôt
Guiziga: Ester mitiri maˀãy
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asta laati debbo laamiiɗo
Fulfulde_DC: Asta laati debbo laamiiɗo
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr kifa ko-wan oi Vasti
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr kifa ko-wan oi Vasti
Kapsiki_DC: Ɛstɛr kazhɛre kamale ta meghe
Tupurri: Ester kol go ti waçywañ no

Francais: Mardochée découvre un complot
Anglais: Esther Finds Favor
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: Mardoke misina gidiɓi ngi mizli migaka
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay haa laamorde
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay haa laamorde
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mardochee kpasa wannu
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mardochee kpasa wannu
Kapsiki_DC: __Error__
Tupurri: Mardoke da' jar po wo mañ äaale wañ

Francais: Quelque temps après, le roi Xerxès combla d’honneurs Haman, fils de Hammedata et descendant d’Agag . Il l’éleva au poste de premier ministre.
Anglais: After these things King Ahasuerus (Xerxes) promoted Haman, the son of Hammedatha the  Agagite, and advanced him and  established his authority over all the officials who were with him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol slen kayni, mulla Asuwerus vul gaŋeraŋa mi Haman goora vi Hammedata, ma Agagitna, nam muɗum kulo ŋolo, nam muɗum kulo ŋolo kay sa yerimana sa ay ŋray hiɗi namna kafe.
Bulu: Eyoñe mam mete me maneya, njô bôt Asuérus a nga nene Aman, mone Amedata ya Agag, a nga bete nye nkôñ a telé nye éto ja dañ ôyabe yôb a lôte bi bivete bise ba be be be mbe nsamba wua.
Guiziga: Neˀ a dirba ɓi tayna mucohom na, Hama na, buy Zerses a vulaŋ li ngi slra mimadiɗa haɗa. Haman i mangal ngi Hamedata, mbur Agak. Buy a tiri ti Hama na ɗongor, a cifaŋ i madiɗa ngi mizli madiɗa ngi slra naŋhay gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo man laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus ɓaŋgti Hamman ɓii Hammedata, goɗɗo asŋgol Agag, ardini mo yeeso saraaki'en wonduɓe bee muuɗum fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo man laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus ɓaŋgti Hamman ɓii Hammedata, goɗɗo asŋgol Agag, ardini mo yeeso saraaki'en wonduɓe bee muuɗum fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wannu Zɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ gasa fara tom ha̧ Haman, bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag. A̧ baa a̧ e nɛ́ gasawi zu o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ mɔɔ nɔ‘i, wannu Zɛrzɛs ha̧a̧ gasa fara tom ha̧ Haman, bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag. A̧ baa a̧ e nɛ́ gasawi zu o gasawi kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta wəshi nyighɛ ne, pa meghe Sɛrsɛs ndeke nda zləvə ke Haman, wəzege ta Hamedata hwelefe ta Agag. Pa veyi ŋkɛ kawəndə nya kwele ma te ghəa pɛtɛa mbelia ŋkɛ nyi jama jama.
Tupurri: Blam waçaçre sen wo mokay, wañ Asuyerus kal kañ Haman je ni Hamedata ma ti wer mani Agag ti ngeel eegre ma kluu. AÀ kañn ti ngeel kluu maga go tinoo, haç ngeel hayle go ne hen ciñ ti wañre ma äiñ äen wo äuy.

Francais: Tous les fonctionnaires du palais s’agenouillaient et s’inclinaient jusqu’à terre devant Haman, car le roi en avait donné l’ordre. Seul Mardochée refusait de le faire.
Anglais: All the king’s servants who were at the king’s gate [in royal service] bowed down and honored  and  paid homage to Haman; for this is what the king had commanded in regard to him. But Mordecai [a Jew of the tribe of Benjamin] neither bowed down nor paid homage [to him].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa sunda kaf sa ka tokay hay faatana vi mulla ka girif gaa'a kay subur Haman. Mulla kay tuwamu vul hagat ki kayni nala. May Mardose min girif gaaɗi, dab vokom gaaɗi kaw.
Bulu: Biwôlô bebo bisaé bise ya nda njô bôt bi mbe bi kute meboñ a kumbu si asu Aman, amu njô bôt a nga bendé nalé. Ve Mardôsé étam a nga bene bo nalé.
Guiziga: Gawla migi slrahay misi a mamay buyo cek cek na, a huruk hurukam, a hinam huruk huruk a mbuŋ Hama na, asi buy a vula jiviɗ nah le kanah. Amma sey Mardoke anta huruk huruk ta, anta hin huruk a mbuŋ naŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo fuu tuggi koppi, cujidani Hamman fodde umroore laamiiɗo. Ammaa Mardokay tuggaay koppi mum, sujidaay boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo fuu tuggi koppi, cujidani Hamman fodde umroore laamiiɗo. Ammaa Mardokay tuggaay koppi mum, sujidaay boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom ko wannu lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nutua-wan kɔ̧-a̧ gbɛɛ zugur nù, gú nɛ̀ nù ti Haman, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ so zu mɔ ko Haman. Ɓɛɛ Mardochee de kɔ‘i hegɔ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom ko wannu lɛŋ nɛ̀ yaa so nutua-wan kɔ̧-a̧ gbɛɛ zugur nù, gú nɛ̀ nù ti Haman, nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ heembea nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ so zu mɔ ko Haman. Ɓɛɛ Mardochee de kɔ‘i hegɔ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa kweci ka mene slene ta meghe kagwəɗəŋə kwa kema ta Haman kahawe ve, kwa nza nde tsagha gezete meghe, deke Mardoshɛ nde ɗema kagwəɗəŋə kwa kema ta ŋkɛ kahawe ve we.
Tupurri: Weere joçoçre wañ maga wo de lagge jag tiñ ni mokay laa wo koyoçgre leë mondra pel Haman äuy, wañ hay waçaç go dosen nono. AÀma Mardoke hay bay dayge laa koyoçgre pel äe wa has, bay le' mondra pel äe wa lay.

Francais: Les autres fonctionnaires lui demandèrent pourquoi il désobéissait à l’ordre royal.
Anglais: Then the king’s servants who were at the king’s gate said to Mordecai, “Why are you disregarding the king’s command?”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa sunda vi mulla sa ka tokay hay faatana vi mulla di tam Mardose: Naŋ min li kuɗ vun-ma-gatna vi mullaɗi kay mige?
Bulu: Bebo bisaé bevok be nga sili nye na amu jé a nji ve abendé njô bôte mewôk.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, gawla migi slra ngi mamay buyoy tuwa gar, a ɓaka Mardoke: Ka mangila ɓi ngi buy muɗuva na vur mike?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo go ƴami mo: “Koni luutata umroore laamiiɗo?”
Fulfulde_DC: Huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo go ƴami mo: “Koni luutata umroore laamiiɗo?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom ko wannu nɛ̀ yaa so nú tua-wan'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee: «Wen ge sa mɛ gbin heembea ko wannu ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom ko wannu nɛ̀ yaa so nú tua-wan'i tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee: «Wen ge sa mɛ gbin heembea ko wannu ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke ka mene slene ta meghe sha Mardoshɛ ne, wa raberə dzawa na kənəa ghena ta meghe wa?
Tupurri: Weere joçoçre wañ maga wo de lagge jag jiñ ni wañ mokay kal wo wii Mardoke ga: Ndo cegaë jag wañ go na ga le la?

Francais: Chaque jour ils renouvelaient leur remarque sans que Mardochée en tienne compte. Comme il leur avait dit qu’il était juif, ils le dénoncèrent à Haman pour voir s’il persisterait dans sa résolution .
Anglais: Now it happened when they had spoken to him day after day and he would not listen to them, that they told Haman to see whether Mordecai’s reason [for his behavior] would stand [as valid]; for he had told them that he was a Jew.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka jobom nala hay buurta kafe, may nam min humsiɗi. Nisi vul labara mi Haman kay ɗuw ala Mardose ma jok varta valam klasige. Kay nam disi goy jew ala nam mi sa ma Yudiyana.
Bulu: Môs ôse be nga baʼalane kobô jam be nga yen, ve Mardôsé teke wôʼô be. A mbe a yalaʼane be na: Me ne mone Beyude. Nde be nga somane nye be Aman, be yangeʼe yen nge a ye kee mboone te ôsu.
Guiziga: Vur hin gar na, mizli ara ɓakaŋ di kanah, amma ko Mardoke anta cine taŋ di ta na si. Mardoke vuna ada ɓa taŋ zleˀe, naŋ i mbur Yude. Vurˀe, mizli ara faka ɓi nah da Hama na, ɓa a pura da Mardoke naŋ da nga naŋ nga naŋ ar gwat ngi gi naŋ kwana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe tokki ƴamgo mo nyalaade fuu, ammaa o nanaay ɓe. Nden ɓe ngecci ɗum Hamman, haa ɓe ngi'a to Mardokay daroto dow wolde mum ngam o wi'no ɓe o Yahuuduujo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe tokki ƴamgo mo nyalaade fuu, ammaa o nanaay ɓe. Nden ɓe ngecci ɗum Hamman, haa ɓe ngi'a to Mardokay daroto dow wolde mum ngam o wi'no ɓe o Yahuuduujo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa duka mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ hegɔ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii wen nú wa na. Ɓɛɛ wa we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yak'i ha̧ Haman ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk mgbara taamɔ ko Mardochee, wen Mardochee baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e, wi nɛ́ be Juif.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa duka mɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧ hegɔ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧ zii wen nú wa na. Ɓɛɛ wa we ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ yak'i ha̧ Haman ha̧ a̧ mɛ zɔk mgbara taamɔ ko Mardochee, wen Mardochee baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa'e, wi nɛ́ be Juif.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsagha 'yɛwe hɛ ve keveci keveci, ama kese kafa nda ke hɛ we. Kwa gezete nda ŋkɛ ke hɛ nde Zhəwif 'ya, a ke ne, pa hɛ gezete nda ke Haman kezha newe kenza ŋkɛ kazhɛne ghə.
Tupurri: De maga aà wo tum ti naw jag dogge äe ne hen day se bay laage äe wa mokay no, aà kal wo fer waçaçre sen ne Haman ma koge ga Mardoke ba mbe wuu yañ joñge do maga se go de ëiggi äe no lay bla, do ga aà hay go de wii rage ga se diñ Jwifi.

Francais: Haman constata que Mardochée refusait effectivement de s’agenouiller et de s’incliner devant lui, et il en fut rempli de colère.
Anglais: When Haman saw that Mordecai neither bowed down nor paid homage to him, he was furious.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Haman wi ala Mardose may girif gaa'a kay slum yalam kuloɗi, nam hob hiɗi ɦiyda ŋolo.
Bulu: Aman a nga yene foʼo na Mardôsé a bene kute meboñ a kumbu asu dé, ndʼa nga dañe wôʼôlun.
Guiziga: Haman a pura na, Mardoke anta huruk huruk a mbuŋ naŋ ta, yo naŋ anta hin huruk a mbuŋ naŋ ta ma. Dar Haman a slikiɗ himaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hamman yi'i Mardokay tuggaay koppi, sujidinaay mo, ɗum ɓernini mo masin.
Fulfulde_DC: Hamman yi'i Mardokay tuggaay koppi, sujidinaay mo, ɗum ɓernini mo masin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Haman zɔka'e Mardochee gbɛ zugur nù na, gú nù ti a̧ na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ see-aa nyim nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Haman zɔka'e Mardochee gbɛ zugur nù na, gú nù ti a̧ na mbɛt, ɓɛɛ see-aa nyim nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a,
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe Haman keɗepete kaganda ɗema Mardoshɛ kagwəɗəŋə kwa kema ta ŋkɛ kahawe ve. Petefe wənəa Haman wepenyɛ va ghena shɛ kwele kwele.
Tupurri: De maga Haman wo koge ga Mardoke bay laa koyoçgre pel se wa, bay le' mondra pel se wa mono, kal tï¡ï¡gi go de wañ.

Francais: On lui avait appris aussi que Mardochée était juif. Alors il jugea insuffisant de se venger de Mardochée seul et chercha un moyen d’exterminer les compatriotes de celui-ci, tous les Juifs qui vivaient dans l’empire de Xerxès.
Anglais: But he disdained laying hands on Mordecai alone, for they had told him  who  the people of Mordecai were (his nationality); so Haman determined to destroy all the Jews, the people of Mordecai, who  lived  throughout the kingdom of Ahasuerus.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ɗuw ala la nam cum goy mi Mardose valam kepe ni, kayn kiɗaya. Kay nisi dum kay jafna vi Mardose, Haman vara kay ci sumuna vi Mardose sa Yudiyana sa ka hay nagata vi Asuwerus goy kafe.
Bulu: Be nga kate fe nye na Mardôsé a ne mone Beyude. Ajô te a nga yene de mone jame na a kun émien ve be Mardôsé étam, nde a nga jeñe zene ya mane jiane bôte be Mardôsé e ne na, Beyude bese be nga too éjôé njô bôt Asuérus si.
Guiziga: Haman a pura ɓa a kiɗ vagay i Mardoke pal naŋ na, preˀe, asi mizli a ɓakaŋ di le, Mardoke i mbur Yude. Haman ara pur jiviɗ ɓa ngi ngizla sukwi ngi Mardokeheye, mizli Yudehey misi asi ruwuy ngi Zerses mazum buy anga gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde ɓe anndini mo ummaatoore Mardokay, o laari halkugo mo feere maako he'aay koo ɗume, ngam maajum o nufi nattingo Yahuudu'en wonɓe nder laamu Ahasuwerus fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde ɓe anndini mo ummaatoore Mardokay, o laari halkugo mo feere maako he'aay koo ɗume, ngam maajum o nufi nattingo Yahuudu'en wonɓe nder laamu Ahasuwerus fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ gbɛ Mardochee ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɔk ɓɛɛ na, wen wa baa tɔ̧ so dùk ko Mardochee ha̧ a̧. Hegɔ, a̧ kia yuwar mɛ kum dukbíí ko Mardochee, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e o be Juif lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn zaŋnu ko wannu Zɛrzɛs.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ kɔ̧ so mɛ gbɛ Mardochee ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpɔk ɓɛɛ na, wen wa baa tɔ̧ so dùk ko Mardochee ha̧ a̧. Hegɔ, a̧ kia yuwar mɛ kum dukbíí ko Mardochee, mɔ nɛ̀ tɔ̧‘e o be Juif lɛŋ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛn zaŋnu ko wannu Zɛrzɛs.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mbeli kegezete nda perə kande Zhəwif Mardoshɛ. Newe ke ne dewə nda Mardoshɛ kwetɛŋenyɛ kezha ha nda mpa ŋkɛ, mpəmte ka Zhəwif nyi te hɛɗia meghe Sɛrsɛs pɛtɛ yaɗe Haman, hwelefefia Mardoshɛ pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Ama aà kal koge ga Mardoke de see äe boñ tawa mokay se du'n gaa ëa, de el äen diñ ga se caa wer mani äe maga wo äi sir ni wañ Asuyerus ni mono go äuy, werga aà hay sii wer jar maga Mardoke aà le ni mono ne hene.

Francais: Au début de la douzième année du règne de Xerxès, le premier mois, ou mois de Nisan, Haman fit jeter les dés – qu’on appelait les pourim  – pour savoir quel jour et quel mois seraient favorables à ses plans. Le sort tomba sur le douzième mois ou mois de Adar.
Anglais: In the first month, the month of Nisan (Mar-Apr), in the  twelfth year of King Ahasuerus, Haman cast Pur, that is, the lot, cast before him day after day [to find a lucky day to approach the king], month after month, until the twelfth month, the month of Adar (Feb-Mar).
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay til ma jewna, ma yum ala tilla vi Nisan*, hay busata doogo yam ma'ta vi mulla Asuwerus, vok ir Haman, nisi li pur, kayni di'e: ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta, nisi li ŋaɓta kay buurta kaf, fok tam til ma jewn pa, ta-ta tam til ma doogo yam ma'na, kayni mi tilla vi Adar.
Bulu: Metataʼa me mbu awôm a baa Asuérus a nga jôô, ngon ôsu ba loone Nisañ, mme Aman a nga bo asimba a mekôʼô ba loone bepurim, mfaʼa ya yemelane môs a ngon bia yian asu mefeʼe ya minsôñane mié. Ane asimba e nga liti ngon awôm a baa ba loon Adar.
Guiziga: Ngi kiya muɓulaˀ naŋ, a mbiɗeˀvra, kiya mazilaka Nisaŋ, angi vi mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ ngi zumabuy ngi Zerses na, mizli a gam ceregezleŋ mazilaka Purim mbuŋ Hama na,  , ɓa ngi luuma hin mezle. A gaka vur hine vur hine, yo vur kiya vur kiya. Ceregezleŋ a diɗ ar kiya mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ, a mbiɗeˀvra, kiya Adar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus sappo e ɗiɗaɓu, nder lewru aranndu wi'eteendu Nisaanu, ɓe mbaɗi kur'u mbi'eteeŋgu Puur yeeso Hamman, ngam nyalɗe e lebbi fuu bee tokkindirki. Kur'u waŋgini lewru sappo e ɗiɗawru wi'eteendu Adar.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus sappo e ɗiɗaɓu, nder lewru aranndu wi'eteendu Nisaanu, ɓe mbaɗi kur'u mbi'eteeŋgu Puur yeeso Hamman, ngam nyalɗe e lebbi fuu bee tokkindirki. Kur'u waŋgini lewru sappo e ɗiɗawru wi'eteendu Adar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio-zɛ «Nisaŋ», tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Zɛrzɛs, wa pi̧i̧ tani nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Purim» ti Haman, sa nɛ̀ nin wese kpɔk kpɔk in fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt, hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio-zɛ «Adar», ɓɛɛ nɛ́ zu Adar a̧ tani baa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio-zɛ «Nisaŋ», tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan ko Zɛrzɛs, wa pi̧i̧ tani nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Purim» ti Haman, sa nɛ̀ nin wese kpɔk kpɔk in fio-zɛ kpɔk kpɔk mbɛt, hegɔ hɔ nɛnɛ tɛ ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ, nɛ̀ duk nɛ́ fio-zɛ «Adar», ɓɛɛ nɛ́ zu Adar a̧ tani baa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe va kwa meŋe bakeghəmbe ta Sɛrsɛs mbe meghe, te kwa ghate ta tere nya heka mbeli kaNisan ne, pa ŋkɛ slate kwasheghediɗi nya heka hɛ kaPəwrim, kezha newe hɛ le tere nya kehite geva le zəzə ta ŋkɛ. Pa kwasheghediɗi vate geva te tere kwa meŋe bakeghəmbe nya heka mbeli kaAdar.
Tupurri: Nen few ma tañgun ga diñ few Nisan, nen kiñgi ma de hwal ti äog maga wañ Asuyerus ti wañ äen mono, aà raw äo' Puri, kañ nen ga aè raw ndar waçywaàale pel Haman nen naw tum, nen few tum haçaç go ti few ma de hwal ti äog ga diñ few Adar mono.

Francais: Haman dit au roi Xerxès : « Majesté, il existe un peuple particulier, dont les membres sont dispersés dans toutes les provinces de ton empire. Ils vivent à part, ils suivent des coutumes qui ne ressemblent à celles d’aucun autre peuple et ils n’obéissent pas aux lois royales. Tu n’as pas intérêt à laisser ces gens-là tranquilles !
Anglais: Then Haman said to King Ahasuerus, “There is a certain people scattered [abroad] and dispersed among the peoples in all the provinces of your kingdom; their laws are different from  those  of all  other  people, and they do not observe the king’s laws. Therefore it is not in the king’s interest to [tolerate them and] let them stay  here .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Haman di tam mulla Asuwerus ala: Hay mulda vaŋu, jaf mara ka'a, nam ɦeleŋe  jar sum segen kaf, goy ir valamu hay mulda vaŋ kafe; gatta visiya goy va'a hiɗi jaf-sum segena, nisi may hum kuɗ gatta vi mulla noŋɗi, kayni may ŋaa'a kay hinsi hay tun-sukka loɗi.
Bulu: Ane Aman a nga jô njô bôt Asuérus na: Ayoñ éziñ e ne va, bôte yʼété be ne mmialan e mebôta mese yʼéjôé jôé. Ba nyiñ nkandan a bôte bevok, ba tôñ mboone mame wob ñwô ô nji funane wu ya ayoñ afe, a be nji ve metiñ me njô bôte mewôk. O nji yiane jôʼé bôte bete ne mieññ.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Haman a ɓa buy Zersese: «Kumani, mizli ada na, sukwi taŋ gwah pal, taŋ suɓulak a wuzla mizli ngir li buyoy miwaka taŋ gar asi ruwuy ɗik, ka mazum buy anga gar. Ɓimujuwa nga taŋ naŋ pal avu ngi mizli gar. Yo ɓi ngi ka buy mujuwa na, taŋ, t'anta sipaka ta. Ɓa ki pula taŋ setette kanah na, ko t'anta pulukuw gir neˀ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Hamman wi'i laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus: “Woodi ummaatoore saŋkitiinde caka ummaatooje goɗɗe nder lesɗe laamu maaɗa fuu. Ɓe kawtataa bee woɗɓe. Umrooje maɓɓe potaay bee umrooje ummaatooje goɗɗe, ɓe ɗowtantaako umrooje maaɗa boo, barkaama. Haanaay a munyana ɓe, barkaama.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Hamman wi'i laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus: “Woodi ummaatoore saŋkitiinde caka ummaatooje goɗɗe nder lesɗe laamu maaɗa fuu. Ɓe kawtataa bee woɗɓe. Umrooje maɓɓe potaay bee umrooje ummaatooje goɗɗe, ɓe ɗowtantaako umrooje maaɗa boo, barkaama. Haanaay a munyana ɓe, barkaama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Haman nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Zɛrzɛs: «Ŋma dukbíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ̀ de mɔ hee ko o dɔka-a ga na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ pɛsa dam tɛ o zika-nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ. O heembea kɔ-wa duk nɛtɛ mgbara o dɔka heembea ko o dukbíí, ɓɛɛ wa de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o heembea ko wannu na. Ká wannu é wa géè na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Haman nɛɛ tɔ̧ ha̧ wannu Zɛrzɛs: «Ŋma dukbíí a̧a̧ sɛnɛ nɛtɛ, nɛ̀ de mɔ hee ko o dɔka-a ga na, ɓɛɛ nɛ̀ pɛsa dam tɛ o zika-nù k’ɛ́nɛ́ lɛŋ. O heembea kɔ-wa duk nɛtɛ mgbara o dɔka heembea ko o dukbíí, ɓɛɛ wa de mɔ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o heembea ko wannu na. Ká wannu é wa géè na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Haman sha meghe Sɛrsɛs: «Maze yawe, le kweci hwelefefia kweci mbeli shɛ hwa mbelia ŋa, nahe hɛ ketazeyi geva dzeyi hwa mbeli te yayata sla ta hɛɗi nya te hɛɗi meghea ŋa. Tekeleke ŋa nci nza, tekeleke ŋa nci wəshi mahalegə, kayɛ fete hɛ tɛape yitea wəsə mahalegəa meghe we. Kehi na kasərə hɛ tsagha gwezlayɛ we meghe we.
Tupurri: Ti ngeel sen Haman kal wii wañ Asuyerus ga: Ti coçoç sir äon wo äuy maga wañ äon de baa jag ni mono, jar po yañ wo le go de dusgi la ni, wo sar de jar sir äo lan wo no. AÀ wo de waçaçre liñgi äaara sar de jar ma äuy no, day bay wo seege wer jag liñgi mani wañn wa. Jar sen wo mo haç' men ge wo wañ ëeged gaa, day da'ge äe po bay see äaara ni wa hase.

Francais: Si tu le juges bon, veuille donner par écrit l’ordre de les exterminer. Je remettrai alors trois cents tonnes d’argent aux fonctionnaires chargés de l’administration de l’empire pour qu’ils les déposent dans le trésor royal . »
Anglais: If it pleases the king, let it be decreed that they be destroyed, and I will pay ten thousand talents of silver into the hands of those who carry out the  king’s  business, to put into the king’s treasuries.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: La naŋ mulla mina, naŋ ma ɗo gatta kay vatsi goyo, nala nan ma tar gurjuta ir talente* birim doogo hay ɓam sumuna vaŋ sa lopna, kay cuka' hay timgilla vaŋu.
Bulu: Nge wo yene nalé mvaé, kañeseʼe ve abendé, e too ntilan ya mane jiane be. Wôna ma ye ve betalañ be argent toyini awôm e mo bebo bisaé yʼéjôé na be ke futi be nda énaan akume njô bôt.
Guiziga: Da ki hĩyã le na buy, ɓi ɗaˀ si na, i tohom ɗerewol toh toh ɓa ngi ngizla taŋ. Ya kwana, yi ra vul suloy bara kilo durmuk skat skat makir a haŋ migi slra ngi si ruwuy ka mazum buy anga gar, ɓa taŋ kwana, a sa paka ng'ar zlili ngi ɗik ka buyo.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To ɗum fottani ma, barkaama, umru mbardugo ɓe. Min boo mi hokkan cardi kilo ujine cappanɗe tati (30.000) haa huuwanɓe kuugal ngal, ɓe nastina ndi nder ndesaari laamu.”
Fulfulde_DC: To ɗum fottani ma, barkaama, umru mbardugo ɓe. Min boo mi hokkan cardi kilo ujine cappanɗe tati (30.000) haa huuwanɓe kuugal ngal, ɓe nastina ndi nder ndesaari laamu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha'i mɛ kum wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mɔi̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar-nɛ-booro-ɓu-naar a er o wi-kasi-sede wen tom-nù.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: K’ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ yɔ́r mɔ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ ha'i mɛ kum wa, ɓɛɛ mi tɛ mɔi̧ kilo bu-mbɔi booro-gɔmŋmaa-taar-nɛ-booro-ɓu-naar a er o wi-kasi-sede wen tom-nù.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kenza nde kayɛte meghe ne, pa mbeli rafete kezha zamte hɛ mbeli. 'Ya le ghəa ɗa ne, kave nda mze kwa tɛawetɛa 'ya kakiləwə 300.000, ke ka mene slene ta meghe kezha bete hɛ mbe ŋkwa nya tsene wəshi ganjia meghe mbeli.»
Tupurri: Hayga sen coo yañ jag wañ no, daga yer waçaçre po go ti jag wañ ma taw rage go, day ni ndi ngaä solay yañ go nen boo solay ton kiskis swa' ma haçge ne jar joñren wo do ma laage äi boole solay mani wañ no.

Francais: Le roi enleva son anneau et le remit à l’adversaire des Juifs, Haman, fils de Hammedata et descendant d’Agag .
Anglais: Then the king removed his signet ring from his hand [that is, the special ring which was used to seal his letters] and gave it to Haman, the son of Hammedatha the Agagite, the enemy of the Jews.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla pat wayta ta ɓalamta, nam vula' mi Haman goora vi Hammedata, ma Agagitna, sa ma gaw kay sa Yudiyana.
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga vaa élondo ônyu vié a kee je Aman, e mone Amedata ya Agag, nsiñe Beyude.
Guiziga: Ar nah na, buy a cuko dangwa naŋ ngi muzuŋ haŋ, a ca da Haman mangal ngi Hamedata, mbur Agak, mesene ngi Yudeheye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo itti halagaare lammba haa juŋngo mum, hokki nde Hamman ɓii Hammedata Agagiijo, konneejo Yahuudu'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo itti halagaare lammba haa juŋngo mum, hokki nde Hamman ɓii Hammedata Agagiijo, konneejo Yahuudu'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu kpɔ̧i̧a̧ wele kɔ‘i mɛ er, ɓɛɛ ba ha̧ Haman bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag wi-kur-zu o be Juif.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu kpɔ̧i̧a̧ wele kɔ‘i mɛ er, ɓɛɛ ba ha̧ Haman bem ko Hamdata, bezaŋ Agag wi-kur-zu o be Juif.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe seɗemte ŋgwedɛba nya te dzeve ta ŋkɛ nya nza lamba te, kandeke nda ke nde ghema ta ka Zhəwif, Haman wəzege ta Hamedata, hwelefe ta Agag.
Tupurri: Wañ kal naa boo ma do äen go haçn ne Haman je ni Hamedata, wer mani Agag je hee jar jwif wo no.

Francais: « Garde ton argent, lui dit-il ; quant à ce peuple, je te l’abandonne, fais-en ce que tu voudras ! »
Anglais: The king said to Haman, “The silver is given to you, and the people  also,  to do with them as you please.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di tam Haman, gurjuta na' vaŋu, sumun kaw, laŋ va ma kiraŋ ŋaana.
Bulu: Njô bôt a nga jô Aman na: Baʼaleʼe argent wôé, mfaʼa ya ayoñe bôte di, ma kee fe wo de, boʼo de jam wo kômbô!
Guiziga: A dirba nah na, buy a ɓa Hama na: «Mbak dala ɗike gwat ɗiki, yo mizli tayna kwana, ka gi ti taŋ kaɓa ka muwuɗu.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o wi'i mo: “Cardi man, an jeyi e ummaatoore nde boo waɗ nde ko fottani ma.”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o wi'i mo: “Cardi man, an jeyi e ummaatoore nde boo waɗ nde ko fottani ma.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Haman: «O wi nɔ‘i in mbɔi kɔ-wa a̧a̧ er-mɛ. Mɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ́ de in wa.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Haman: «O wi nɔ‘i in mbɔi kɔ-wa a̧a̧ er-mɛ. Mɛ̀ dé mɔ nɛ̀ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ mɛ́ de in wa.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe sha Haman: «Nza mze kwa tɛawetɛa ta ŋa. Mene wəsə nya ɗe na le mbelia shɛhɛ.»
Tupurri: Wañ wii Haman ga: Ëaw mbo solay äo no, ama ma jar sen wo mo haç' joñ mbo ra do ga äil äo da nono, ndi go de haç rage mo do.

Francais: Le treizième jour du premier mois, les secrétaires royaux furent convoqués. Selon les indications de Haman, ils écrivirent des lettres et les adressèrent aux représentants du roi, aux gouverneurs de chaque province et aux chefs de chaque peuple. Elles étaient rédigées dans tous les systèmes d’écriture et dans toutes les langues utilisées dans l’empire. On les signa au nom du roi Xerxès et on les cacheta avec son anneau.
Anglais: Then the king’s scribes (secretaries) were summoned on the thirteenth day of the first month, and it was written just as Haman commanded to the king’s satraps (chief rulers), and to the governors who were over each province and to the officials of each people, each province according to its script (writing), each people according to their own language; being written in the name of King Ahasuerus and sealed with the king’s signet ring.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta doogo yam ɦidita vi til ma jewna, mulla yi sa ɗota valam kaf, sle ma Haman vulsi gatta kalamna nisi dum goy tam sa ŋarmanna vi mulla kaf, tam sa guvernera vi naga ma kuɗumna kaf, hiɗi sa yerimana vi jaf-sumun kaf, tam nagata tarige kaw hiɗi ɗota va'a va'a, tam jaf marige kaw hiɗi vunna valamu valamu. Nisi ɗom kayni hiɗi semda vi mulla Asuwerus, tun tampoŋ kalamu hiɗi wayta vi mulla.
Bulu: Be nga loone betili bekalate be njô bôt e ngon ôsu é too melu awôm a mela; be nga tili bekalate aval Aman a nga liti a lôme be e be bijiane bi njô bôt, e be bengovina ya mebôta mesi a e be bivete ya meyoñ . Bekalate bete be mbe ntilan e mevale mintilan mese a e minkobô mise ba belane mie éjôé. Be nga sane be jôé njô bôt Asuérus a futi atok a élondo njô bôt.
Guiziga: Ti hin mukuruˀ nga makir ngi kiya mudumbuŋ na, a ziloko mizli mutoho ɗerewol ngi buyoyo cek cek. Haman a ɓa taŋ, ɓa a tohom letirey kaɓa naŋ mavula taŋ jiviɗ ngi tuh naŋ. A tohoko da mijingaˀ ngi buy miwi li ngir lihey, da buy miwi lihey purla purla gar, da buy ngi wuzla sukwi ngi mizli pal pal gar. A tohoko ng'ar li ngi buy gar, kaɓa toho gwat nga taŋ, yo da sukwi ngi mizli gar ti mi taŋ ti mi taŋ. A tohoko ti slimiɗ ngi buyo waɗ haŋ naŋ taˀ taˀ araŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde sappo e tataɓre nder lewru aranndu, ɓe ewni winndooɓe laamiiɗo, Hamman umri ɓe ko ɓe mbinndanta ngomna'en e wakiili'en lesɗe e mawɓe ummaatooje fuu – haa lesdi koo ndiye bee binndol mum e ummaatoore koo ndeye bee wolde mum. Ɓe mbinndi bataakeeji bee innde laamiiɗo, nden Hamman waɗani ɗi lammba bee halagaare go.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde sappo e tataɓre nder lewru aranndu, ɓe ewni winndooɓe laamiiɗo, Hamman umri ɓe ko ɓe mbinndanta ngomna'en e wakiili'en lesɗe e mawɓe ummaatooje fuu – haa lesdi koo ndiye bee binndol mum e ummaatoore koo ndeye bee wolde mum. Ɓe mbinndi bataakeeji bee innde laamiiɗo, nden Hamman waɗani ɗi lammba bee halagaare go.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ kuti fio-zɛ hɔɔ zɛ ɓu-zua-taar, wa saa o wi-yɔr-mɔ ko wannu tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Haman, ha̧ o be-wan in o gasawi zu nù tɛ zika-nu-wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk. Wa yɔra mɔ ha̧ zika-nù kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú kɔ-wa. Wa yɔra mɔ‘i nɛ̀ nin wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e dap-wele kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ  tumbal  sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ kuti fio-zɛ hɔɔ zɛ ɓu-zua-taar, wa saa o wi-yɔr-mɔ ko wannu tɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ wa yɔr mɔ lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tɔ̧ɔ̧-wen ko Haman, ha̧ o be-wan in o gasawi zu nù tɛ zika-nu-wan kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ, ká bá nɛ̀ o gasawi zu dukbíí kpɔk kpɔk. Wa yɔra mɔ ha̧ zika-nù kpɔk kpɔk nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ nú kɔ-wa. Wa yɔra mɔ‘i nɛ̀ nin wannu Zɛrzɛs, ɓɛɛ wa e dap-wele kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ  tumbal  sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hekakɛ ka rafe wəshi nyi te hɛɗia meghe pɛtɛ, te kwa meŋe mahekeneghəmbe ta hɛ mbe tere kwa ghate. Kala nya gezete Haman ne, pa hɛ rafete yɛ palepa ba'a ghweneghe nda hɛ ke mbelia jama ta meghe, ka ŋgwamna nyi te ghəa pɛtɛa yɛ sla ta hɛɗi ba'a ke mbeli nyi te ghəa yayata hwelefe. Le yayata ntsehwelea rafe wəsə le yayata ghena rafete palepa shɛhɛ mbeli. Pa mbeli rafete te sləa meghe Sɛrsɛs kamenate lamba te le ŋgwedɛba ta meghe nyagha.
Tupurri: AÀ kal ëe jar yerge mani wañn wo le nen naw ma de hwal ti swa' no, nen few ma tañgu no. AÀ kal yer waçaçre maga Haman waçaç ra ne satrapn  wo de guferner ma ti coçoç sir mani wañn wo ma honla äuy yoo äaara, ne wañre wer jar ma honla maga wo ti coçoç sir no, faage maga aà yer wo jag äaara de äe, ne jar ma hon wo la de jag äaara. AÀ joñ nen yer yerge sen wo diñ ti ëu wañ Asuyerus, blam äe boo ma do äen de kañge ni.

Francais: Des messagers furent chargés de porter ces lettres dans chaque province de l’empire. Elles donnaient l’ordre de détruire, tuer, massacrer tous les Juifs, jeunes et vieux, femmes et enfants, et de piller leurs biens. Cette extermination devait être réalisée un jour précis, le treizième jour du douzième mois ou mois de Adar.
Anglais: Letters were sent by couriers to all the king’s provinces to destroy, to kill and to annihilate all the Jews, both young and old, women and children, in one day, the thirteenth [day] of the twelfth month, which is the month of Adar (March 7, 473  b . c .), and to seize their belongings as plunder.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɗota jokay goy hay nagata vi mulla kaf, ala nisi ma ci sa Yudiyana goyo, vatsi goyo, ɦilifsi goy kafe, guro sa joriyona hiɗi sa maariyana, gurosgurayna hiɗi boyna, vatsi goy hay buur kep, hay buurta doogo yam ɦidita vi til ma doogo yam ma'na -- kayn mi tilla vi Adar. Nala farayna visi kaf sumun as tum goy ɓuraŋi.
Bulu: Minlôman mi nga kee bekalate bete abôta si ese ya éjôé. Abendé ya bekalate bete e mbe na: Be tyik a wôé Beyude bese éngôngole momo: bisoé a minnôm, binga a bongô, a sa akume dap. Njiane te wo yiane bobane ngume môs e ne na ngon awôm a baa ba loon Adar é too melu awôm a mela.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, a slinam ti letireye kutum kutum ng'ar lihey, buyoy miwaka taŋ gar asi hirwuy ngi buy Zerese. I letir ngi vula jiviɗ ngi ngizla Yudehey, ngi kiɗa taŋ vagay vagay, yo waɗ ngi ngizla hilfa taŋ cek, gawla ati diilihey, midigilahay, ziri ati ngwasay gar. Ɓa a ngizlaka taŋ pay ar hin purla si, i hin mukuruˀ nga makir ngi kiya mukuruˀ nga cuw naŋ, a mbiɗeˀvra, kiya Adar. Yo ɓa a hilaka zlili taŋhaya ma kini.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O neldi bataakeeji man bee yaawɗotooɓe haa lesɗe laamiiɗo fuu bee umroore mbarugo e halkugo e nattingo Yahuudu'en fuu, derke'en e ndotti'en, ɓikkoy e rewɓe e jaɓtugo kuuje maɓɓe, nder nyalaade woore, waato nyannde sappo e tataɓre nder lewru sappo e ɗiɗawru wi'eteendu Adar.
Fulfulde_DC: O neldi bataakeeji man bee yaawɗotooɓe haa lesɗe laamiiɗo fuu bee umroore mbarugo e halkugo e nattingo Yahuudu'en fuu, derke'en e ndotti'en, ɓikkoy e rewɓe e jaɓtugo kuuje maɓɓe, nder nyalaade woore, waato nyannde sappo e tataɓre nder lewru sappo e ɗiɗawru wi'eteendu Adar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o betom kaia o kalata nɔ‘i, pɛsi dam tɛ o zika-nù lɛŋ, ha̧ wa mɛ kum o be Juif, o be-ŋgaiwi gú nɛ̀ o sɔkawi, o obem in o okoo, kpɔk kale wese lɛŋ, sɛn tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Adar», in wen kaia o mbɔi kɔ-wa lɛŋ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o betom kaia o kalata nɔ‘i, pɛsi dam tɛ o zika-nù lɛŋ, ha̧ wa mɛ kum o be Juif, o be-ŋgaiwi gú nɛ̀ o sɔkawi, o obem in o okoo, kpɔk kale wese lɛŋ, sɛn tɛ ɓu-zua-taar ɔɔ-zɛ ko ɓu-zua-yiitoo fio-zɛ nɛ̀ wa sa'e «Adar», in wen kaia o mbɔi kɔ-wa lɛŋ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ghwenakɛ palepa shɛhɛ kahe kahe kadzete yayata sla ta hɛɗi meghe. Pa palepa shɛhɛ gezete kampə, kaghazle ba'a kaza sebe te pɛtɛa ka Zhəwif, ka mempɛhwetɛti ba'a ka meha mehɛɗi, ŋwale ba'a mi mbe veci kwetɛŋe, hɛ meŋe mahekeneghəmbe mbe tere kwa meŋe bakeghəmbe nya katerea Adar ba'a kezha fə wəshia nci.
Tupurri: AÀ kal laa jar peele wo de kefder go ti coçoç sir mani wañ wo äuy ma ndreë rage go, ma id rage go, ma caa wer jar Jwif wo go äuy, ma joçoç, ma de taçaçbe, weere kleere wo de naare wo äuy. Sen diñ nen naw boñ, naw ma de hwal ti swa' nen few ma de hwal ti äogn ga diñ few Adare, blam äe ni feçeçre äaaran äuy frum ra go.

Francais: Dans chaque province, la lettre reçue devait avoir force de loi et être portée à la connaissance de tout le monde pour que chacun soit prêt à agir au jour fixé.
Anglais: A copy of the edict to be decreed as law in every province was published to all the peoples, so that they would be ready for this day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ɗerwelda na'ta ka ɗoy goy hay nagata kaf, kay vula' goy haraŋi kir sumuna kaf a nisi ma lak hiɗi tuwsi kotiya hay buur namna.
Bulu: Abôta éjôé ése, kalate be nga nyoñ a nga yiane bi ngule yʼatiñ, a bôte bese be nga yiane yeme jame te, ane môt ase a ne tabe nkômane ya bo jam e ne ntyiʼan e môs ô ne ntelan.
Guiziga: Ar li ngi buy miwi li gar na, letir nah a tiri le i ɓi micica, ɓa a tilam di mi da mizli gar, ɓa mizli a wam vu weˀ le vur hin muɗuva tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Misaalu bataakewol go waŋgini umroore ngam lesdi koo ndiye, nde wooyne caka ummaatooje fuu haa ɗe taaskano nyalaade man.
Fulfulde_DC: Misaalu bataakewol go waŋgini umroore ngam lesdi koo ndiye, nde wooyne caka ummaatooje fuu haa ɗe taaskano nyalaade man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kalata'i tɛ duk nɛ́ heembea nɛ̀‘i tɛ tɔr ha̧ o bíí dam tɛ zika-nu-wan ko Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, wen ha̧ kóó o ndé mɛ ɗafi mɔ pɛm nɛ̀ wese'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kalata'i tɛ duk nɛ́ heembea nɛ̀‘i tɛ tɔr ha̧ o bíí dam tɛ zika-nu-wan ko Zɛrzɛs lɛŋ, wen ha̧ kóó o ndé mɛ ɗafi mɔ pɛm nɛ̀ wese'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe yayata sla ta hɛɗi, ma palepa nyi kemave mbeli ne, nda ŋkɛ kanza le berete ta wəsə mahalegə nya kegeze nda ke mbeli kezha hi geva hɛ kamene te hɛ nya sləyi mbeli.
Tupurri: Kefder sen wo mokay te äe yañ ni ma äesge wo go day ma waçaçge wo go ti coçoç sir wo äuy, wii jarn wo ni äuy ga aà mo lag wo go gorge wur sen mañe.

Francais: Sur l’ordre du roi les messagers partirent à toute vitesse, puis le décret fut publié dans la citadelle de Suse. Alors le roi et Haman s’installèrent pour boire, tandis que la ville de Suse était plongée dans la consternation .
Anglais: The couriers went out hurriedly by order of the king, and the decree was issued at the citadel in Susa. And while the king and Haman sat down to drink, the city of Susa was perplexed [by the unusual and alarming decree].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Labara kali goy gosoyo kuɗ va ma mulla di'e, labara namna ɓakay goyo hay Susa, naga ŋolda. Mulla hiɗi Haman lakay gaa'a kay ti'e. Sum sa hay hoyok-ziyna kaf ka hay tiyna.
Bulu: Bekatefoé be nga ke avô avale njô bôt a nga bendé, wôna ntyiʼan ô nga kateban e beta tisone Suz. Njô bôt ba Aman be nga too si a nyu, ve tisone Suz é mbe feʼe ne vema.
Guiziga: Buy miɓi ɗaˀ si na, misliney a wusam vu kutum kutum ng'ar liheye si, yo ɓi micica nah, a tilam di mi le a Sus, walahay hirnga. Hirak ti nah na, naɓa buy ati Haman a cifam le, ara sam mbaazla. Amma walahay Sus taˀ gar na, ɓi nah a ga taŋ ngirkik lambaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaawɗotooɓe ndilli bee jaawal fodde umroore laamiiɗo. Umroore man waŋgi nder laamorde Suuza. Laamiiɗo e Hamman njooɗi, njardi, ammaa yimɓe nder berniwol Suuza cakli.
Fulfulde_DC: Yaawɗotooɓe ndilli bee jaawal fodde umroore laamiiɗo. Umroore man waŋgi nder laamorde Suuza. Laamiiɗo e Hamman njooɗi, njardi, ammaa yimɓe nder berniwol Suuza cakli.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ  ha̧a̧nú  ko wannu, o kalata nɔ‘i yaka nɛ̀ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɔr heembea'i dam sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu Zɛrzɛs in Haman biti ya kɔ‘i nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ in ŋmaa, o bíí saaye Suzɛ sakala tɛ taamɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛn tɛ  ha̧a̧nú  ko wannu, o kalata nɔ‘i yaka nɛ̀ haya-a, ɓɛɛ wa tɔr heembea'i dam sɛn ŋgárá Suzɛ mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu Zɛrzɛs in Haman biti ya kɔ‘i nɔ nɛ̀ mɔ in ŋmaa, o bíí saaye Suzɛ sakala tɛ taamɔ kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kahe kahe palepa ghweneghe geva va ghena nya gezete meghe, Pa mbeli zlapete mbe Səze, meleme nya berete. Ntishɛ yɛ meghe le Haman kasa wəsə. Ama kwetɛ kwetɛŋe mehele ta mbeli nyi mbe Səze.
Tupurri: Jar peelen kal wo rawge de ëee deparday ti jag wañ. Waçaçre ma ti jag wañ la aè dusn go äi leege Sus meene sirn lay. De sen ni mono wañ wo de Haman wo de joo yii äaara, de maga äi leege Sus äuy de daëge mono.

Francais: Conflit entre Haman et Mardochée
Anglais: Haman’s Plot against the Jews
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Haman muɗi kir mulla ŋaa ŋolo, ɗerwelda kay ci sa Yudiyana goy kafe
Bulu: Mejô e zañe Aman ba Mardôsé
Guiziga: Kire ar wala ngi ti Haman ati Mardoke
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hamman nufi nattingo Yahuudu'en
Fulfulde_DC: Hamman nufi nattingo Yahuudu'en
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Haman ee nú mɛ kum o be Juif
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Haman ee nú mɛ kum o be Juif
Kapsiki_DC: Ghema nya kwelɛ yɛ Haman le Mardoshɛ
Tupurri: Le'ge kaçaçra ma ti holañ Haman wo de Mardoke

Francais: Haman prépare l’extermination des Juifs
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: Haman mujuw vu ngi ngizla Yudehey
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Haman kazəzə ntsehwele keza ka Zhəwif
Tupurri: Haman grag go ma taw jar jwif wo go

Francais: Dès que Mardochée apprit ce qui s’était passé, il déchira ses vêtements, se vêtit d’une étoffe de deuil et répandit de la cendre sur sa tête. Il parcourut la ville en poussant de grands cris de douleur.
Anglais: Now when Mordecai learned of everything that had been done, he tore his clothes [in mourning], and put on sackcloth and ashes, and went out into the center of the city and cried out loudly and bitterly.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Mardose hum labara kay slen ma ka li'e, nam jet sligara valam goyo, cuk bolla talamu, cuk butuwn kalamu kay tuɗ hay hoyok-ziyna, nam ka tiy tiy ma hawn ŋolo.
Bulu: Eyoñe Mardôsé a nga yem jam ese da lôtan, a nga nyabe mengômesane mé, ve jaé nkuta a woban asub a bômane ki tison, a kele a yône ñyône mintaé.
Guiziga: Mardoke micina ɓi nah cin na, a ngira zana naŋ ngi vu vuhoy avra, a ki zana ngi vagay, waɗ a pi fucu a hirnga. A bi puɗak walahaya bal ti widi kaɗam kaɗam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Mardokay nani haala man fuu, o seeki limce maako, o ɓorni limce buhuuje , o rufi ndoondi dow hoore maako. Nden o yehi nder berniwol, o ɗon woya bee sawtu,
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Mardokay nani haala man fuu, o seeki limce maako, o ɓorni limce buhuuje , o rufi ndoondi dow hoore maako. Nden o yehi nder berniwol, o ɗon woya bee sawtu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mardochee zia mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧k o laa tɛ yinɛ, pi̧ laa-bufu, a bùk zu, gɔm ye saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ bee-gara yaknɛ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mardochee zia mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ a̧k o laa tɛ yinɛ, pi̧ laa-bufu, a bùk zu, gɔm ye saaye, hiɗi nɛ̀ mɔ nɛ̀ bee-gara yaknɛ nɛ̀ ɗaŋsee.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate wəsə nya kemenete geva Mardoshɛ ne, ŋkwahe ŋkɛ sha lekwesa ta ŋkɛ, pa hwepahwe wəsə hwa hwə ba'a behwekɛ ghəa ŋkɛ le pəsəɗə. Cape kadzeyi mbe meleme le lewela nya ndiremi.
Tupurri: Mardoke laa waçaçre sen äuy, kal ngar oçoçbe ma ti äen go, kal laa oçoçbe ma de yugudgi ti äe, kal bug saçaçge ti äe. Blam äe kal rawge äi leege ngar jag debaycoçoçre kloñ kloñe.

Francais: Arrivé devant le palais royal, il s’arrêta, car personne n’avait le droit d’y pénétrer en tenue de deuil.
Anglais: He went [only] as far as the king’s gate, because no one was to enter the king’s gate dressed in sackcloth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ta-ta nam co goy vok faatana vi mulla, la sa gigekaw cuki hiɗi sligar bolla talamu, nam as co vun faatana vi mullaɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñ a nga kui ôsu ya nda njô bôt, a nga tebe, amu môt éziñ a nji bi ngule ya nyiin été a beʼe mengômesane meyep.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Mardoke a ndil sesẽŋ a mizlingre buyo waɗ a cici deŋ. Asi mike na, mbur miki zana ngi vagay le na, a tuwuɗa mizlingre ngi buyo ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa o ɓadi yolnde laamiiɗo, ngam ɓorniiɗo limce buhuuje duŋanaaka nastugo nder maare.
Fulfulde_DC: haa o ɓadi yolnde laamiiɗo, ngam ɓorniiɗo limce buhuuje duŋanaaka nastugo nder maare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ nú garo ko wannu fara nɛ̀ bíí nyɛm so mɛ ye sɛnɛ nɛ̀ laa-bufu tɛ̀ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ nɛ́ɛ̀ hɔ nú garo ko wannu fara nɛ̀ bíí nyɛm so mɛ ye sɛnɛ nɛ̀ laa-bufu tɛ̀ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa'a ŋkɛ kwa degha ta ghɛ meghe, pa ghereŋenyɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ kaɗema wəndə nya kehwepahwe wəsə hwa hwə kadzeki ghɛ meghe.
Tupurri: Raw wo jag tiñ ni wañ ti ngeel maga faage bay de haçge ne jobo ma kalge liñ ni de oçoçbe ma de yugudgi ti ni wa mono.

Francais: Dans chaque province de l’empire, partout où le décret royal était parvenu, les Juifs furent plongés dans un grand accablement : ils jeûnaient, pleuraient et se lamentaient ; beaucoup d’entre eux revêtaient des étoffes de deuil et se couchaient sur de la cendre .
Anglais: In each and every province that the decree and law of the king reached, there was great mourning among the Jews, with fasting, weeping and wailing; and many lay on sackcloth and ashes.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay nagata kaf, hay liyn kaf ma dita hiɗi ɗota vi mulla coy haya, sum sa Yudiyana kaf tun caw ti do'olla, nisi li laata, tiya, yor tuwsi ŋolo kaw; sumuna ŋolo bur gaa hay sligar bolla, hay butuwna kaw.
Bulu: E mebôta mese yʼéjôé, vôm atiñe njô bôt e nga kateban, Beyude be mbe ve miñyôn: be nga tyi bidi, be nga kuli miliʼi mis a yôn; abui ya be be e nga jaé mengômesane meyep a bômbô asub été.
Guiziga: Ɓi buy miɓa ati ɓi naŋ ɓi micica tuwa, mindil le angi hirwuy ngi buy miwi lihey cek na, naɓa Yudehey a roko ti tuwuy ngi vagay: a gam dalyam, a tuwam kol kol, a tuwam kaɗam kaɗam, mizli haɗi a hinam ar buh, ar fucu.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder lesdi koo ndiye, haa umroore laamiiɗo nde'e yotti fuu, suno maŋngo ukkani Yahuudu'en. Ɓe cuumi, ɓe mboyi bee gonɗi, ɗuuɗɓe mbaali dow buhuuje e doɗɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder lesdi koo ndiye, haa umroore laamiiɗo nde'e yotti fuu, suno maŋngo ukkani Yahuudu'en. Ɓe cuumi, ɓe mboyi bee gonɗi, ɗuuɗɓe mbaali dow buhuuje e doɗɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zika-nù lɛŋ, fara nɛ̀  ha̧a̧nú  in geŋa ko wannu hɔ sɛnɛ, gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ baa o be Juif lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ wa zim yì, hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧, ai nɛ̀ nú, ɓɛɛ o ŋma nɛ̀ dɔka-a ɔ kɔ‘i nù nɛ̀ bufu zu bùk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zika-nù lɛŋ, fara nɛ̀  ha̧a̧nú  in geŋa ko wannu hɔ sɛnɛ, gɛ̧ɛ̧mɔ baa o be Juif lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ wa zim yì, hí̧í̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧, ai nɛ̀ nú, ɓɛɛ o ŋma nɛ̀ dɔka-a ɔ kɔ‘i nù nɛ̀ bufu zu bùk.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe yayata sla ta hɛɗi nya ntsehe ghena ta meghea shɛ ne, nehwene nya wəba ya va ka Zhəwif pɛtɛ: kamene səwəmayɛ hɛ, kanehwene hɛ, kaŋgaɗe ghə hɛ, kahwepe wəshi hɛ hwa hwə ba'a kaɓelahe hɛ hwa pəsəɗə.
Tupurri: Ti coçoç sirn wo äuy ti ngeel maga waçaçre wañn go de dayge ni do maga aà go de waçaçge no mono, lawge ma kluu raw joñge ti holañ jar Jwif wo debañ. AÀ heçeç wo bii, ra wo, law wo yoo äaara debañ, suë wo de oçoçbe ma de yugudgi wo de saçaçge ti.

Francais: Les servantes et les eunuques de la reine Esther vinrent lui raconter ce qu’ils avaient vu et elle en fut très effrayée. Elle envoya des vêtements à Mardochée pour qu’il quitte sa tenue de deuil, mais il les refusa.
Anglais: When Esther’s maids and her eunuchs came and told her [what had happened], the queen was seized by great fear. She sent garments to clothe Mordecai so that he would remove his sackcloth, but he did not accept them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro-boy sa sun Ester hiɗi sa patayna va'a mara' labar namna, nala ca-mulda sutiya' to kaɗa-kaɗa'. Na' jok sligar mi Mardose kay nam ma cukum talamu hay baŋal bolla, may Mardose minɗi.
Bulu: Bengo be binga be mbe be saane Esthe a bebaʼale bé be nga zu kate nye jam be nga yen, a a nga dañe ko woñ. A nga lôme Mardôsé mengômesane na a vaa ma meyep, ve a nga ben.
Guiziga: Zir mongoso migi slra ngi Esterey ati mizli munguɗo migi slra naŋhaya, a soko faka ɓi nah da Estere, hã ɓi nah a zliɗa lesl da maˀãy Estere teˀe. A dirba nah na, Ester a slin ti zanahay da Mardoke, ɓa a cuko zana ngi vagay na avra, a ka tayna. Amma ko Mardoke a ngum ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Horɓe e sortaaɓe Asta, debbo laamiiɗo ngari, anndini mo haala man. O sakli masin, o neldi Mardokay limce ngam haa o itta limce buhuuje maako, o ɓorno ɗe, ammaa o sali.
Fulfulde_DC: Horɓe e sortaaɓe Asta, debbo laamiiɗo ngari, anndini mo haala man. O sakli masin, o neldi Mardokay limce ngam haa o itta limce buhuuje maako, o ɓorno ɗe, ammaa o sali.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O boko-be-tua in o kpàná ko Ɛstɛr baa wen'i nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. Ko-wan zia wen'i, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ gbin, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom o laa nɛnɛ ha̧ Mardochee mɛ a tɛ, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa-bufu yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O boko-be-tua in o kpàná ko Ɛstɛr baa wen'i nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ a̧. Ko-wan zia wen'i, ɓɛɛ gba̧a̧-tɛ gbin, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom o laa nɛnɛ ha̧ Mardochee mɛ a tɛ, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpɔ̧i̧ laa-bufu yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ bɛ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka kwaterashia Ɛstɛr ba'a ka tsewe tsewe ta ŋkɛ se kagezete nda wəsə nya kemenete geva. Benake nde va ghazlənə, pa ghweneghe lekwesa kezha seɗe Mardoshɛ ba'a kezha pelemte wəsə nya hwa hwəa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ, ama kese kayɛ we.
Tupurri: Naare ma ti peele ne Estern wo de jar ma de ndar äayn kal wo age fer waçaçre sen la ne hene, heçeçne kal caage äe debañ. AÀ kal coñ oçoçbe wo ne Mardoke ma laage ne hen ti, maga aà mo naa oçoçbe ma de yugudgi ma ti äen go, ama se laa dayge yaçaç rage gaè.

Francais: Alors Esther fit appeler Hatak, un des eunuques que le roi avait mis à son service, et elle l’envoya demander à Mardochée ce qui se passait et pourquoi il agissait ainsi.
Anglais: Then Esther summoned Hathach, one of the king’s eunuchs, whom the king had appointed to attend her, and ordered him  to go  to Mordecai to find out what this issue was and why it had come about.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda, Ester yi Hatak kep jar sa patayna ma mulla vulum kay ŋoma'na. Na' dum kay nam tuɗ ŋaf hiɗi Mardose, kay jobomu ala va ma lina mi mige?
Bulu: Nde Esthe a nga loone Atak, wua ya bebaʼale njô bôt a nga ve na be saane nye, a lôme nye a sili Mardôsé jam da lôt a amu jé a bo avale te.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Ester a zila Hatak, mbur munguɗo, buy muvulaŋ di ngi gi slra a mbuŋ naŋ. A slinaŋ ng'avu Mardoke, ɓa a ra cufuɗaŋ, i gwat mi migi ka, yo a gi kanah vur mike kini.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Asta ewni Hatak, gooto nder sortaaɓe mo laamiiɗo umri ɗum huuwango mo. O neli mo haa Mardokay ngam anndugo ko waɗi mo e ngam ɗume o waɗi bana non boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Asta ewni Hatak, gooto nder sortaaɓe mo laamiiɗo umri ɗum huuwango mo. O neli mo haa Mardokay ngam anndugo ko waɗi mo e ngam ɗume o waɗi bana non boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr saa Hatak, kpɔk mgbara o kpàná nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ so ha̧ a̧ wen dee tom ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom a̧ sitɛ Mardochee, mɛ ak gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka in mɔ nɛ̀ dea.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr saa Hatak, kpɔk mgbara o kpàná nɛ̀ wannu ha̧a̧ so ha̧ a̧ wen dee tom ha̧ a̧, ɓɛɛ a̧ tom a̧ sitɛ Mardochee, mɛ ak gba̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ yaka in mɔ nɛ̀ dea.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha ne, pa Ɛstɛr hekakɛ Hatak, nde tsewe tsewe nya veyi meghe kamene nda slene, pa ghwenakɛ kalə sha Mardoshɛ kezha fa wəsə nya kemenete geva ba'a va wa nda menete ŋkɛ tsagha.
Tupurri: Do kay nono, Ester raw ëe Hatak je ma yoo jar ma de ndar äay mani wañn wo, maga aè hay kañn äiñ äe, aà kal wiigi äe ga aà mo wo wii Mardoke ti fen maga joñ, day diñ wer may ga aà joñ do sen no la?

Francais: Hatak alla trouver Mardochée sur la place située devant l’entrée du palais.
Anglais: So Hathach went out to Mordecai in the [open] square of the city, which was in front of the king’s gate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hatak kali goyo kay ŋaf hiɗi Mardose goy hay way hoyok-ziyna, ɗiger vok faatana vi mulla.
Bulu: Nalé ate Atak a nga ke be Mardôsé e beta nseñ ya tison, ñwô ô mbe mbé yôb anyiine nda njô bôt.
Guiziga: Hatak a bi, ara ji hirnga ti Mardoke ar li mizli macikilam a diga, puɗak ar mizlingre ngi buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hatak yehi haa Mardokay, haa daldal berniwol yeeso yolnde laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Hatak yehi haa Mardokay, haa daldal berniwol yeeso yolnde laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hatak nɛɛ tɛ Mardochee bee-gara nú garo ko wannu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hatak nɛɛ tɛ Mardochee bee-gara nú garo ko wannu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Hatak shave sha Mardoshɛ pelɛke te ŋwela ta ghɛ meghe.
Tupurri: Hatak kal rawge see Mardoke äi leege, jag jiñ ni wañ.

Francais: Mardochée le mit au courant des événements ; il lui parla en particulier de la somme d’argent que Haman avait promis de verser au trésor royal si tous les Juifs étaient massacrés.
Anglais: Mordecai told him everything that had happened to him, and the exact  amount of money that Haman had promised to pay to the king’s treasuries for the destruction of the Jews.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Mardose vum labara kay slen ma li talamna kafe, hiɗi ŋaɓta vi gurjuta ta Haman min cuka' hay timgilla vi mulla kaw, kay ci sa Yudiyan goyo.
Bulu: Nde Mardôsé a nga kate nye mam ma lôtan; a nga dañe kobô nye ajô moné yʼAman a nga tiñeti na a ye futi e nkobe njô bôt nge ba wôé Beyude bese.
Guiziga: Gwat migi gar na, Mardoke a njika da mislin ngi Estere, yo Haman miɓi ɓa a sa vul dala haɗa ngi pi ng'ar zlili ngi buyo ɓa a ngizlaka Yudeheye na, a ɓaŋ di ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay yecci Hatak ko heɓi ɗum fuu. O anndini mo boo limgal cardi ndi Hamman iinino waddugo nder ndesaari laamiiɗo ngam mbarugo Yahuudu'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay yecci Hatak ko heɓi ɗum fuu. O anndini mo boo limgal cardi ndi Hamman iinino waddugo nder ndesaari laamiiɗo ngam mbarugo Yahuudu'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mardochee tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ a̧ we ɗoŋ sede nɛ̀ Haman tɛ̀ɛ́ a fara-a-mbɔi ko wannu oi kuma o be Juif.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mardochee tɔ̧ɔ̧ mgbara mɔ nɛ̀ yaka lɛŋ ha̧ a̧; ɓɛɛ a̧ we ɗoŋ sede nɛ̀ Haman tɛ̀ɛ́ a fara-a-mbɔi ko wannu oi kuma o be Juif.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mardoshɛ gezete nda ghena nyi kemenete nda geva, pa le ghena ta cɛdɛ nya meɗeyi bete Haman hwa mcɛləa meghe kempəmte ka Zhəwif mbeli pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Mardoke kal bag blam waçaçre maga joñn ne hen äuy, ngaä solay maga Haman hay waçaç ga se haçn yañ ma laage äi boole mani wañ no, ti maga aè taw ge jar Jwif wo go mono ne hene.

Francais: Il lui donna le texte du décret publié à Suse en vue de l’extermination des Juifs ; il lui demanda de renseigner Esther sur la situation en lui montrant ce texte. Hatak devait aussi la prier de se rendre auprès du roi pour implorer sa pitié et plaider la cause du peuple auquel elle appartenait.
Anglais: Mordecai also gave him a copy of the text of the decree which had been issued in Susa for the Jews destruction, so that he might show Esther and explain it to her, and order her to go in to the king to seek his favor and plead with him for [the lives of] her people.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vul hay ɓalamu ɗota kepe ta hagata vuli kay ci sa Yudiyana ka ɗoy haya'ta, ta ɗoy hay Susa pa, kay nam ma ɗeka' kir Ester a na' ma hum kayni, lo di ta'a a na' ma tuɗ tam mulla kay tiy vok iramu kay nam ma li slugot mi sumuna va'a kaw.
Bulu: A nga ve nye ntilan yʼatiñ e nga katebane Suz asu ya jiane Beyude. Mardôsé a nga jô Atak na a kate Esthe jam e né a liti fe nye ntilane te; Atak a yeʼelane fe Esthe na a ke be njô bôt a sili nkoon éngôngole wé a suñe fe ajô yʼayoñe dé.
Guiziga: Ɗerewol ngi ɓi micica mitilam di mi a Sus, ɓa ngi ngizla Yudehey tuwa, Mardoke a vula da misline, ɓa ara biga da Ester vuna. Mardoke a ɓa Hataka, ɓa ara fa ɓi nah da Estere, ɓa Estere kwana, aru ng'avu buyo ara tumbuloŋ, ara tuwuy a mbuŋ naŋ, ɓa buy a pura ircece da mizli naŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hokki mo boo misaalu bataakewol umroore ngam nattingo Yahuudu'en, baŋgunooŋgol haa Suuza, ngam o holla ngol Asta, o umri mo o yaha haa laamiiɗo, o toro ɗum mo'ere, o seetto Yahuudu'en ummaatoore maako.
Fulfulde_DC: O hokki mo boo misaalu bataakewol umroore ngam nattingo Yahuudu'en, baŋgunooŋgol haa Suuza, ngam o holla ngol Asta, o umri mo o yaha haa laamiiɗo, o toro ɗum mo'ere, o seetto Yahuudu'en ummaatoore maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma kalata heembea nɛ̀ wa pɛsa dam saaye Suzɛ, wen kuma wa'i ha̧ a̧ mbɛt, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi ha̧ Ɛstɛr, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ mgbara-a ha̧ a̧, in ha̧ Ɛstɛr mɛ nɛ si katɛ wannu, mɛ ak deako kɔ̧-a̧, kɔfi nɛ̀ a̧ wen zu dukbíí kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ha̧a̧ ŋma kalata heembea nɛ̀ wa pɛsa dam saaye Suzɛ, wen kuma wa'i ha̧ a̧ mbɛt, wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ usi ha̧ Ɛstɛr, tɔ̧ nɛ̀ mgbara-a ha̧ a̧, in ha̧ Ɛstɛr mɛ nɛ si katɛ wannu, mɛ ak deako kɔ̧-a̧, kɔfi nɛ̀ a̧ wen zu dukbíí kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda palepa kwetɛŋe kala nyi neheyi mbeli mbe Səze kezha mpə ka Zhəwif, yitea ncɛte nda ŋkɛ ke Ɛstɛr nya ketelə sha meghe ka'yɛwe zhɛ helia ŋkɛ ba'a kanehwene nda nehwene ke hwelefe ta nta.
Tupurri: AÀ kal haç te waçaçre ma ti jag wañ maga aà hay go de dusgi äe äi leege Sus ma taw rage go mono, maga aà mo kañ nen Ester ni, mo sii ra ne hen äuy. AÀ kal waçaçge ne hen ni ga Ester mo wo see wañ joñ kamkam ne hene maga aà mo joñ jar sen wo de ele.

Francais: Hatak remplit sa mission
Anglais: Hathach came back and told Esther what Mordecai had said.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hatak hotay tam Ester hiɗi dita vi Mardose.
Bulu: Atak a nga zu kate Esthe nkobô Mardôsé.
Guiziga: Mingiɓi ngi Mardoke miɓa gar na, Hatak a so slufa ɓi nah da Estere cineˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hatak warti haa Asta, yecci mo bolle Mardokay.
Fulfulde_DC: Hatak warti haa Asta, yecci mo bolle Mardokay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hatak baa wen ko Mardochee nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hatak baa wen ko Mardochee nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Ɛstɛr;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Hatak se kagezete nda ghena ta Mardoshɛ ke Ɛstɛr.
Tupurri: Hatak kal age da' Ester de waçaçre Mardoke wo no.

Francais: et Esther lui ordonna de rapporter la réponse suivante à Mardochée :
Anglais: Then Esther spoke to Hathach and ordered him  to reply  to Mordecai, saying:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ester hot gi Hatak tam Mardose kay nam ma hot dum ala:
Bulu: Esthe a nga kobô Atak a kate Mardôsé na:
Guiziga: Ar nah kẽh ma na, Ester tuwa, a slina Hataka ng'avu Mardoke a muŋ, ɓa ara ɓaŋ na:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asta umri mo o lorto haa Mardokay, o wi'a mo:
Fulfulde_DC: Asta umri mo o lorto haa Mardokay, o wi'a mo:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr e wen nú Hatak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee ndé:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr e wen nú Hatak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ tɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee ndé:
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛstɛr gezete nda kezha lə ŋkɛ kazhɛne nda ke Mardoshɛ kala nya:
Tupurri: Ester kal wii Hatak ga aà mo wo wii Mardoke ga:

Francais: « Tout le monde, des serviteurs du roi aux habitants des provinces de l’empire, connaît la loi s’appliquant à quiconque, homme ou femme, entre dans la cour intérieure du palais sans avoir été convoqué par le roi : cette personne doit mourir. Elle n’a la vie sauve que si le roi lui tend son sceptre d’or. En ce qui me concerne, voilà tout un mois que je n’ai pas été invitée à me rendre auprès du roi. »
Anglais: “All the king’s servants and the people of the king’s provinces know that for any man or woman who comes to the king to the inner court without being summoned, he has but one law, that he is to be put to death, unless the king holds out to him the golden scepter so that he may live. And as for me, I have not been summoned to come to the king for these [last] thirty days.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa sunda vi mulla kaf, sum sa kuɗ nagata vi mulla kaf wi ala san gigekaw, la sa jufu lebo ca'a kaw, la nam min co kalaf hay daŋŋa vi mulla, la nam bay fi yita vi mulla goy jewe, kuɗ gatta nam fi cita-goyta, gatta na'ta kay gige kaf, mus iri kayni mi sa ma mulla meɗem zugulda valam ta ora kiramu tuta. Wulin kayni, buur dok-ɦidi vaydi mulla bay yan tuwa.
Bulu: Bebo bisaé be njô bôte bese a bôte ya mebôta mʼéjôé ba yem atiñe na: Môt ase, fam nge minga, a nyiine be njô bôt mfaʼa nseñe yʼété te na a bili nloon, ba ye wôé nye avalʼ atiñ e né be bôte bese; môt a ne nyiñ ve nyô njô bôt a same ntume or wé. Ve ma me nji bi nloone ya ke be njô bôt den a ntoo melu mewôm mela.
Guiziga: «Ko waka gar, mbur mizile malla ngwas mira ru nga ciki buyo da i naŋ mizilaŋ ti zil ta na, a kiɗaka mbur nah vagay cummo. A juwam ɓi le vurˀe kahana. Ɓa mbur nah a ndir ti siifa na, sey da buy a sikaŋ ganday ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl nga naŋ buy na le far. Gawla ngi buyoy ati mizli ng'ir li ngi buy miwi lihey, naŋ mazum buy anga gar na, a sinaka ɓi nah le kahana. Ani ya, i gi le dana hin kukur makir, manja a zilikiy, ɓa i ru ng'avu buyo.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Sukaaɓe laamiiɗo e yimɓe nder lesɗe laamiiɗo fuu anndi ɗu'um: Umroore haɗi koo moy gorko malla debbo nastugo daldal ɓadiiŋgal suudu laamiiɗo, sonaa to o ewnaama. Nastanɗo fuu o mbareteeɗo, sonaa to laamiiɗo forti sawru laamu ndu kaŋŋeeri dow maako hisni mo. Waɗi nyalɗe cappanɗe tati jonta, ɓe ewnaaki yam ngam haa mi yotto haa laamiiɗo.”
Fulfulde_DC: “Sukaaɓe laamiiɗo e yimɓe nder lesɗe laamiiɗo fuu anndi ɗu'um: Umroore haɗi koo moy gorko malla debbo nastugo daldal ɓadiiŋgal suudu laamiiɗo, sonaa to o ewnaama. Nastanɗo fuu o mbareteeɗo, sonaa to laamiiɗo forti sawru laamu ndu kaŋŋeeri dow maako hisni mo. Waɗi nyalɗe cappanɗe tati jonta, ɓe ewnaaki yam ngam haa mi yotto haa laamiiɗo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O wi-de-tom ko wannu lɛŋ in dukbíí tɛ o zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ iŋa nɛ̀ de-a'e, kóó o ndé, kóó nɛ́ wiwii, kóó nɛ́ okoo, nɛ̀ tɛ ye si tɛ wannu fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ à̧ á̧ saa wi’ɛi na, heembea zu wi’ɛi nɛ́ gbɛa a̧ gbɛɛ yinɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɛɛ kà wannu nɛ́ nyɛi̧a dɔ́rá-lɔr kɔ‘i sitɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa. Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ zɛ ɓu-taar kinii nɛ̀ wa sa'm si katɛ wannu na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O wi-de-tom ko wannu lɛŋ in dukbíí tɛ o zika-nù kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ iŋa nɛ̀ de-a'e, kóó o ndé, kóó nɛ́ wiwii, kóó nɛ́ okoo, nɛ̀ tɛ ye si tɛ wannu fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧, nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ à̧ á̧ saa wi’ɛi na, heembea zu wi’ɛi nɛ́ gbɛa a̧ gbɛɛ yinɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɛɛ kà wannu nɛ́ nyɛi̧a dɔ́rá-lɔr kɔ‘i sitɛ wi’ɛi, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasa. Ɓɛɛ kɔ‘m, nɛ́ zɛ ɓu-taar kinii nɛ̀ wa sa'm si katɛ wannu na.»
Kapsiki_DC: «Nahe ka mene slene ta meghe pɛtɛ le mbeli nyi mbe sla ta hɛɗia meghe keɗepe, ma yayata wəndə nya kedzeki te zlave ta ghɛ meghe, za keɗema male kaɗema meghe kehekakɛ ŋkɛ ne, nda mbeli kapeslekɛ kala nya kegezete geva. Ma nda nza wəndə kanza pələsə ne, nda meghe kahave nda geta meghea ŋkɛ kwa mze kwa tere tere ke wəndəa shɛ. Hɛ mahekenemsə ɓeshi kanakama mbeli kahekakɛ ɗa kalə sha meghe.»
Tupurri: Weere joçoçre wañ wo, de jar ma ti coçoç sir wo äuy wo de koge ga jag liñgi po yañ. Jag liñgi sen go de waçaçge ga je ma honla äuy twaçy noga tware, kal wo feele ni wañ nen äil ga aè ëen we wo ëege gaa no, joñ tenen caw pa mokay say ni wañ coñ graw boo biñni äen ne hene. Day ndi mo haç' so no, yañ wara naw do swa' wañ ëe me wo gaè.

Francais: Lorsque Mardochée reçut cette réponse d’Esther,
Anglais: So they told Mordecai what Esther had said.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Slen ma Ester dumna nisi maram mi Mardose.
Bulu: Nde be nga kate Mardôsé éyalan Esthe.
Guiziga: A sipaka mingiɓi ngi Estere da Mardoke kanah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe anndini Mardokay bolle Asta.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe anndini Mardokay bolle Asta.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa wen ko Ɛstɛr nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa wen ko Ɛstɛr nɛ́ɛ̀ tɔ̧ ha̧ Mardochee,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli gezete nda ghena ta Ɛstɛr ke Mardoshɛ.
Tupurri: De maga aà wo woge de waçaçre Estern ne Mardoke mokay no,

Francais: il lui fit dire : « Ne t’imagine pas que tu pourras échapper, toi seule, au sort des Juifs parce que tu vis dans le palais.
Anglais: Then Mordecai told them to reply to Esther, “Do not imagine that you in the king’s palace can escape any more than all the Jews.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mardose hot dit tam Ester ala: Ca-mulda, nak ma var ala nak ma suɗ goy jar sa Yudiyana kuɗ ta ala nak ka hay ziyna vi mullaɗi.
Bulu: Ane Mardôsé a nga lôme bôt be kate Esthe na: Te buni be womien été na ô ne ngule ya fam étam mfaʼa ya jam da yange Beyude, amu na ô too e nda njô bôt.
Guiziga: Mardoke a slin, a mbiɗa hirnga da Estere, a ɓaŋ: «Vur ka ki maˀãy a hay buyo na, ki wuluk i ka pal ɗik masa lih a wuzla Yudeheye ta ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay lorni mo bee jaawaabu ni'i: “Taa tamma an feere ma a hisan caka Yahuudu'en fuu ngam a ɗon nder saare laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay lorni mo bee jaawaabu ni'i: “Taa tamma an feere ma a hisan caka Yahuudu'en fuu ngam a ɗon nder saare laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ kifa-nú ko Mardochee ha̧ Ɛstɛr nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ká mɛ ta'e wen nɛ̀ mɛ́ a̧a̧ kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧̀ kira-wan'i, nɛ́ mɛ́ kpɔk mgbara o be Juif a̧ tɛ kpasi ɓɛɛ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ kifa-nú ko Mardochee ha̧ Ɛstɛr nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ká mɛ ta'e wen nɛ̀ mɛ́ a̧a̧ kɔ-mɛ kɔ̧̀ kira-wan'i, nɛ́ mɛ́ kpɔk mgbara o be Juif a̧ tɛ kpasi ɓɛɛ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Mardoshɛ shɛ: «Zəzəma na wərə na kambele ŋa kwetɛŋe ŋa va ɗa nya te ka Zhəwif, va nya nza na ki ghɛ meghe ma.
Tupurri: Mardoke kal ferge le ne Ester ga: Ëag ti äo ga ndo gwa' ge yañ yoo jar Jwif wo boñ tawa werga ndo liñ ni wañ na enla mo haç' ëag dosen no wa.

Francais: Si tu refuses d’intervenir dans les circonstances présentes, les Juifs recevront de l’aide d’ailleurs  et ils seront sauvés. Toi, par contre, tu mourras et ce sera la fin de ta famille. Mais qui sait ? Peut-être est-ce pour faire face à une telle situation que tu es devenue reine. »
Anglais: For if you remain silent at this time, liberation and rescue will arise for the Jews from another place, and you and your father’s house will perish [since you did not help when you had the chance]. And who knows whether you have attained royalty for such a time as this [and for this very purpose]?”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: La nak mus hiɗi vunag duki dok-doko, vok lawt kayni, butta-goyta vi sa Yudiyana ma coy goy hay liy mara'a pa, may nak hiɗi ziyna vi bugu nigi ma vat goyo may. Sa ma win gige, nak co hay mulda kayni la li ŋalɗini, kuɗ lawt zawni klasige!
Bulu: Nge wo bene bo jam éziñ éyoñe ji, mvolan wo ye so Beyude vôme mfe a ba ye nyiiban. Ve wo wo ye wu a nda bôte jôé ja ye man. Ve za a yem, ndôʼôtô na ô nga tobane bo nga njô bôt amu avale été di.
Guiziga: Ani, da ki cifi le teˀteˀ ar ɓi misi kahana dana na, Yudehey a sa lumam jini tir li mekelem, yo a sa laham ɓula so, amma ka ati mizli ngi hay kumoyo kisa ngizlam kuɗup. Na zle, ka mitiri maˀãy na, bista, ɓa kisa cici ar ɓi misi kahana vuna, misina i waka?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To a jeeɗake nder saa'iire bana nde'e, ballal e kisndam iwanan Yahuudu'en haa nokkuure feere, ammaa an e saare baaba ma on kalkan. Moy anndi? Teema a heɓi nastugo saare laamu ngam saa'iire bana nde'e!”
Fulfulde_DC: To a jeeɗake nder saa'iire bana nde'e, ballal e kisndam iwanan Yahuudu'en haa nokkuure feere, ammaa an e saare baaba ma on kalkan. Moy anndi? Teema a heɓi nastugo saare laamu ngam saa'iire bana nde'e!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kà mɛ̀ kpé yí-mɛ́ tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ de kinii’ɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpe nú-mɛ́, gbakamɔ tɛ tɛ nɛ ŋma fara mɛ kpasi o be Juif, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum lɛŋ; ŋma fara, nɛ́ wen kpasa yɛ a̧ mɛ yèé nɛnɛ fara-wan'i ndé, o'o iŋa o?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà mɛ̀ kpé yí-mɛ́ tɛ mɔ nɛ̀ de kinii’ɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ kpe nú-mɛ́, gbakamɔ tɛ tɛ nɛ ŋma fara mɛ kpasi o be Juif, ɓɛɛ kɔ-mɛ in o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ, ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ kum lɛŋ; ŋma fara, nɛ́ wen kpasa yɛ a̧ mɛ yèé nɛnɛ fara-wan'i ndé, o'o iŋa o?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kentishɛ ŋa na le ghena nya ne, katekemave kemane ba'a mbele ka Zhəwif se te kwete ŋkwa, ama gha le mbelia ŋa ne, pɛtɛ tempə yɛ. Wa ɗepe wa? Nda kwete kezha wəsə nya kala nya veyi geva na kamale ta meghe wəka?»
Tupurri: Ama de maga ndo hay ba go la ba' no, kayge ma age yaçaç jar Jwif wo gon naa ge mbe nen yañ le ti ngeel po, ma äon nday de jar ni pan äo nday bas ge go. Day wose ba de koge ga diñ wer fen maga de joñge mo haç' ga ndo da' faage ma kalge wo ti wañn ni mo ta' gaa ne?

Francais: Alors Esther envoya ce message à Mardochée :
Anglais: Then Esther told them to reply to Mordecai,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ester hot sunda tam Mardose ala:
Bulu: Ane Esthe a nga lôme Mardôsé foé nyôna na:
Guiziga: Dar Ester a slin ng'avu Mardoke, ɓa a ɓakaŋ na:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asta neldi mo jaawaabu ni'i:
Fulfulde_DC: Asta neldi mo jaawaabu ni'i:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr kifi nú ha̧ Mardochee:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr kifi nú ha̧ Mardochee:
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Ɛstɛr sha Mardoshɛ ɓiyitsa:
Tupurri: Ester kal äo' jobo wo see Mardoke ma wiigi äe ga:

Francais: « Va rassembler tous les Juifs qui se trouvent à Suse, observez un jeûne en ma faveur. Pendant trois jours et trois nuits ne prenez ni nourriture ni boisson. Mes servantes et moi, nous agirons de même de notre côté. Puis je me rendrai auprès du roi bien que ce soit contraire à la loi, et si je dois mourir, je mourrai ! »
Anglais: “Go, gather all the Jews that are present in Susa, and observe a fast for me; do not eat or drink for three days, night or day. I and my maids also will fast in the same way. Then I will go in to [see] the king [without being summoned], which is against the law; and if I perish, I perish.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tuɗaŋu, tokaŋ sa Yudiyana kaf sa ka hay Susa. Ligi laat kanu, tigi fuɗi, cigi niyɗi kaw, ta-ta ir buur ɦidi, falayta hiɗi henjeta kaw. Nan kaw hiɗi guro-boy sa sunda vanu numa min li laata. Bugol kayni nan ma tuɗ tam mulla, la gatta ma' nala kaw. La a nan fi mitta kaw, nan ma mit manu.
Bulu: Kele sulane Beyude bese be too Suz, mi bômbô zaé amu ajô dam. Te diane bidi nge nyu jôm éziñ tañe môse mila a melu mela. Avale te fe bebo bisaé be binga bam a mamien bia ye bo. Eyoñe te ma ye ke be njô bôt akôsa bo na nalé a wosan atiñ , a nge ma yiane wu, ma ye wu!
Guiziga: «Yudehey misi a Sus gar na, ara kuso taŋ, ɓa ki gam dalyam vur ya: gam hin makir, ki zumam gwat ta, kisam gwat ta, papas ati duvuɗ naŋ gar. Ya ati ziri mongoso migi slra ɗuwoyo kwana, i sa gam dalyam kanah ya. A dirba nah, ko ti ɓimujuwa gar na, i sa ru ng'avu buyo da a bi i ngi muc kwana, i sa muc si.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Yah, mooɓtu Yahuudu'en wonɓe haa Suuza fuu. Cuume ngam am, taa nyaame, taa njare nyalɗe tati, jemma bee naaŋge fuu. Min e horɓe am boo, min cuumoto. Nden mi yahan haa laamiiɗo, koo to ɗum luuti umroore. Koo to ɗum yahratam haa maayde boo, mi hasdi!”
Fulfulde_DC: “Yah, mooɓtu Yahuudu'en wonɓe haa Suuza fuu. Cuume ngam am, taa nyaame, taa njare nyalɗe tati, jemma bee naaŋge fuu. Min e horɓe am boo, min cuumoto. Nden mi yahan haa laamiiɗo, koo to ɗum luuti umroore. Koo to ɗum yahratam haa maayde boo, mi hasdi!”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mɔi̧ o be Juif sɛn Suzɛ'ɛ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím yì wen am zɛ nɛ wese, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ mɔ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ yì na zaŋ zɛ taar. Mi tɛ zim yì in o boko-be-tua kɔ‘m mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kóó nɛ̀ heembea a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i, mi tɛ́ nɛ̀ kànà ti wannu; kà bó nɛ́ fio, ha̧‘m fe ɓɛɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mɛ̀ nɛ́ɛ̀ mɔi̧ o be Juif sɛn Suzɛ'ɛ lɛŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím yì wen am zɛ nɛ wese, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nyɔŋ mɔ na, k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɔ yì na zaŋ zɛ taar. Mi tɛ zim yì in o boko-be-tua kɔ‘m mbɛt. Ɓɛɛ kóó nɛ̀ heembea a̧a̧ sɛnɛ‘i, mi tɛ́ nɛ̀ kànà ti wannu; kà bó nɛ́ fio, ha̧‘m fe ɓɛɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: «Kwiɗi tsenete ka Zhəwif nyi mbe Səze pɛtɛ kamene səwəmayɛ te ghəa ɗa kahɛ mahekene kwa zemema wəsə ba'a kwa sama wəsə viɗi le veci. 'Ya perə, tsagha mene ghen'yɛ le ka kwaterashia ɗa. Ma tsagha, katelə 'ya sha meghe, ya 'ya nza katemte kala nya gezete wəsə mahalegə ne, kamtea shɛ 'ya.»
Tupurri: See, tay ti jar jwif maga wo äi leege Sus la äuy, heçeç wee bii ti äi, ree wee wa, joo wee wa lay ko de suñ, ko de ceege nen naw swa'a. Ndi joñ nen heçeç bii de mayre gebere äin wo lay, blam äe ndi kal ge yañ wo see wañ, de jag liñgin mbe do äuy. Tiga aà diñ ma huli sen so, ni ndi mo hu mbi go so.

Francais: Alors Mardochée partit et agit comme Esther le lui avait recommandé.
Anglais: So Mordecai went away and did exactly as Esther had commanded him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mardose kaliya, kay li kuɗ slen kaf ma Ester dumna.
Bulu: Nde Mardôsé a nga ke a bo avale Esthe a nga bendé nye.
Guiziga: Dar Mardoke a ru, gwat Ester miɓaŋ di gar na, a ga kanah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay yehi, waɗi ko Asta umri mo fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay yehi, waɗi ko Asta umri mo fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mardochee yaka, ɓɛɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mardochee yaka, ɓɛɛ de mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧‘i lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, cape Mardoshɛ kalə kamene wəsə nya gezete nda Ɛstɛr kamene.
Tupurri: Mandoke kal rawge wo joñ fen maga Ester ngaän ne hen mo äuy no.

Francais: Mardochée demande à Esther d’intervenir
Anglais: Esther Learns of Haman’s Plot
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yudiyana ka hay yorta, nisi li laata
Bulu: Mardôsé a sili Esthe na a volô
Guiziga: Mardoke mucufuɗa Ester ɓa a jinaŋ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay nufi hisnugo Yahuudu'en
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay nufi hisnugo Yahuudu'en
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mardochee aka gbakamɔ ko Ɛstɛr
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mardochee aka gbakamɔ ko Ɛstɛr
Kapsiki_DC: Mardoshɛ ka'yɛwe va Ɛstɛr kezha mbele ka Zhəwif
Tupurri: Mardoke wii Ester ga aà mo waçaç mopo go

Francais: Au bout de ses trois jours de jeûne, Esther revêtit ses habits de reine et alla se présenter dans la cour intérieure du palais, en face des appartements royaux. Le roi était dans le palais, assis sur son trône, en face de la porte d’entrée.
Anglais: On the third day [of the fast] Esther put on her royal robes and stood in the inner court of the king’s palace opposite his [throne] room. The king was sitting on his royal throne, facing the [main] entrance of the palace.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma buurta ɦidita coowa, Ester cuk sligara vi mulda ta'a, na' co hay daŋŋa vi mulla, ɗiger vok ziyda vi mulla. Mulla ka musi kulo kay zlamda-mulda valamu, hay liyna vi mulda, vok vun-ziyna.
Bulu: Eyoñe môse lale ô nga kui, Esthe a nga jaé mengômesane mé me nga njô bôt, a ke tebe nseñe ya nda njô bôt été, zôsôô a menda me njô bôt. Njô bôt a mbe e nda jé été, a too éto njôane jé, zôsôô a anyiine mbé .
Guiziga: Ar kiɗa mi ngi hin mimakir naŋ tuwa na, Ester a ka zana naŋ ngi maˀãyaya, waɗ a cici deŋ a wazlaray buyo, hiri pulaˀ ng'avu mugum ngi buyo. Buyo, a ro joˀ zleˀe ar janga naŋ ngi buy ar mugum naŋ, hiri pulaˀ nga mizlingre.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawo nyalɗe tati go Asta ɓorni limce laamu, yehi haa daldal ɓadiiŋgal suudu laamiiɗo, dari yeeso suudu laamiiɗo. Laamiiɗo ɗon jooɗi dow leeso laamu muuɗum nder suudu muuɗum wonndu yeeso nastirde saare.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawo nyalɗe tati go Asta ɓorni limce laamu, yehi haa daldal ɓadiiŋgal suudu laamiiɗo, dari yeeso suudu laamiiɗo. Laamiiɗo ɗon jooɗi dow leeso laamu muuɗum nder suudu muuɗum wonndu yeeso nastirde saare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ zɛ taar'i, Ɛstɛr aa laa ko ko-wan tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ gbo si bee-gara nɛ̀ duk mgbák nú fara-duk ko wannu. Wannu duka so zu damti kɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧́ tua-wan, zɔk nɛ̀ mɔ si nú tua mɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɗoŋ zɛ taar'i, Ɛstɛr aa laa ko ko-wan tɛ-wi, ɓɛɛ gbo si bee-gara nɛ̀ duk mgbák nú fara-duk ko wannu. Wannu duka so zu damti kɔ‘i sɛn kɔ̧́ tua-wan, zɔk nɛ̀ mɔ si nú tua mɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa maheke ta hɛ ne, pa Ɛstɛr seɗete lekwesa meghe kadzeki te zlave ta ghɛ meghe tiɗiɗi le ŋkwa kenza ta meghe. Mentishɛ meghe pelɛ pasla ta ŋkɛ tiɗiɗi le mɛ kedzeki.
Tupurri: De maga naw ma de swa'n wo nduugi mokay no, Ester kal laa oçoçbe ma de saë feçeçre seen ti äe, kal woge naa nen see äe go feele ma nen äil maga tiñ wañ ni mono ga de ngafge de äe mono. Wañ kal hayge ti paale wañ äen äi tiñ wañ no, de ngafge de jag faage tiñ no.

Francais: Lorsqu’il vit la reine Esther debout dans la cour, il la considéra avec bienveillance et il lui tendit le sceptre d’or qu’il tenait . Esther s’approcha et en toucha l’extrémité.
Anglais: When the king saw Esther the queen standing in the court, she found favor in his sight; and the king extended to her the golden scepter which was in his hand. So Esther approached and touched the top of the scepter.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma mulla wi ca-mulda Ester coli kulo hay wur-daŋŋa, na' fi slugot vok iramu, mulla meɗa' zugulda-ora valamu ta ka hay ɓalamu. Ester co goboyo, na' jo vun zugulda.
Bulu: Eyoñe a nga yen Esthe nga njô bôt a tele nseñ, a nga liti nye mvam a same nye ntume or a nga bili. Esthe a nga zu bebé a nambe wô sok.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy mupura maˀãy Ester mideŋ a wazlaray tuwa keɗ na, a gaŋ kuy teˀe. Buy a tilaŋ ganday nga naŋ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl mikaw asi haŋ naŋ na. Ester a kirih, a ja haŋ kaw avu mi ngi ganday ngi buyo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde o yi'i Asta ɗon dari haa daldal maako, o mo'ani mo. Laamiiɗo lii'ani mo sawru laamu ndu kaŋŋeeri wonndu haa juŋngo mum. Asta ɓaditi, meemi hoore maaru.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde o yi'i Asta ɗon dari haa daldal maako, o mo'ani mo. Laamiiɗo lii'ani mo sawru laamu ndu kaŋŋeeri wonndu haa juŋngo mum. Asta ɓaditi, meemi hoore maaru.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu zɔka ko-wan Ɛstɛr fara yora-a zan, a̧ zɔka a̧ nɛ̀ de yí, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛi̧ dɔra-lɔr er-a'i sitɛ Ɛstɛr. Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ɗɔŋ siti, tam nú dɔra'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wannu zɔka ko-wan Ɛstɛr fara yora-a zan, a̧ zɔka a̧ nɛ̀ de yí, ɓɛɛ a̧ nyɛi̧ dɔra-lɔr er-a'i sitɛ Ɛstɛr. Ɓɛɛ Ɛstɛr ɗɔŋ siti, tam nú dɔra'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nakɛ meghe meslete Ɛstɛr te zlave ne, pa zlaɓa yite, pa have nda geta meghea ŋkɛ nya kakwa mze kwa tere tere, nya yitea dzeve ve. Pa Ɛstɛr hendave nda geva kakwaɗakɛ ghəa geta shɛ.
Tupurri: De ngar ngeel maga wañ wo ko waçywañ Ester de oole ti deele äi feelen mokay no, aà kal cooge jag äe tu. Wañ kal coñ graw boo biñni maga hay do äe mono ne Estere. Ester kal ya' see äe le, kal du' jag graw no.

Francais: Le roi lui demanda : « Que se passe-t-il, reine Esther ? Que désires-tu ? Je suis prêt à t’accorder jusqu’à la moitié de mon empire. » –
Anglais: Then the king said to her, “What is  troubling  you, Queen Esther? What is your request? It shall be given to you,  up to half of the kingdom.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di'e: Mayɗin mige ca-mulda Ester? Nak min job mige? La nak joba' ti gal mulda van kaw, nan as vulakga.
Bulu: Njô bôt a nga sili nye na: Jé ja lôt a Esthe nga njô bôt? Wo kômbô jé? Me ne nkômesane ya ve wo jaʼan éfase ya si ma jôô je.
Guiziga: Dar buy a cufuɗaŋ: «Maˀay ɗu Ester, i mi migi ka? Ki wuɗ mike ma? Ko da i reta avu zumabuy ɗu kwana, i juw vu le ɓa i vuluw di.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo ƴami mo: “Ko waɗi, debbo am Asta? Ko ɗaɓɓata? Mi hokkete ɗum, haa dillango reeta laamu am.”
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo ƴami mo: “Ko waɗi, debbo am Asta? Ko ɗaɓɓata? Mi hokkete ɗum, haa dillango reeta laamu am.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu aka a̧: «Nɛ́ ge á̧ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ ge, ko-wan Ɛstɛr? Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ha̧‘m. Kóó nɛ́ reeta mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m a̧ mɛ aka, mi tɛ ha̧ mɛ!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu aka a̧: «Nɛ́ ge á̧ mɛ́ kɔ̧a̧ ge, ko-wan Ɛstɛr? Mɛ̀ tɔ̧́ mɔ nɛ̀ a̧a̧ sɛnɛ ha̧‘m. Kóó nɛ́ reeta mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m a̧ mɛ aka, mi tɛ ha̧ mɛ!»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe 'yɛwete ve: «Wa wəsə nya kemenete geva wa Ɛstɛr male ta ɗa? Wa yaɗe na wa? Wəsə nya ɗe na ne, kamene ŋa 'ya, ya bela ta meghea ɗa ŋkɛ ne, kave ŋa 'ya.»
Tupurri: Wañ kal wiigi äe ga: Mayse joñ ndo la waçywañ Estere? Saçy mayse ti äo la? AÈ joñ ge mbe yañ nen haçge äe ne ndo, hayba nus wañ no!

Francais: « Si sa Majesté le roi le juge bon, répondit Esther, j’aimerais qu’aujourd’hui même il vienne avec Haman au festin que j’ai préparé pour lui. »
Anglais: Esther said, “If it pleases the king, may the king and Haman come this day to the banquet that I have prepared for him.”
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ester di'e: Mulla, la naŋ mina, vaydi naŋ hiɗi Haman, nigi ma co ti tina ma nan kotom kigiya.
Bulu: Esthe a nga yalane nye na: Nge njô bôt a kañese a zu den ba Aman be di bidi ma te kôme nye.
Guiziga: Ester a mbiɗaŋ di: «Kumani ɗu, da ki ngum le na, anja ki soko dana ati Haman ng'ar ɗaf ngi muguzlum ya mida vur naŋ na takwa.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asta jaabi: “To a yerdake, barkaama, ngara hannde bee Hamman ngam nyaamduuji ɗi mi waɗani ma.”
Fulfulde_DC: Asta jaabi: “To a yerdake, barkaama, ngara hannde bee Hamman ngam nyaamduuji ɗi mi waɗani ma.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i in Haman tɛ gbaŋa n'am ɗafa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr kifa nú: «Mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ nyɛmna h’ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ tɛ sɔsɔɔ‘i in Haman tɛ gbaŋa n'am ɗafa h’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ma ke Ɛstɛr zhɛnete: «Ma keɗe na ne, meghe ne, pa yɛ kase le Haman yitea wəsə kezeme nya temene ŋa 'ya ɓeshi.»
Tupurri: Ester kal fer waçaçre ne hen ga: Hayga aà coo yañ jag wañ no, daga wañ mo nduu wo le wara de Haman ti few maga ndi de kne'ge äe ne hen mono.

Francais: Le roi envoya immédiatement quelqu’un chercher Haman pour exaucer le souhait d’Esther. Puis ils se rendirent tous les deux au festin qu’elle avait préparé.
Anglais: Then the king said, “Bring Haman quickly so that we may do as Esther says.” So the king and Haman came to the banquet which Esther had prepared.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di'e: Tuɗgi gargi Haman koloyo kay numa tuɗ kuɗ yita vi Ester.
Bulu: Njô bôt a nga jô na: Be jiʼa ke loon Aman asu ya kañese nkômbane Esthe. Nde bebaane be nga ke e dina Esthe a nga kôm.
Guiziga: Buy a slin ɓa ara ɓaka Hama na, a wus vu kutum ng'ar zil ngi Estere, anja a buluw ta. Dar buy ati Haman tuwa, a ram cuw taŋ ng'ar ɗaf ngi muguzlum ngi Estere so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo wi'i: “Law, ngadde Hamman ngam waɗugo ko Asta wi'i.” Laamiiɗo e Hamman ngari ngam nyaamduuji ɗi Asta waɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo wi'i: “Law, ngadde Hamman ngam waɗugo ko Asta wi'i.” Laamiiɗo e Hamman ngari ngam nyaamduuji ɗi Asta waɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu toma bíí mɛ sa Haman nɛ̀ haya-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr aka, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo mbɛt nɛ́ in ŋmaa tɛ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr ɗafa'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wannu toma bíí mɛ sa Haman nɛ̀ haya-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr aka, ɓɛɛ wa yiitoo mbɛt nɛ́ in ŋmaa tɛ gbaŋa nɛ̀ Ɛstɛr ɗafa'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke meghe: «Hekake ɗa mə Haman kahe kahe kase kezha wəsə kezeme nya takɛ Ɛstɛr!»
Tupurri: Wañ kal fer waçaçre ga: Wii wee Haman ga aà mo joñ deparday ma woge ti few mani Ester no.

Francais: A la fin du repas le roi dit à Esther : « Que désires-tu me demander ? Je suis prêt à réaliser tes vœux en t’accordant jusqu’à la moitié de mon empire. » –
