Anglais: He sent letters to all the Jews, to the 127 provinces of the kingdom of Ahasuerus, in words of peace and truth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam sa Yudiyan kaf sa ka hay nagata ta kis kalam dok-ma' yam siɗiyata, ta kuɗ mulla Asuwerus nisi ɗo ɗerwelda, jok labara kay sle'ta hiɗi vida.
Bulu: Be nga lôme mimfefé bekalate mite e be Beyude bese e mebôta me si ntet a mewôm mebaé a zamgbwa ya si Asuérus a jôô je. Bekalate bete be nga bili mefoé me mvoʼé a nyeʼan.
Guiziga: Dar a slinam ti letireye da Yudehey gar misi ar li miwal wal, buy miwi lihey miwaka taŋ, miskat ti kukur cuw nga tarnaˀ, asi ruwuy ngi buy Zerses gar. Letir misi mingiɓi ngi vula zuy, yo ɓa mizli a cifam setette.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe neldi bataakeeji bee yelanaago Yahuudu'en wonɓe nder lesɗe laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus teemerre e noogas e joweeɗiɗi fuu jam e gooŋgaaku.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe neldi bataakeeji bee yelanaago Yahuudu'en wonɓe nder lesɗe laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus teemerre e noogas e joweeɗiɗi fuu jam e gooŋgaaku.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa tom ha̧ o be Juif dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù ko wannu Zɛrzɛs gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo: duka nɛ́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ in mboozu.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa tom ha̧ o be Juif dam ɗoŋ o zika-nù ko wannu Zɛrzɛs gɔmŋmaa-nɛ-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo: duka nɛ́ wen ga̧a̧mɔ in mboozu.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli ghweneghe nda palepa shɛhɛ ke pɛtɛa ka Zhəwif nyi mbe sla ta hɛɗi nyi gwəmsə ba'a bakemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe te hɛɗia Sɛrsɛs. Ghena ta kwelɛŋe ba'a ŋa nza dɛŋe dɛŋe ya te hɛ.
Tupurri: Ne jar Jwif maga wo ti coçoç sir ma kis ti äe do äog ti renam mani wañ Asuyerusn mono, aè kal yer leder maga waçaçre jam äil äe wo de waçaçre de bay ndarge gogge.

Francais: Elles recommandaient aux Juifs de fêter les Pourim  à la date fixée selon les instructions d’Esther et de Mardochée ; la décision en était prise pour eux et leurs descendants comme celle concernant les jeûnes et les lamentations.
Anglais: to establish these days of Purim [to be observed] at their appointed times, just as Mordecai the Jew and Queen Esther had established for them, and as they had established for themselves and for their descendants with instructions regarding their times of fasting and their lamentations (expressions of needing help).
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Buura vi Purim namna hini dok-dok hay liyamna, hay liyn ma nisi li laata hiɗi ciriya kaw, ki sa ma Yudiyana Mardose hiɗi ca-mulda Ester tun yuldet na'ta kay sa Yudiyana hiɗi jafna visi kaf nala.
Bulu: Be nga bendé Beyude na be jem abôʼô bepurim, éyoñ é ne ntelan a avale Esthe a Mardôsé be nga yeʼele; ntyiʼane te ô mbe asu dab a memvoñ me bôte map, avale fe ane ntyiʼan wo fombô ntyiane bidi a miñyôn.
Guiziga: A ɗuvaka hin ngi  Purim   tayna angi hin taŋ, kaslsla kaɓa Mardoke, mbur Yude ati maˀãy Ester muɗuvaka taŋ di. A ɗuvaka taŋ di vur hirnga taŋ vuna ati dideˀ taŋhay, a ɗuvaka taŋ di jom ti ɓi ngi dalyam ati ɓi ngi tuwuy taŋ na ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum laati ngam tabitingo nyalɗe Puuriima bee saa'iije maaje, bana Mardokay Yahuuduujo e Asta, debbo laamiiɗo umrino ɗum, bana no Yahuudu'en tabitinino ɗum nyalɗe suumaye e bojji ngam ko'e muuɗum'en e danygol muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum laati ngam tabitingo nyalɗe Puuriima bee saa'iije maaje, bana Mardokay Yahuuduujo e Asta, debbo laamiiɗo umrino ɗum, bana no Yahuudu'en tabitinino ɗum nyalɗe suumaye e bojji ngam ko'e muuɗum'en e danygol muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kalata'i mbaŋa tɛ o be Juif wen dee gbaŋa Purim tɛ ŋgimbi-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Mardochee be Juif in ko-wan Ɛstɛr yɔra so ha̧ wa. Ee-zu-mɔ‘i duka nɛ́ wen wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa in o bezaŋ-wa, hee mɔ ko zima yì in aia-nú ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kalata'i mbaŋa tɛ o be Juif wen dee gbaŋa Purim tɛ ŋgimbi-a nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ̀ Mardochee be Juif in ko-wan Ɛstɛr yɔra so ha̧ wa. Ee-zu-mɔ‘i duka nɛ́ wen wa nɛ̀ tɛ-wa in o bezaŋ-wa, hee mɔ ko zima yì in aia-nú ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Kezha keseyi hɛa Pəwrim le yɛ vəa ŋkɛ kala nya gezete Mardoshɛ nde Zhəwif hɛ le Ɛstɛr male ta meghe, kala nya veyi ka Zhəwif kezha ghəa nci le yɛ hwelefe ta nci, jikə le ghena ta səwəmayɛ le ŋa nehwene.
Tupurri: Naw Purim sen kal wo tï¡ï¡ wer ti wur maga go de ngaäge mono, ti wur maga jar Jwif hay wo heçeç bii, hay wo lawge mono, day je Jwif Mardoke wo de waçywañ Ester hay kañ wo naw sen diñ wer äaara de see äaara, de wer mani äaaran wo no.

Francais: Ces ordres d’Esther confirmaient l’institution de la fête des Pourim , et on les mit par écrit dans un livre.
Anglais: The command of Esther established these customs for Purim, and it was written in the book [of the royal archives].
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Labara vi Ester ka law kay tun cawta vi yuldeta vi Purimna. Kuɗ kayni labar namna ka ɗoy hay ɗerwelda tani.
Bulu: Mebendé me Esthe mete me nga yemete ntelan abôʼô bepurim, a be nga tili me e kalate ate été.
Guiziga: Ɓi miɓa vur muguzlum Purime, i Ester muɗuva ti mingiɓi naŋ, waɗ ɓi nah toh toh ar ɗerewol.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Umroore Asta tabitini haala Puuriima ka'a, nde winndaama nder deftere.
Fulfulde_DC: Umroore Asta tabitini haala Puuriima ka'a, nde winndaama nder deftere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr yora ɗoŋ geŋa nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o be Juif wen gbaŋa «Purim»; wa yɔra mɔ‘i zaŋ Kalata.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛstɛr yora ɗoŋ geŋa nɛ̀ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o be Juif wen gbaŋa «Purim»; wa yɔra mɔ‘i zaŋ Kalata.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghena nya gezeke Ɛstɛr nde keseyi ghena ta Pəwrim, vatse rafeyi mbeli mbe palepa nya wəba.
Tupurri: Waçaçre maga Ester waçaçn go mono, diñ waçaçre maga tï¡ï¡ wer few Purim mono, day aè kal yer rage go äil kefdere.

Francais: La vengeance des Juifs
Anglais: The Jews Destroy Their Enemies
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa yudiyana job yisiya, Yuldeta vi Purim
Bulu: Beyude ba kune bebien
Guiziga: Yudehey mupulam cuwal

Fulfulde_DC: Yahuudu'en nattini konne'en muuɗum'en

Francais: Le roi Xerxès imposa des travaux forcés aux habitants des régions côtières de son empire comme à ceux de l’intérieur.
Anglais: King Ahasuerus (Xerxes) imposed a tax on the land and on the coastlands of the sea.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla Asuwerus tun taara kay sumuna, sa kay jokota hiɗi sa kel niy-lum ma ŋolla kaw.
Bulu: Njô bôt Asuérus a nga telé bisaé bi étibelaʼa e be bôt be too bifuse bi si ya mañ yʼéjôé jé avale fe ane e ba be too nsak.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy Zersese, a ɗuv ɓi ngi wurka buutu asi ruwuy naŋ zlar gar waɗ angi hirwuy maturahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus umri jomorgol haa lesdi fuu e haa duuɗe mbeela.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Ahasuwerus umri jomorgol haa lesdi fuu e haa duuɗe mbeela.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Zɛrzɛs gɔna ŋma garama ha̧ bíí zu nù kɔ̧-a̧, in o bíí see-kisi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Zɛrzɛs gɔna ŋma garama ha̧ bíí zu nù kɔ̧-a̧, in o bíí see-kisi.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa meghe Sɛrsɛs zlapete kezha tsehe jaɓeregwale mbeli nyi te hɛɗia ŋkɛ pɛtɛ le ɗema ta nci, tsagha shɛ te hɛɗi nyi dzeyi te yɛmə yite.
Tupurri: Wañ Asuyerus kal kañ lombo ne sir wo de kaali ma nen maarog wo ti.

Francais: Toutes les grandes et courageuses actions du roi, de même que la manière dont il éleva Mardochée à une haute situation, sont racontées dans le livre intitulé : Actes des rois de Médie et de Perse .
Anglais: And all the accomplishments of his authority and strength, and the full account of the greatness of Mordecai to which the king had raised him, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Media and Persia?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Labara kaf ma law kay gaŋeraŋa valamu hiɗi kursulita valamu, hiɗi labara kay muɗ ma nam muɗ Mardose ŋolla, kayni kaf ɗoy hay ɗerwelda vi Labar-ma-Liyna vi muliyana vi sa Medena hiɗi sa Persiyana.
Bulu: Biwôlô a ayoʼo mimboon mi njô bôt, avale a nga bete Mardôsé yôp, mam mete me ne ntilan e kalate minkañete bejô bôte ya Perse a Médi.
Guiziga: Slra ngi gidaŋ naŋ ati ngi wirwir naŋ miga taŋ gar, yo naŋ mitiri ti Mardoke ɗongor, naŋ muvulaŋ slra mimadiɗa na, i mutoho ɓi taŋhaya le gar angi ɗerewol ngi ɓi ngi buy Medihey ati buy Perseheye ta kwa?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haala kuuɗe cuusal e baawɗe e haala maŋngu Mardokay boo, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe Laamiiɓe Mediya e Persiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Haala kuuɗe cuusal e baawɗe e haala maŋngu Mardokay boo, ɗum winndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe Laamiiɓe Mediya e Persiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋgayamɔ in o gasamɔ n'aa dee lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ báá Mardochee n'aa baa e nɛ̀ gasawi, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋgayamɔ in o gasamɔ n'aa dee lɛŋ, gú nɛ̀ báá Mardochee n'aa baa e nɛ̀ gasawi, yɔra zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o wannu Mɛdɛ in Pɛrsɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ ghena ta slene ta meghea ŋkɛ, ŋa kwelea berete ta ŋkɛ le nya ndeke nda kwele ŋkɛ ke Mardoshɛ perə kerafeyi geva mbe palepa kala nya: Slene ta ka meghe nyi mbe Mɛdi ba'a Pɛrse.
Tupurri: Waçaçre maga de bag blam ti eegre äen mo äuy, de blum äe no, de waçaçre ma me' me' wo maga wañ kañ Mardoke go ciñ ti ngeel kluun mono, sen wo äuy de yerge äil kefder Kronig wañre ma Meden wo de wañre ma Persen wo no.

Francais: En effet, Mardochée, le Juif, devint le personnage le plus puissant de l’empire, après le roi Xerxès. Il était honoré et aimé par tous ses compatriotes juifs. Il travailla pour leur bien et il intervint pour assurer la sécurité de son peuple.
Anglais: For Mordecai the Jew was second only to King Ahasuerus, and great among the Jews and in favor with his many fellow people, for he worked for the good of his people and spoke for the welfare  and  peace of his whole nation.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay sa ma Yudiyana Mardose muɗi mi ministrena ma jewna vi mulla Asuwerus, mi sa ma ŋolla vi sa Yudiyana, guro-biyomna ŋolo minimu; nam gar kay li ŋaata kat sumuna valamu, ka law kay ɦur jafna valam kaf kulo'o kaw.
Bulu: E ne nalé na Mardôsé, mone Beyude a nga suʼulane bo môt a dañ éwôlô mvuse njô bôte Asuérus. Bobenyañ Beyude bese be nga semé nye a nyeʼe nye. A nga saé asu ya jeñe mvaé jab a a nga kobô asu ya jeñe ntabane mvoʼé ya bôte bé.
Guiziga: Naŋ kanah, mbak buy Zersese le na, mbur mucuw naŋ angi zuma buyo i Mardoke. Vendeke ngi sukum naŋ Yudeheye, a ɗuvakaŋ hirnga, a wuɗakaŋ haɗa. Naŋ kwana, ara gi slra vur jam ngi mizli naŋhaya, yo ara cik vu, anja ɓa muy naŋhay a cifam zuy zuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mardokay Yahuuduujo laati ɗiɗaɓo laamiiɗo, Yahuudu'en fuu camɗini mo. Mooɓgal banndiraaɓe maako ngiɗi mo, ngam o ɗaɓɓiti jam ummaatoore maako, o tabitini hayru yimɓe maako fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Mardokay Yahuuduujo laati ɗiɗaɓo laamiiɗo, Yahuudu'en fuu camɗini mo. Mooɓgal banndiraaɓe maako ngiɗi mo, ngam o ɗaɓɓiti jam ummaatoore maako, o tabitini hayru yimɓe maako fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, Mardochee be Juif duka so kànà nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ hɔɔ ɗoŋ wannu Zɛrzɛs. A̧ duka nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ o be Juif zɔna so in nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna, wen a̧ kia so nɛ́ yuwar de duka-a ko dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, ye nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa ha̧ wa mɛ duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ mbetɛ, Mardochee be Juif duka so kànà nɛ́ wi nɛ̀ hɔɔ ɗoŋ wannu Zɛrzɛs. A̧ duka nɛ́ bíí nɛ̀ o be Juif zɔna so in nɛ̀ o nya-a̧ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so nyɛmna, wen a̧ kia so nɛ́ yuwar de duka-a ko dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, ye nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wa ha̧ wa mɛ duk tɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ Mardoshɛ, nde Zhəwif ya kande ghate ta wəndə nya kwele kadzeyitea meghe Sɛrsɛs. Gheŋkɛ wəndə nya kwele sha ka Zhəwif. Pɛtɛa ka menəhɛnyɛ keɗehwe ŋkɛ, va nya nza ŋkɛ kamene slene ba'a kazele kwelɛŋe kezha mbelia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Werga je Jwif Mardoke hay diñ Minisdir ma tañgu mani wañ Asuyerus no. Je maga kluu yoo jar Jwif wo, ga heçeçre äen dan wo ngaäa debañ mono. AÀ hay dage diñ ga jar äen mo hay wo de ele, day waçaçre äen äuy hay diñ ga wer mani sen äuy mo hay wo de da' see äaara.

Anglais: Mordecai’s Greatness

Fulfulde_DC: Maŋngu Mardokay
